atk-s0511a0:4_0: Anantañāṇaṃ karuṇālayaṃ layaṃ, malassa buddhaṃ susamāhitaṃ hitaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:5_0: Namāmi dhammaṃ bhavasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ, guṇākarañceva niraṅgaṇaṃ gaṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:6_0: Paññāya seṭṭho jinasāvakānaṃ, yaṃ dhammasenāpati dhammarājaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:20_0: Sotabbarūpaṃ pana buddhavaṃsakathāya aññaṃ idha natthi yasmā;
atk-s0511a0:23_0: Saṃvaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇayato suvaṇṇaṃ, nidhāya kaṇṇaṃ madhuraṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0511a0:24_0: Sabbampi hitvā pana kiccamaññaṃ, sakkacca maccenidha niccakālaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:25_0: Sotuṃ kathetumpi budhena yuttā, kathā panāyaṃ atidullabhāti.
atk-s0511a0:26_0: Tattha “buddhavaṃsasaṃvaṇṇanā hessati sārabhūtā”ti vuttattā buddhavaṃso tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-s0511a0:26_2: ito heṭṭhā kappasatasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu uppannānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ uppannakappādiparicchedavasena
atk-s0511a0:27_0: Svāyaṃ kappaparicchedo nāmaparicchedo gottaparicchedo jātiparicchedo nagaraparicchedo pituparicchedo
atk-s0511a0:27_4: parinibbānaparicchedoti imehi pāḷiyā āgatehi bāvīsatiyā paricchedehi paricchinno vavatthito.
atk-s0511a0:28_1: So agāravāsaparicchedo pāsādattayaparicchedo nāṭakitthiparicchedo aggamahesiparicchedo puttaparicchedo
atk-s0511a0:28_2: yānaparicchedo abhinikkhamanaparicchedo padhānaparicchedo upaṭṭhākaparicchedo vihāraparicchedoti dasadhā
atk-s0511a0:32_0: Kenāyaṃ desito kattha, kassatthāya ca desito;
atk-s0511a0:33_0: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṃ kena cābhato.
atk-s0511a0:36_0: Tattha kenāyaṃ desitoti ayaṃ buddhavaṃso kena desito?
atk-s0511a0:36_1: Sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacārena dasabalena catuvesārajjavisāradena dhammarājena dhammassāminā tathāgatena sabbaññunā sammāsambuddhena desito.
atk-s0511a0:37_1: Kapilavatthumahānagare nigrodhārāmamahāvihāre paramarucirasandassane devamanussanayananipātabhūte ratanacaṅkame caṅkamantena desito.
atk-s0511a0:38_0: Kassatthāya ca desitoti? Dvāsītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ anekakoṭīnañca devamanussānaṃ atthāya desito.
atk-s0511a0:40_0: Kadā desitoti bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:40_2: Paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya isipatane migadāye vasi.
atk-s0511a0:40_3: Dutiyaṃ vassaṃ rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0511a0:40_16: Soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:40_19: Tathā ekūnavīsatimaṃ vīsatimaṃ pana vassaṃ rājagaheyeva vasi.
atk-s0511a0:40_21: “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:40_23: Tato paṭṭhāya pana sāvatthiṃyeva upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre ca pubbārāme ca dhuvaparibhogavasena vasi.
atk-s0511a0:41_0: Yadā pana satthā buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā
atk-s0511a0:41_1: uruvelaṃ gantvā tattha tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile dametvā bhikkhusahassehi kataparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-s0511a0:41_2: rājagahaṃ gantvā dve māse tattheva vasi,
atk-s0511a0:41_3: tadā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa panassa pañca māsā jātā.
atk-s0511a0:41_10: So evaṃ cintetvā kulanagaragamanatthāya saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0511a0:41_11: Atha satthā cassa vacanaṃ sutvā ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātukāmo hutvā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi
atk-s0511a0:41_12: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a0:41_13: divase divase yojanaṃ gacchanto rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthupuraṃ dvīhi māsehi sampāpuṇitvā
atk-s0511a0:42_0: Kassa vacananti? Sāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ sammāsambuddhasseva vacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:43_2: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddajī tisso kosiyaputto siggavo moggaliputto sudatto dhammiko dāsako soṇako
atk-s0511a0:43_4: tato uddhampi tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjakālā ābhatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a0:46_0: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṃ kena cābhato”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:50_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa idāni atthavaṇṇanā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:50_1: sā panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā yasmā dūrenidānaṃ avidūrenidānaṃ santikenidānanti,
atk-s0511a0:50_2: imāni tīṇi nidānāni dassetvāva vaṇṇitā suvaṇṇitā nāma hoti.
atk-s0511a0:50_4: tehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya viññātattā suviññātāva hoti,
atk-s0511a0:51_0: Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya tāva tesaṃ nidānānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-s0511a0:51_2: dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle katābhinīhārassa mahāsattassa yāva vessantarattabhāvā cavitvā tusitabhavane nibbatti,
atk-s0511a0:51_6: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti ca,
atk-s0511a0:51_8: “vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāya”nti ca evaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇappattito yāva parinibbānamañcā
atk-s0511a0:51_9: etasmiṃ antare bhagavā yattha yattha vihāsi,
atk-s0511a0:51_11: Ettāvatā saṅkhepeneva tiṇṇaṃ dūrāvidūrasantikenidānānaṃ vasena bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā samattā hotīti.
atk-s0511a0:56_0: “Brahmā ca lokādhipatī sahampatī, katañjalī anadhivaraṃ ayācatha;
atk-s0511a0:57_0: Santīdha sattāpparajakkhajātikā, desehi dhammaṃ anukampimaṃ paja”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:59_0: Ettha “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe”tiādisuttantesu viya –
atk-s0511a0:59_1: “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
atk-s0511a0:59_2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0511a0:59_3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ apucchī”ti evamādinā nayena nidānaṃ avatvā kasmā “brahmā ca lokādhipatī sahampatī,
atk-s0511a0:59_4: katañjalī anadhivaraṃ ayācathā”tiādinā nayena nidānaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
atk-s0511a0:59_5: bhagavato sabbadhammadesanākāraṇabhūtāya brahmuno dhammadesanāyācanāya sandassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
atk-s0511a0:61_0: Kadā kattha ca kenāyaṃ, gāthā hi samudīritā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:62_1: buddhabhūtassa pana bhagavato aṭṭhame sattāhe satthā dhammadesanatthāya brahmunā ajjhiṭṭho āyācito.
atk-s0511a0:62_3: mahāpuriso kira katābhinīhāro mahābhinikkhamanadivase vivaṭapākaṭabībhacchasayanāsanaceṭikā nāṭakitthiyo
atk-s0511a0:62_4: disvā atīva saṃviggahadayo paṭekadesāvacchannaṃ channaṃ āmantetvā –
atk-s0511a0:62_5: “arinaravaramanthakaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ nāma turaṅgavaramāharā”ti kaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā channasahāyo varaturaṅgamāruyha
atk-s0511a0:62_6: nagaradvāre adhivatthāya devatāya nagaradvāre vivaṭe nagarato nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni tena rattāvasesena
atk-s0511a0:62_7: atikkamitvā anomasatto anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre ṭhatvā channamevamāha – “channa,
atk-s0511a0:62_8: tvaṃ mama imāni aññehi asādhāraṇāni ābharaṇāni kaṇḍakañca varaturaṅgamādāya kapilapuraṃ gacchāhī”ti channaṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_9: vissajjetvā asitoraganīluppalasadisenāsinā sakesamakuṭaṃ chinditvā ākāse ukkhipitvā devadattiyaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_10: gahetvā sayameva pabbajitvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno anilabalasamuddhutataraṅgabhaṅgaṃ asaṅgaṃ gaṅgaṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_11: nadiṃ uttaritvā maṇigaṇaraṃsijālavijjotitarājagahaṃ rājagahaṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisitvā tattha issariyamadamattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_12: janaṃ parihāsento viya ca uddhatavesassa janassa lajjamuppādayamāno viya ca vayakantīhi nāgarajanahadayāni
atk-s0511a0:62_13: attani bandhanto viya ca dvatiṃsavaramahāpurisalakkhaṇavirājitāya rūpasiriyā sabbajananayanāni vilumpamāno
atk-s0511a0:62_14: viya ca rūpīpādasañcaro puññasañcayo viya ca pabbato viya ca gamanena nissaṅgo santindriyo santamānaso
atk-s0511a0:62_15: yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yāpanamattaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatapasse
atk-s0511a0:62_16: chāyūdakasampanne sucibhūmibhāge paramaramaṇīye pavivitte okāse nisīditvā paṭisaṅkhānabalena missakabhattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_17: paribhuñjitvā paṇḍavagirānusārena bimbisārena magadhamahārājena mahāpurisassa santikaṃ gantvā nāmagottaṃ
atk-s0511a0:62_18: pucchitvā tena pamuditahadayena “mama rajjabhāgaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti rajjena nimantiyamāno – “alaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0511a0:62_19: na mayhaṃ rajjenattho ahaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya lokahitatthāya padhānamanuyuñjitvā loke vivaṭacchado buddho
atk-s0511a0:62_20: bhavissāmīti nikkhanto”ti vatvā tena ca “buddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ osareyyāthā”ti vutto
atk-s0511a0:62_21: ‘sādhū’ti tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā āḷārañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dhammadesanāya sāraṃ avindanto tato
atk-s0511a0:62_22: pakkamitvā uruvelāyaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi amataṃ adhigantuṃ asakkonto oḷārikāhārapaṭisevanena
atk-s0511a0:63_0: Tadā pana uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senānigamakuṭumbikassa dhītā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a0:63_1: “sacāhaṃ samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0511a0:63_4: Sā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase “ajja balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti pātova pāyāsaṃ anāyāsaṃ paramamadhuraṃ sampaṭipādesi.
atk-s0511a0:63_5: Bodhisattopi tadaheva katasarīrapaṭijaggano bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā tasmiṃ nigrodharukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:63_6: Atha kho puṇṇā nāma dāsī tassā dhātī rukkhamūlasodhanatthāya gatā bodhisattaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokayamānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:63_9: Sarīrato cassa nikkhantāhi pabhāhi sakalañca taṃ rukkhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ disvā tassā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:63_10: “ajja amhākaṃ devatā rukkhato oruyha sahattheneva baliṃ paṭiggahetukāmā hutvā nisinnā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:63_11: Sā vegena gantvā sujātāya etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0511a0:64_0: Tato sujātā sañjātasaddhā hutvā sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ paramamadhurassa
atk-s0511a0:64_1: madhupāyāsassa pūretvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā sīsenādāya nigrodharukkhābhimukhī agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:64_2: Sā gacchantī dūratova taṃ bodhisattaṃ rukkhadevatamiva sakalaṃ taṃ rukkhaṃ sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:64_3: katvā puññasañcayamiva rūpavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā pītisomanassajātā sujātā “rukkhadevatā”ti saññāya diṭṭhaṭṭhānato
atk-s0511a0:64_4: paṭṭhāya onatonatā gantvā sīsato taṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ otāretvā mahāsattassa hatthe ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0511a0:65_0: Atha kho bodhisattopi suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīraṃ gantvā suppatiṭṭhitassa nāma titthassa
atk-s0511a0:65_1: tīre suvaṇṇapātiṃ ṭhapetvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā ekūnapaññāsapiṇḍe karonto taṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā –
atk-s0511a0:65_4: Sā pāti paṭisotaṃ gantvā kāḷassa nāma nāgarājassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ thālakāni ukkhipitvā tesaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:66_0: Mahāsatto tattheva vanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sotthiyena nāma tiṇahārakena mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a0:66_1: ākāraṃ ñatvā dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bodhimaṇḍamāruyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:66_2: So pana padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya akampittha.
atk-s0511a0:66_4: “ayaṃ padeso mama guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asamattho”ti pacchimadisābhāgamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:66_11: “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0511a0:66_14: “bodhiṃ apatvāva imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmī”ti caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a0:67_0: Taṅkhaṇaññeva sabbalokābhihāro māro bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ himagirisikharasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a0:67_1: girimekhalaṃ nāma arivaravāraṇaṃ varavāraṇaṃ abhiruyha navayojanikena dhanuasipharasusarasattisabalenātibahalena
atk-s0511a0:67_2: mārabalena samparivuto samantā pabbato viya ajjhottharanto mahāsapattaṃ viya mahāsattaṃ samupāgami.
atk-s0511a0:67_3: Mahāpuriso sūriye dharanteyeva atitumūlaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā vikasitajayasumanakusumasadisassa cīvarassa
atk-s0511a0:67_4: upari patamānehi rattapavālaṅkurasadisaruciradassanehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi pītiyā viya pūjiyamāno eva
atk-s0511a0:67_5: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ labhitvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde
atk-s0511a0:67_6: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ sammasanto aruṇodaye buddho hutvā –
atk-s0511a0:71_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a0:73_0: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisevanena vītināmetvā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a0:73_1: devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:73_2: vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā –
atk-s0511a0:73_3: “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:73_4: pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañceva bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a0:74_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antare puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a0:74_2: Tato pacchimadisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ nāma māpesuṃ,
atk-s0511a0:74_3: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a0:74_5: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0511a0:74_6: tatthāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento ajapālanigrodhe sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a0:75_1: Tassa nisinnamattasseva bhagavato sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento mahāakālamegho udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:75_2: Tasmiṃ pana uppanne mucalindo nāgarājā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:75_3: “ayaṃ mahāmegho satthari mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhamatte uppanno vāsāgāramassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:75_4: So sattaratanamayaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ dibbavimānaṃ nimminituṃ samatthopi evaṃ kate –
atk-s0511a0:75_6: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti atimahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0511a0:75_7: parikkhipitvā upari mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:75_8: Atha bhagavā parikkhepassa antova mahati okāse sabbaratanamaye paccagghapallaṅke upari viniggalantavividhasurabhikusumadāmavitāne
atk-s0511a0:75_10: Evaṃ bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ tattha vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:75_13: Etthantare bhagavā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a0:76_4: Tato bhagavā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahodakena mukhaṃ dhovitvā rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:76_5: Tasmiṃ samaye catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamaye patte tapussabhallikānaṃ vāṇijānaṃ manthañca
atk-s0511a0:76_6: madhupiṇḍikañca paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitvā paccāgantvā ajapālanigrodharukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:76_7: Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva attanā adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo –
atk-s0511a0:76_8: “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo”ti
atk-s0511a0:77_0: Atha brahmā sahampati dasabalassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya –
atk-s0511a0:77_5: So attano patiṭṭhānatthāya pathaviṃ nimminitvā dakkhiṇaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihantvā jalajāmalāvikalakamalamakulasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a0:78_0: “Pāturahosi magadhesu pubbe, dhammo asuddho samalehi cintito;
atk-s0511a0:79_0: Apāpuretaṃ amatassa dvāraṃ, suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:80_0: “Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, yathāpi passe janataṃ samantato;
atk-s0511a0:83_0: “Uṭṭhehi vīra vijitasaṅgāma, satthavāha anaṇa vicara loke;
atk-s0511a0:85_0: “Nanu tumhehi ‘buddho bodheyyaṃ tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyya”’nti –
atk-s0511a0:88_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññubhāvaṃ pattoti ca,
atk-s0511a0:88_1: “tumhehi dhamme adesiyamāne ko hi nāma añño dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0511a0:88_2: kimaññaṃ lokassa saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyana”nti ca evamādīhi anekehi nayehi bhagavantaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ ayāci.
atk-s0511a0:88_4: “buddhabhūtassa pana bhagavato aṭṭhame sattāhe satthā dhammadesanatthāya brahmunā āyācito”ti.
atk-s0511a0:89_1: gāthā hi samudīritā”ti imesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0511a0:89_6: Bhagavati kira parinibbute rājagahanagare vebhārapabbatapasse sattapaṇṇiguhādvāre vijitasabbasattunā
atk-s0511a0:89_7: ajātasattunā magadhamahārājena dhammasaṅgāyanatthaṃ kārite paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalasaṅkāse daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍe
atk-s0511a0:89_8: maṇḍape dhammāsanagatenāyasmatā ānandattherena “brahmā ca lokādhipatī”ti ayaṃ gāthā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:92_0: Kadā kattha ca kenāyaṃ, gāthā hi samudīritā”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:93_0: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti. Evaṃ iminā sambandhena vuttāya panassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0511a0:94_0: Tattha brahmāti brūhito tehi tehi guṇavisesehīti brahmā.
atk-s0511a0:96_0: Anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno, saccavhayo brahme upāsito me”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:97_6: Idha pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbatto kappāyuko mahābrahmā adhippeto. Ca-
atk-s0511a0:97_8: brahmā ca aññe ca dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu brahmāno cāti attho,
atk-s0511a0:97_10: Lokādhipatīti ettha lokoti saṅkhāraloko sattaloko okāsalokoti tayo lokā.
atk-s0511a0:97_13: lokekadesassāpi adhipati lokādhipatīti vuccati devādhipati narādhipati viya.
atk-s0511a0:98_0: Sahampatīti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno
atk-s0511a0:98_6: Anadhivaranti accantavaro adhivaro nāssa atthīti anadhivaro,
atk-s0511a0:98_7: na tato adhiko varo atthīti vā anadhivaro,
atk-s0511a0:99_5: Svāyaṃ katthaci sāsanaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha – “idheva,
atk-s0511a0:101_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:102_7: Sattāti rūpādīsu khandhesu chandarāgena sattā visattā āsattā laggā lagitāti sattā,
atk-s0511a0:102_9: Ruḷhīsaddena pana vītarāgesupi ayaṃ vohāro vattatiyeva.
atk-s0511a0:103_0: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvā ca teti apparajakkhajātikā,
atk-s0511a0:103_1: appaṃ rāgādirajameva vā yesaṃ te apparajakkhā,
atk-s0511a0:103_2: te apparajakkhasabhāvā apparajakkhajātikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:103_5: “desehi dhamma”nti iminā sambandhaṃ katvā attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:103_11: “idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a0:105_0: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, diṭṭhaṃ so ativattatī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:106_6: “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti khandhā hontī”tiādīsu suññatāyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:106_9: “Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchantī”tiādīsu ñeyye.
atk-s0511a0:109_0: Paṭhanti. Ettāvatā sabbaso ayaṃ gāthā vuttatthā hoti.
atk-s0511a0:110_0: Atha bhagavato taṃ brahmuno sahampatissa āyācanavacanaṃ sutvā aparimitasamayasamuditakaruṇābalassa dasabalassa
atk-s0511a0:110_2: Taṃ pana bhagavato karuṇuppattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikāle saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a0:115_0: Tattha sampannavijjācaraṇassāti sampannaṃ nāma tividhaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
atk-s0511a0:117_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na naṃ vāretumussahe”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:118_1: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgisampannaṃ nāma. “Imissā, bhante,
atk-s0511a0:118_6: Vijjāti paṭipakkhadhamme vijjhanaṭṭhena viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vinditabbaṭṭhena ca vijjā.
atk-s0511a0:118_7: Tā pana tissopi vijjā aṭṭhapi vijjā.
atk-s0511a0:118_10: Tatra hi vipassanāñāṇena manomayiddhiyā ca saha cha abhiññā pariggahetvā aṭṭha vijjā vuttā.
atk-s0511a0:118_11: Caraṇanti sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ
atk-s0511a0:118_12: āraddhavīriyatā upaṭṭhitassatitā paññāsampannatā cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānānīti ime pannarasa dhammā veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:118_13: Imeyeva hi pannarasa dhammā yasmā etehi carati ariyasāvako gacchati amataṃ disaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:118_15: ariyasāvako sīlavā hotī”ti sabbaṃ majjhimapaṇṇāsake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:118_17: sampannāni paripuṇṇāni vijjācaraṇāni yassa soyaṃ sampannavijjācaraṇo,
atk-s0511a0:119_0: Tādinoti “iṭṭhepi tādī aniṭṭhepi tādī”tiādinā nayena mahāniddese āgatatādilakkhaṇena tādino,
atk-s0511a0:123_0: Sambuddho tapataṃ seṭṭho, esā ābhā anuttarā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:125_0: Tathāgatassāti ettha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā “tathāgato”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:126_2: pūretvā imā dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā aṅgapariccāgaṃ
atk-s0511a0:126_3: jīvitapariccāgaṃ dhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā yathā vipassiādayo
atk-s0511a0:126_5: tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgatoti tathāgato. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:128_0: Tathā ayaṃ sakyamunīpi āgato, tathāgato vuccati tena cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:129_1: Yathā sampatijātā vipassiādayo samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā,
atk-s0511a0:129_2: tathā amhākampi bhagavā gatoti tathāgato. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:130_0: “Muhuttajātova gavampatī yathā, samehi pādehi phusī vasundharaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:131_0: So vikkamī sattapadāni gotamo, setañca chattaṃ anudhārayuṃ marū.
atk-s0511a0:132_0: “Gantvāna so sattapadāni gotamo, disā vilokesi samā samantato;
atk-s0511a0:134_1: Sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca tathaṃ avitathaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anubuddhoti tathāgato.
atk-s0511a0:140_1: Bhagavā hi aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhusotaghāṇajivhākāyamanodvāresu āpāthaṃ
atk-s0511a0:143_1: Yañca abhisambodhiyā parinibbānassa ca antare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle suttādinavaṅgasaṅgahitaṃ bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena,
atk-s0511a0:143_2: sabbaṃ taṃ ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya tathameva avitathameva hoti.
atk-s0511a0:144_3: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0511a0:145_4: Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti tathāgato. Da-
atk-s0511a0:148_1: Bhagavā hi yaṃ yaṃ vācaṃ abhāsi,
atk-s0511a0:151_0: “Yathā vācā gatā tassa, tathā kāyo gato yato;
atk-s0511a0:153_1: Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati
atk-s0511a0:153_3: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0511a0:154_2: tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī,
atk-s0511a0:155_4: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati,
atk-s0511a0:155_5: iti sabbalokābhibhavanato aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti da-
atk-s0511a0:157_0: Vasavattīti so tena, hoti satthā tathāgato”.
atk-s0511a0:158_1: añño koci “ahaṃ buddho”ti evaṃ paṭiññaṃ dātuṃ samattho nāmassa puggalo,
atk-s0511a0:159_0: Atha bhagavā brahmunā dhammadesanatthāya āyācito sattesu kāruññataṃ uppādetvā dhammaṃ desetukāmo mahābrahmānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0511a0:160_0: “Apārutā tesaṃ amatassa dvārā, ye sotavanto pamuñcantu saddhaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:161_0: Vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ, dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:162_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati “katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā dhammadesanāyā”ti ñatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0511a0:162_1: añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā brahmagaṇaparivuto pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a0:162_2: Atha satthā tassa brahmuno paṭiññaṃ datvā –
atk-s0511a0:162_3: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cintento –
atk-s0511a0:162_4: “āḷāro paṇḍito so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippaṃ ājānissatī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā puna olokento tassa sattāhaṃ kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a0:162_5: ñatvā udakassa ca abhidosakālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā puna –
atk-s0511a0:162_6: “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū viharantī”ti pañcavaggiye āvajjento “bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane
atk-s0511a0:162_7: migadāye”ti ñatvā āsāḷhiyaṃ pabhātāya rattiyā kālasseva pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanikaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno
atk-s0511a0:162_8: antarāmagge upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvamāvikatvā taṃdivasameva sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a0:162_10: Tattha pañcavaggiyānaṃ attano buddhabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā paññattavarabuddhāsanagato pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantetvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:163_0: Tesu aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:163_1: Satthā tattheva vassaṃ upagantvā punadivase vappattheraṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0511a0:163_2: Eteneva upāyena sabbe te sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā puna pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa pañcapi te there sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttantaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a0:164_0: Atha satthā tattheva yasassa kulaputtassa upanissayaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:164_1: “ehi yasā”ti pakkositvā tasmiññeva rattibhāge sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā punadivase arahatte ca patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0511a0:164_2: aparepi tassa sahāyake catupaṇṇāsajane ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0511a0:164_3: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu satthā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā bhikkhū āmantetvā etadavoca –
atk-s0511a0:170_0: Santi atthāya sattānaṃ, subbatā vacanaṃ mama.
atk-s0511a0:179_0: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā te bhikkhū disāsu vissajjetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi.
atk-s0511a0:179_4: ekopi arahā vā puthujjano vā nāhosi.
atk-s0511a0:179_5: Tepi sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
atk-s0511a0:179_6: dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile dametvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā
atk-s0511a0:179_7: gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena bhagavā parivuto
atk-s0511a0:179_8: “bimbisārassa rañño paṭiññaṃ mocessāmī”ti rājagahanagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ nāma agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:179_10: “satthā āgato”ti sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi parivuto dasabalaṃ ghanavivaragatamiva divasakaraṃ
atk-s0511a0:179_11: vanavivaragataṃ munivaradivasakaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā cakkālaṅkatatalesu jalajāmalāvikalakamalakomalesu dasabalassa
atk-s0511a0:179_12: pādesu makuṭamaṇijutivisaravijjotinā sirasā nipatitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ parisāya.
atk-s0511a0:180_1: “kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape brahmacariyaṃ carati,
atk-s0511a0:180_3: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya theraṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0511a0:182_0: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0511a0:184_0: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0511a0:185_0: Etaṃ malantī upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:186_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā –
atk-s0511a0:186_3: sattatālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ sattakkhattuṃ abbhuggantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā ākāsato oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:187_0: Atha kho mahājano tassa taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:187_2: evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko attānaṃ ‘arahā aha’nti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena damito”ti dasabalassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:187_6: Atha kho so mahājano uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0511a0:187_9: Tato satthā tena mahājanena yācito bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ mahānāradakassapajātakaṃ kathetvā cattāri ariyasaccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0511a0:187_10: Tato satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rājā bimbisāro ekādasanahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0511a0:187_12: Rājā saraṇaṃ gantvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā bhagavantaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a0:188_0: Punadivase bhagavā bhikkhusahassaparivuto marugaṇaparivuto viya dasasatanayano devarājā,
atk-s0511a0:188_2: Rājā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhojanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0511a0:188_3: tīṇi ratanāni vinā vasituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0511a0:188_4: velāya vā avelāya vā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0511a0:188_6: idaṃ pana amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ pavivekakāmānaṃ nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a0:188_9: bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu navatapanaṅgārasaṅkāsena suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena surabhikusumavāsitaṃ maṇivaṇṇaudakaṃ
atk-s0511a0:188_10: gahetvā veḷuvanārāmaṃ pariccajanto dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0511a0:188_11: Tasmiṃ ārāmapaṭiggahaṇe “buddhasāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānī”ti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantī viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī kampi.
atk-s0511a0:188_12: Jambudīpe pana ṭhapetvā veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ aññaṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā gahitasenāsanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:188_13: Atha satthā veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā rañño vihāradānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a0:189_0: “Āvāsadānassa panānisaṃsaṃ, ko nāma vattuṃ, puriso samattho;
atk-s0511a0:190_0: Aññatra buddhā pana lokanāthā, yutto mukhānaṃ nahutena cāpi.
atk-s0511a0:191_0: “Āyuñca vaṇṇañca sukhaṃ balañca, varaṃ pasatthaṃ paṭibhānameva;
atk-s0511a0:192_0: Dadāti nāmāti pavuccate so, yo deti saṅghassa naro vihāraṃ.
atk-s0511a0:194_0: Pāleti āyuṃ pana tassa yasmā, āyuppado hoti tamāhu santo.
atk-s0511a0:195_0: “Accuṇhasīte vasato nivāse, balañca vaṇṇo paṭibhā na hoti;
atk-s0511a0:196_0: Tasmā hi so deti vihāradātā, balañca vaṇṇaṃ paṭibhānameva.
atk-s0511a0:198_0: Nivāraṇā nekavidhassa niccaṃ, sukhappado hoti vihāradātā.
atk-s0511a0:200_0: Yasmā nivāreti vihāradātā, tasmā sukhaṃ vindati so parattha.
atk-s0511a0:202_0: Yo deti sīlādiguṇoditānaṃ, sabbaṃ dado nāma pavuccate so.
atk-s0511a0:204_0: Khittova so tattha parehi sagge, yathābhataṃ jāyati vītasoko.
atk-s0511a0:205_0: “Vare cārurūpe vihāre uḷāre, naro kāraye vāsaye tattha bhikkhū;
atk-s0511a0:206_0: Dadeyyannapānañca vatthañca nesaṃ, pasannena cittena sakkacca niccaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:207_0: “Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu bhoge, manorame paccanubhuyya bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a0:208_0: Vihāradānassa phalena santaṃ, sukhaṃ asokaṃ adhigaccha pacchā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:209_0: Iccevaṃ munirājā nararājassa bimbisārassa vihāradānānumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0511a0:209_1: paramadassanīyāya attano sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇarasasekapiñcharāni viya nagaravanavimānādīni kurumāno
atk-s0511a0:209_2: anopamāya buddhalīḷāya anantāya buddhasiriyā veḷuvanamahāvihārameva pāvisīti.
atk-s0511a0:212_0: Athevaṃ bhagavati tasmiṃ viharante suddhodanamahārājā “putto me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā paramābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:212_1: patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ patvā veḷuvanamahāvihāre viharatī”ti sutvā aññataraṃ mahāmaccaṃ
atk-s0511a0:212_3: purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā mama vacanena ‘pitā vo suddhodanamahārājā taṃ daṭṭhukāmo’ti vatvā puttaṃ me gaṇhitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:212_5: devā”ti rañño paṭissuṇitvā purisasahassaparivāro saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā dhammadesanavelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:212_6: So “tiṭṭhatu tāva raññā pahitasāsana”nti parisapariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova
atk-s0511a0:212_7: saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Bhagavā – “etha,
atk-s0511a0:212_9: Te sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ākappasampannā hutvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:212_11: na ca sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti cintetvā teneva nīhārena navakkhattuṃ amacce pesesi.
atk-s0511a0:212_12: Tesu navasu purisasahassesu ekopi rañño nārocesi,
atk-s0511a0:213_1: “ko nu kho mama vacanaṃ karissatī”ti sabbarājabalaṃ olokento udāyiṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a0:213_2: So kira rañño sabbatthasādhako amacco abbhantariko ativissāsiko bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivaseyeva jāto sahapaṃsukīḷito sahāyo.
atk-s0511a0:213_5: ahaṃ mama puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo navapurisasahassāni pesesiṃ,
atk-s0511a0:213_12: tvaṃ pabbajitvā vā apabbajitvā vā mayhaṃ puttaṃ dassehī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:213_14: devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:213_20: kālo dasabalassa ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato
atk-s0511a0:214_0: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0511a0:215_0: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:219_0: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:221_0: Khuddaṃ pipāsampi vinodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:223_0: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:227_0: Tosenti satte maṇimaṇḍapāva, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:228_0: “Latā anekā dumanissitāva, piyehi saddhiṃ sahitā vadhūva;
atk-s0511a0:229_0: Palobhayantī hi sugandhagandhā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:231_0: Tosenti mañjussaratā ratīhi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:232_0: “Migā ca nānā suvirājamānā, uttuṅgakaṇṇā ca manuññanettā;
atk-s0511a0:233_0: Disā samantā mabhidhāvayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:234_0: “Manuññabhūtā ca mahī samantā, virājamānā haritāva saddalā;
atk-s0511a0:237_0: Virocayanteva disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:239_0: Virājamānaṃ sucimañca sobhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:241_0: Sugandhabhūtaṃ pavanaṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:247_0: Modanti bhariyāhi samaṅgino te, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:249_0: Madhumhi gandho vidisaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:250_0: “Abhinnanādā madavāraṇā ca, girīhi dhāvanti ca vāridhārā;
atk-s0511a0:251_0: Savanti najjo suvirājitāva samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:253_0: Disā rajindāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:257_0: Girimhi ṭhatvā abhinādayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:259_0: Girī virocanti disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:261_0: Savanti najjo suvirājamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:263_0: Najjo virocanti susandamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:265_0: Vibhūsitaggā surasundarī ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:267_0: Manobhirāmaṃ satataṃ gatīnaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:269_0: Pathesu gāme sulabhā manuññā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:273_0: Bahūhi tattheva janā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:275_0: Bhisehi khīraṃva rasaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:283_0: Visālasālā ca sabhā ca bahū, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:286_0: “Vāto mudūsītalasādhurūpo, nabhā ca abbhā vigatā samantā;
atk-s0511a0:287_0: Disā ca sabbāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:289_0: Nabhe ca sūro mudukova tāpo, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:291_0: Disā vidhāvanti ca gajjayantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:295_0: Disā ca sabbā atirocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:297_0: Caranti tasmiṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:302_0: “Nisevitaṃ nekadijehi niccaṃ, gāmena gāmaṃ satataṃ vasantā;
atk-s0511a0:303_0: Pure pure gāmavarā ca santi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:305_0: Tahiṃ samiddhā janatā bahū ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:306_0: “Puññiddhiyā sabbayasaggapattā, janā ca tasmiṃ sukhitā samiddhā;
atk-s0511a0:307_0: Pahūtabhogā vividhā vasanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:308_0: “Nabhe ca abbhā suvisuddhavaṇṇā, disā ca cando suvirājitova;
atk-s0511a0:309_0: Rattiñca vāto mudusītalo ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:311_0: Piyehi saddhiṃ abhimodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:312_0: “Candassa raṃsīhi nabhaṃ viroci, mahī ca saṃsuddhamanuññavaṇṇā;
atk-s0511a0:313_0: Disā ca sabbā parisuddharūpā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:314_0: “Dūre ca disvā varacandaraṃsiṃ, pupphiṃsu pupphāni mahītalasmiṃ;
atk-s0511a0:318_0: “Kucanti hatthīpi madena mattā, vicittapiñchā ca dijā samantā;
atk-s0511a0:319_0: Karonti nādaṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:320_0: “Pathañca sabbaṃ paṭipajjanakkhamaṃ, iddhañca raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:323_0: Yatīna pītiṃ satataṃ janeti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:325_0: Kulanagaraṃ idha sassirikaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:327_0: Vicittaparikhāhi puraṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:331_0: Surindaloke iva devaputtā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:333_0: Balena saddhiṃ mahatā muninda, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:337_0: Tosehi taṃ muninda guṇaseṭṭhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:340_0: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu.
atk-s0511a0:342_0: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:344_1: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavabhikkhusahassehi parivuto rājagahā
atk-s0511a0:344_2: nikkhamitvā divase divase yojanaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto dvīhi māsehi kapilavatthupuraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:344_4: “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsamānā “nigrodhasakkassārāmo ramaṇīyo”ti
atk-s0511a0:344_5: sallakkhetvā sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ kāretvā gandhapupphahatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārehi
atk-s0511a0:344_6: samalaṅkatagattā gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:345_0: Tatra bhagavā vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:345_8: Tesvevaṃ nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0511a0:345_9: “ime ñātakā attano moghajiṇṇabhāvena na maṃ vandanti,
atk-s0511a0:345_14: handāhaṃ attano buddhabalaṃ iddhibalañca dassento pāṭihāriyañca kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:345_15: ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ caṅkamaṃ māpetvā tattha caṅkamanto mahājanassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammañca deseyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0511a0:347_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a0:348_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:350_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a0:351_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:355_0: Tattha na hete jānantīti na hi ete jānanti. Na-
atk-s0511a0:355_3: Yasmā panete mama ñātiādayo devamanussā mayā buddhabale ca iddhibale ca anāvikate na jānanti “ediso buddho,
atk-s0511a0:355_5: tasmā ahaṃ mama buddhabalañca iddhibalañca dasseyyanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:355_7: Saha devehīti sadevā. Ke te? Mānusā,
atk-s0511a0:355_13: sadevā sasuddhodanā mānusā sadevamānusā sarājāno vā ete mama ñātimānusā mama balaṃ na vijānantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:355_17: Atha vā devā ca mānusā ca devamānusā,
atk-s0511a0:355_20: Buddhoti catusaccadhamme buddho anubuddhoti buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:357_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:358_1: Adhigatavisesehi devamanussehi “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti evaṃ buddhattā ñātattā buddho.
atk-s0511a0:358_6: Kīdisakoti kīdiso kiṃsarikkhako kiṃsadiso kiṃvaṇṇo kiṃsaṇṭhāno dīgho vā rasso vāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:359_0: Naruttamoti narānaṃ naresu vā uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti naruttamo.
atk-s0511a0:359_1: Iddhibalanti ettha ijjhanaṃ iddhi nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena ca iddhi.
atk-s0511a0:359_2: Atha vā ijjhanti tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
atk-s0511a0:361_2: sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti “bahuko homī”ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:361_4: abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati “sataṃ homi,
atk-s0511a0:361_5: sataṃ homī”ti kāmāvacaraparikammacittehi parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya puna āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0511a0:362_0: Tattha pādakajjhānacittaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ parikammacittāni satārammaṇāni vā sahassādīsu aññatarārammaṇāni vā,
atk-s0511a0:362_4: taṃ pana appanācittaṃ viya gotrabhuanantarameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajhānikaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:362_5: So pana pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti.
atk-s0511a0:362_7: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ vā dassetīti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:363_0: “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriya”nti
atk-s0511a0:363_1: iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrasseva abbhantare aññassa manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā
atk-s0511a0:364_0: Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā tena attabhāvena paṭilabhitabbaarahattañāṇānubhāvena nibbatto viseso ñāṇavipphāro iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:364_1: Āyasmato bākulassa ca āyasmato saṃkiccassa ca ñāṇavipphārā iddhi,
atk-s0511a0:365_0: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvena nibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:365_5: sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti tesaṃ vatthūnettha kathetabbāni,
atk-s0511a0:366_1: Idha bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati “paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti appaṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati,
atk-s0511a0:366_2: sace ākaṅkhati “appaṭikkūle paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti paṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati…pe…
atk-s0511a0:366_4: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:367_1: Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccānañca vinipātikānaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:367_3: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0511a0:367_6: Ghosakassa gahapatino sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a0:367_7: Meṇḍakaseṭṭhissa aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ pātubhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a0:368_5: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbatto viseso ‘sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī’ti ayaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a0:368_6: Imissā dasavidhāya iddhiyā balaṃ iddhibalaṃ nāma,
atk-s0511a0:368_7: idaṃ mayhaṃ iddhibalaṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:370_3: Yasmā panete mama ñātakā buddhabalaṃ vā buddhaguṇe vā na jānanti,
atk-s0511a0:370_4: kevalaṃ attano moghajiṇṇabhāvaṃ nissāya mānavasena sabbalokajeṭṭhaseṭṭhaṃ maṃ na vandanti.
atk-s0511a0:370_6: taṃ bhañjitvā vandanatthaṃ buddhabalaṃ dasseyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a0:370_18: Sabbaratanamaṇḍitanti sabbehi ratijananaṭṭhena ratanehi muttā- maṇi- veḷuriya- saṅkha- silā- pavāḷa- rajata- suvaṇṇa-
atk-s0511a0:370_20: lohitaṅkehi dasahi dasahi maṇḍito alaṅkato sabbaratanamaṇḍito,
atk-s0511a0:371_0: Athevaṃ bhagavatā cintitamatte dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsino bhummādayo devā pamuditahadayā sādhukāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:373_0: “Bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā;
atk-s0511a0:374_0: Paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosa”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:376_29: tato akaniṭṭhā devatā saddaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ saddaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:376_30: Asaññino ca arūpāvacarasatte ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbe devamanussanāgādayo pītivasaṃ gatahadayā ukkuṭṭhisaddamakaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a0:377_2: Tena adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva āloko ahosi pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā.
atk-s0511a0:379_0: “Obhāsitā ca pathavī sadevakā, puthū ca lokantarikā asaṃvutā;
atk-s0511a0:380_0: Tamo ca tibbo vihato tadā ahu, disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīra”nti.
atk-s0511a0:381_8: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādīsu vuttā ayaṃ kakkhaḷapathavī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:381_9: “Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā”tiādīsu vuttā sasambhārapathavī,
atk-s0511a0:381_12: sāpi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi saddhiṃ pathavīti sasambhārapathavī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:381_14: Pathavīkasiṇajhānalābhī devaloke nibbatto āgamanavasena “pathavīdevo”ti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0511a0:382_5: tā pana tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekā lokantarikā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:382_6: tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya ekeko lokantarikanirayo,
atk-s0511a0:382_13: Tadāti yadā pana bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthaṃ ālokaṃ phari,
atk-s0511a0:382_14: tadā so tamo tibbo lokantarikāsu ṭhito,
atk-s0511a0:383_3: Paṭiharati sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni cittānīti vā pāṭihīraṃ,
atk-s0511a0:383_4: appasannānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādaṃ paṭiāharatīti vā pāṭihīraṃ.
atk-s0511a0:383_8: Disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīranti ettha devā ca manussā ca lokantarikāsu nibbattasattāpi ca taṃ bhagavato
atk-s0511a0:383_9: pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paramappītisomanassaṃ agamaṃsūti idaṃ vacanaṃ āharitvā attho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a0:384_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ manussalokesuyeva āloko atthi,
atk-s0511a0:384_1: sabbattha tividhepi saṅkhārasattokāsasaṅkhāte loke ālokoyevāti dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:389_0: Adho ca uddhaṃ tiriyañca vitthata”nti. – ayaṃ gāthā vuttā;
atk-s0511a0:390_0: Tattha devāti sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi devā idha saṅgahitā.
atk-s0511a0:390_1: Devā ca gandhabbā ca manussā ca rakkhasā ca devagandhabbamanussarakkhasā.
atk-s0511a0:390_8: Tathā hesa “uḷārāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni khādanti bhuñjantī”tiādīsu madhure dissati.
atk-s0511a0:390_9: “Uḷārāya kho pana bhavaṃ vacchāyano pasaṃsāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0511a0:390_10: “Atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso”tiādīsu vipule.
atk-s0511a0:390_14: Imasmiṃ loke parasmiñcāti imasmiṃ manussaloke ca parasmiṃ devaloke cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:390_21: Andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā vuttappakāraṃ lokañca padesañca ajjhottharitvā ābhā pavattitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:390_22: Atha vā tiriyañca vitthatanti tiriyato vitthataṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:390_23: appamāṇaṃ padesaṃ ābhā pharitvā aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:391_0: Atha bhagavā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu ālokapharaṇaṃ katvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato
atk-s0511a0:391_1: vuṭṭhāya āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhānacittena ākāsamabbhuggantvā tesaṃ ñātīnaṃ sīsesu pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya
atk-s0511a0:392_1: Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihīraṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a0:392_45: channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:393_1: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_3: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_5: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_7: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.
atk-s0511a0:393_9: bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_11: bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_13: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a0:393_15: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā,
atk-s0511a0:394_0: Tassa pana bhagavato tejokasiṇasamāpattivasena uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati.
atk-s0511a0:394_1: Āpokasiṇasamāpattivasena heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatīti puna udakadhārāya pavattaṭṭhānato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a0:394_8: Rasmīsu pana dutiyā dutiyā rasmi purimāya purimāya yamakā viya ekakkhaṇe pavattati.
atk-s0511a0:394_9: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi,
atk-s0511a0:394_10: buddhānaṃ pana bhavaṅgaparivāsassa lahukatāya pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasitāya etā rasmiyo ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti,
atk-s0511a0:395_0: Evaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihīre kayiramāne sakalassāpi dasasahassacakkavāḷassa alaṅkārakaraṇakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:399_0: Tattha sattuttamoti attano sīlādīhi guṇehi sabbesu sattesu uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti sattuttamo,
atk-s0511a0:399_7: Na panesa bhedo aniyamato bahulavacanato ca naruttamapurisuttamanaravarādi-
atk-s0511a0:399_9: Atha vā sattaṃ uttamaṃ yassa so sattuttamo,
atk-s0511a0:399_12: Uttamasattoti visesanassa pubbanipātapāṭhato “cittagū paddhagū”ti ettha viyāti nāyaṃ doso.
atk-s0511a0:399_14: Vināyakoti bahūhi vinayanūpāyehi satte vineti dametīti vināyako.
atk-s0511a0:399_15: Satthāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā.
atk-s0511a0:399_17: Devamanussapūjitoti dibbehi pañcakāmaguṇehi dibbanti kīḷantīti devā.
atk-s0511a0:399_29: Satapuññalakkhaṇoti anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ ettakehi
atk-s0511a0:399_30: janehi katakammaṃ bodhisatto sayameva ekako sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto.
atk-s0511a0:399_32: Keci pana “satena satena puññakammena nibbattaekekalakkhaṇo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0511a0:399_33: “Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyā”ti taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:399_34: Dassesīti sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ ativimhayakaraṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0511a0:400_0: Atha satthā ākāse pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā mahājanassa cittācāraṃ oloketvā tassa ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0511a0:400_1: caṅkamanto kathetukāmo ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0511a0:402_0: “So yācito devavarena cakkhumā, atthaṃ samekkhitvā tadā naruttamo;
atk-s0511a0:404_1: Yācitoti paṭhamameva aṭṭhame sattāhe dhammadesanāya yācitoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:404_16: Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni,
atk-s0511a0:404_24: ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti ettha pubbenivāsādiñāṇaṃ paññācakkhūti āgataṃ.
atk-s0511a0:405_0: Maṃsacakkhu nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti ettha pasādamaṃsacakkhu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:405_3: Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipattakehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā
atk-s0511a0:405_4: sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti.
atk-s0511a0:405_5: Vitthārato pana sambhavamānāni catusamuṭṭhānāni chattiṃsa jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā cattāro cāti sasambhārā honti,
atk-s0511a0:405_7: Yaṃ pana setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhamaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:405_15: Iccevametāni vuttappakārāni cakkhūni assa bhagavato santīti bhagavā cakkhumāti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:405_17: dhammadesanānimittaṃ devamanussānaṃ hitatthaṃ upaparikkhitvā upadhāretvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a0:408_0: “Iddhī ca ādesanānusāsanī, tipāṭihīre bhagavā vasī ahu;
atk-s0511a0:409_0: Caṅkamaṃ māpayi lokanāyako, suniṭṭhitaṃ sabbaratananimmita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:410_1: Taṃ pana ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:410_3: Ādesanāti parassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:413_4: Tatra yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ yathicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ āvajjati āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti sīghaṃ āvajjetuṃ samatthatā āvajjanavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:413_6: samāpajjati samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:413_7: Dīghaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:413_8: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a0:413_9: Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva honti tāni āvajjanānantarāneva hutvā uppajjantīti āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttāni.
atk-s0511a0:413_10: Iti imāsu pañcasu vasīsu ciṇṇavasitā vasī nāma hoti.
atk-s0511a0:417_0: Thambheva dassesi paṭipāṭiyā, caṅkame ratanāmaye”ti. – ādigāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a0:418_2: Thambhevāti thambhe viya dasacakkavāḷasahassesu ye sinerupabbatā,
atk-s0511a0:418_3: te paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite suvaṇṇathambhe viya katvā tesaṃ upari caṅkamaṃ māpetvā dassesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:419_1: Dasasahassī atikkammāti ratanacaṅkamaṃ pana bhagavā māpento tassa ekaṃ koṭiṃ sabbapariyantaṃ pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0511a0:419_2: ekaṃ koṭiṃ pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ katvā māpesi.
atk-s0511a0:422_1: Sabbasoṇṇamayā passeti tassa pana evaṃ nimmitassa caṅkamassa ubhayapassesu suvaṇṇamayā paramaramaṇīyā mariyādabhūmi ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:423_6: Vedikā sabbasovaṇṇāti vedikā pana sabbāpi suvaṇṇamayā,
atk-s0511a0:423_8: sā ekāva aññehi ratanehi asammissāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:423_9: Dubhato passesu nimmitāti ubhosu passesu nimmitā. Da-
atk-s0511a0:424_2: Atha vā maṇayo ca muttā ca vālukā ca maṇimuttāvālukā.
atk-s0511a0:424_7: Obhāseti disā sabbāti sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti pakāseti.
atk-s0511a0:424_10: Yathā pana abbhuggato sahassaraṃsi sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti,
atk-s0511a0:424_11: evameva esopi sabbaratanamayo caṅkamo obhāsetīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:425_0: Idāni pana niṭṭhite caṅkame tattha bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:434_0: Namassamānā nipatanti, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā”ti. – gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a0:435_3: Pārichattakanti devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ koviḷārarukkhassa nissandena samantā yojanasataparimāṇo paramadassanīyo pāricchattakarukkho nibbatti.
atk-s0511a0:435_4: Yasmiṃ pupphite sakalaṃ devanagaraṃ ekasurabhigandhavāsitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:435_5: tassa kusumareṇuokiṇṇāni navakanakavimānāni piñjarāni hutvā khāyanti.
atk-s0511a0:435_6: Imassa pana pāricchattakarukkhassa pupphañca pāricchattakanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:435_8: tena vuttappakārena pupphena tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ pūjentīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:435_11: Taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratanacaṅkamane caṅkamantaṃ sakesu ālayesupi passantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:435_17: Pamoditāti idāni vattabbehi tāvatiṃsādidevehi saddhinti sambandho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a0:435_19: Atha vā pamoditā taṃ bhagavantaṃ passanti,
atk-s0511a0:435_20: tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā tahiṃ tahiṃ sannipatantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:436_0: Idāni ye passiṃsu ye sannipatiṃsu, te sarūpato dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:438_0: “Tāvatiṃsā ca yāmā ca, tusitā cāpi devatā;
atk-s0511a0:449_0: Bhamenti celāni ca ambare tadā, aho jino lokahitānukampako”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:451_4: Nabheva accuggatacandamaṇḍalanti ettha ākāse abhinavoditaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sabbopaddavavinimuttaṃ saradasamaye
atk-s0511a0:451_5: candamaṇḍalaṃ viya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ nayanānandakaraṃ passantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:452_3: tasmā parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhāparittādibhedena tatiyajjhānena nibbattā sabbeva gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:452_8: Cakkhusotānamabhāvato asaññasattā ca arūpino ca idha na uddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0511a0:452_9: Akaniṭṭhā ca devatāti idhāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:452_10: Tasmā avihātappasudassāsudassiakaniṭṭhasaṅkhātā pañcapi suddhāvāsā gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:452_11: Susuddhasukkavatthavasanāti suṭṭhu suddhāni susuddhāni sukkāni odātāni.
atk-s0511a0:452_12: Susuddhāni sukkāni vatthāni nivatthāni ceva pārutāni ca yehi te susuddhasukkavatthavasanā,
atk-s0511a0:452_15: Pañjalīkatāti katapañjalikā kamalamakulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0511a0:453_9: Aho jino lokahitānukampakoti “aho jino lokahito aho ca lokahitānukampako aho kāruṇiko”ti evamādīni thutivacanāni uggirantā.
atk-s0511a0:454_0: Idāni tehi payuttāni thutivacanāni dassetuṃ imā gāthāyo vuttā –
atk-s0511a0:456_0: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketū ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:457_0: Parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0511a0:483_0: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi ḍiṇḍimā bahū;
atk-s0511a0:493_0: Pajā ca vividhā gagane, vattanti pañjalīkatā.
atk-s0511a0:495_0: “Gāyanti seḷenti ca vādayanti ca, bhujāni pothenti ca naccayanti ca;
atk-s0511a0:496_0: Muñcanti pupphaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇikaṃ, mandāravaṃ candanacuṇṇamissitaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:500_1: Ketūti ketuno apacitikātabbaṭṭhena ketu viyāti ketu.
atk-s0511a0:500_2: Dhajoti indadhajo samussayaṭṭhena dassanīyaṭṭhena ca tuvaṃ dhajo viyāti dhajoti.
atk-s0511a0:500_3: Atha vā yathā hi loke yassa kassaci dhajaṃ disvāva –
atk-s0511a0:500_5: evameva bhagavā paññānibbānādhigamāya bhagavantaṃ disvāva nibbānādhigamo paññāyati.
atk-s0511a0:500_8: Kūṭadantasutte vuttānaṃ dānādiāsavakkhayañāṇapariyosānānaṃ sabbayāgānaṃ yajanatthāya samussito yūpo tuvanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:500_10: Patiṭṭhāti yathā mahāpathavī sabbapāṇīnaṃ ādhārabhāvena patiṭṭhā nissayabhūtā,
atk-s0511a0:500_13: Yathā caturaṅge tamasi vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ āropito padīpo rūpasandassano hoti.
atk-s0511a0:500_14: Evaṃ avijjandhakāre vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ paramatthasandassano padīpo tuvanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:500_15: Atha vā mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ sattānaṃ samuddadīpo yathā patiṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:500_16: evaṃ tuvampi saṃsārasāgare alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhe osīdantānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ dīpo viyāti dīpoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:501_1: ettha pana niddhāraṇalakkhaṇassa abhāvato chaṭṭhīsamāsassa paṭisedho natthi,
atk-s0511a0:501_3: Sammāsambuddho pana apadānaṃ dvipadānaṃ catuppadānaṃ bahuppadānaṃ rūpīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ saññīnaṃ asaññīnaṃ nevasaññīnāsaññīnaṃ uttamova.
atk-s0511a0:501_6: Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesupi nuppajjati.
atk-s0511a0:501_10: Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu vase kattuṃ samattho buddho hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0511a0:501_11: Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātu vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0511a0:501_12: So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati.
atk-s0511a0:502_6: Aho acchariyanti ettha andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:502_8: idaṃ vimhaya”nti accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:502_12: Na medisaṃ bhūtapubbanti na mayā īdisaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:503_2: Devatāti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:503_4: pītivasaṃ gatahadayatāya mihitamattaṃ akatvā aṭṭahāsaṃ hasantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:504_2: Tiṇapanthanivāsinoti tiṇaggesu ceva panthesu ca nivāsino.
atk-s0511a0:505_4: Abbhuto vata noti acchariyo vata nu.
atk-s0511a0:505_7: Dhuvanti yasmā pana abbhuto ayaṃ satthā loke uppanno,
atk-s0511a0:505_8: tasmā dhuvaṃ avassaṃ atthasiddhiṃ labhāmāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a0:506_0: Buddhoti tesaṃ sutvānāti buddhoti idaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tesaṃ devānaṃ pañcavaṇṇā pīti udapādīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:506_5: Ukkuṭṭhīti ukkuṭṭhisaddo ca unnādasaddo cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:507_1: Vādayantīti mahatī vipañcikāmakaramukhādayo vīṇā ca turiyāni ca tathāgatassa pūjanatthāya vādenti payojenti.
atk-s0511a0:507_4: Naccanti cāti aññe ca naccāpenti sayañca naccanti.
atk-s0511a0:508_1: pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti ettha yena pakārena yathā.
atk-s0511a0:508_3: Pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti tava ubhosu pādatalesu sahassāraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ cakkalakkhaṇaṃ sobhatīti attho. Cakka-
atk-s0511a0:508_7: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu sampattiyaṃ dissati.
atk-s0511a0:508_20: vaḍḍhamānaṅkusācitanti dhajena ca vajirena ca paṭākāya ca vaḍḍhamānena ca aṅkusena ca ācitaṃ alaṅkataṃ parivāritaṃ pādesu cakkalakkhaṇanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:508_21: Cakkalakkhaṇe pana gahite sesalakkhaṇāni gahitāneva honti.
atk-s0511a0:508_23: Tasmā tehi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhāhi samalaṅkato bhagavato kāyo sabbaphāliphullo
atk-s0511a0:508_24: viya pāricchattako vikasitapadumaṃ viya kamalavanaṃ vividharatanavicittaṃ viya navakanakatoraṇaṃ tārāmarīcivirājitamiva
atk-s0511a0:508_25: gaganatalaṃ ito cito ca vidhāvamānā vipphandamānā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo muñcamāno ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a0:512_0: Vimuttiyā asamasamo, dhammacakkappavattane”ti. – ayaṃ gāthā vuttā;
atk-s0511a0:513_2: “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe dissati.
atk-s0511a0:513_4: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā,
atk-s0511a0:513_6: uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā no arūpā”ti ettha paccaye.
atk-s0511a0:513_7: “Ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre.
atk-s0511a0:513_8: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
atk-s0511a0:513_16: Asamasamoti asamā atītā buddhā tehi asamehi buddhehi sīlādīhi samoti asamasamo.
atk-s0511a0:521_5: taṃ ekassa gaṅgeyyassāti eteneva upāyena yāva chaddantabalaṃ netabbanti.
atk-s0511a0:521_12: ñāṇabalaṃ pana appameyyaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇaṃ catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:521_15: tuyhaṃ pākatikaṃ balanti tañca pana tava kāye pākatikabalanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:522_2: Tattha iddhibalena asamoti vikubbanādhiṭṭhānādinā iddhibalena asamo asadiso anupamo.
atk-s0511a0:523_2: taṃ satthāraṃ namassathā”ti tathāgatassa paṇāmane niyogadassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:527_7: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha paṭalatthe dissati.
atk-s0511a0:527_15: Tasmā sabbehi lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi sabbasampattīhi upetaṃ samannāgatanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:527_16: Sabbaṅgasamupāgatanti sabbehi buddhaguṇehi guṇaṅgehi vā samupāgataṃ samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0511a0:527_17: Mahāmuninti aññehi paccekabuddhādīhi munīhi adhikabhāvato mahanto munīti vuccati mahāmuni.
atk-s0511a0:527_20: sabbalokehi “ayaṃ no dukkhopatāpassa āhantā sametā”ti evamāsīsīyatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:533_0: “Ye keci loke vandaneyyā, vandanaṃ arahanti ye;
atk-s0511a0:534_0: Sabbaseṭṭho mahāvīra, sadiso te na vijjatī”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:535_7: Sabbanti sabbampi taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sakkāravisesaṃ tuvaṃ arahasi yuttoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:535_8: Ye keci loke vandaneyyāti ye keci loke vanditabbā vandanīyā vandanaṃ arahanti.
atk-s0511a0:535_9: Yeti ye pana loke vandanaṃ arahanti.
atk-s0511a0:535_12: tvaṃ mahāvīra sadiso te loke koci na vijjatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:536_0: Atha bhagavati yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tatra caṅkamamāne āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe
atk-s0511a0:536_2: Atha thero bhagavantaṃ olokento addasa kapilapure ākāse ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:540_0: Tattha sāriputtoti rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā puttoti sāriputto.
atk-s0511a0:540_1: Mahāpaññoti mahatiyā soḷasavidhāya paññāya samannāgatoti mahāpañño.
atk-s0511a0:540_2: Samādhijjhānakovidoti ettha samādhīti cittaṃ samaṃ ādahati ārammaṇe ṭhapetīti samādhi.
atk-s0511a0:540_3: So tividho hoti savitakkasavicāro avitakkavicāramatto avitakkaavicāro samādhīti.
atk-s0511a0:540_4: Jhānanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānanti imehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi mettājhānādīnipi saṅgahitāneva honti,
atk-s0511a0:540_7: Paṭhamajjhānādikaṃ pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajhāpanato vā jhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:540_8: Samādhīsu ca jhānesu ca kovidoti samādhijjhānakovido,
atk-s0511a0:540_10: Gijjhakūṭeti evaṃnāmake pabbate ṭhitoyeva passatīti passi.
atk-s0511a0:541_2: sālarājaṃ viya sīlamūlaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paññāsākhaṃ abhiññāpupphaṃ vimuttiphalaṃ dasabalasālarājaṃ
atk-s0511a0:541_4: Candaṃva gagane yathāti abbhāhimadhūmarajorāhupasaggavinimuttaṃ tāragaṇaparivutaṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:541_8: Majjhanhikeva sūriyanti majjhanhikasamaye siriyā paṭutarakiraṇamālinaṃ aṃsumālinamiva virocamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:542_2: saradasamayaṃ paripuṇṇacandasassirikacāruvadanasobhaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatavarasarīraṃ paramāya buddhasiriyā virocamānanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:542_6: Sūriyassa taruṇabhāvo pana udayaṃ paṭicca vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:542_7: Na hi candassa viya hānivuddhiyo atthi.
atk-s0511a0:542_9: Dhīraṃ passati lokanāyakanti sabbalokekadhīraṃ passati nāyakanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:543_1: paramaruciracittakūṭe gijjhakūṭe pabbate ṭhatvāva dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgatehi devabrahmagaṇehi
atk-s0511a0:543_2: parivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ anuttarāya buddhasiriyā anopamāya buddhalīḷāya sabbaratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:543_3: “handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaparidīpanaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ yāceyya”nti cintetvā attanā
atk-s0511a0:547_2: Katakiccānanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena pariniṭṭhitasoḷasakiccānanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:548_0: Idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāte gamane ca kāraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:551_0: Amhepi tattha gantvāna, vandissāma mayaṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:554_0: Kaṅkhaṃ vinodayissāma, passitvā lokanāyaka”nti. – imā gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a0:555_0: Tattha lokappasādanaṃ nāmāti lokassa pasādakaraṇato lokappasādanaṃ pāṭihīraṃ vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:555_3: Taṃ pana uddhaṃ akaniṭṭhabhavanato heṭṭhā yāva avīci etthantare ekālokaṃ katvā etthantare sabbesampi
atk-s0511a0:555_9: Vandissāmāti mayaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandissāma.
atk-s0511a0:555_11: mayanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ purimassa gamanakiriyāya sambandho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a0:556_2: khīṇāsavānaṃ pana kaṅkhā nāma kācipi natthi,
atk-s0511a0:557_1: Cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā vicikicchāsahagato cittuppādo apāyagamanīyo lobho doso moho māno tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:559_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū therassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano attano pattacīvaramādāya suvammitā viya mahānāgā pabhinnakilesā
atk-s0511a0:563_6: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0511a0:566_2: Tasmā sādhu suṭṭhūti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:567_1: Idāni dhammasenāpatissa pavattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi “khīṇāsavehi vimalehī”tiādigāthāyo vuttā tattha dantehīti kāyena ca cittena ca dantehi.
atk-s0511a0:567_5: Mahāgaṇīti sīlādīhi ca saṅkhyāvasena ca mahanto gaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī,
atk-s0511a0:567_6: nānāpadavasena vā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto gaṇoti mahāgaṇo,
atk-s0511a0:567_8: Laḷanto devova gaganeti iddhivilāsena vilāsento devo viya gaganatale bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:568_1: Idāni “te itthambhūtā upasaṅkamiṃsū”ti upasaṅkamavidhānadassanatthaṃ “ukkāsitañca khipita”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:569_1: Sayambhunti sayameva aññāpadesaṃ vinā pāramiyo pūretvā adhigatabuddhabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:569_4: nabhe jalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gagane candaṃ viya passantīti evaṃ padasambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:570_2: Yadi ciraṭṭhitikā acirappabhā assa tādisanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:571_1: Rahadamiva vippasannanti atigambhīravitthataṃ mahārahadaṃ viya anāvilaṃ vippasannaṃ salilaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:571_2: Suphullaṃ padumaṃ yathāti suvikasitapadumavanaṃ rahadamivāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:572_1: Atha te bhikkhū dhammasenāpatippamukhā añjaliṃ sirasi katvā dasabalassa cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu nipatiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a0:572_7: Cakkalakkhaṇeti cakkaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yasmiṃ pāde so pādo cakkalakkhaṇo,
atk-s0511a0:573_1: Idāni tesaṃ kesañci therānaṃ nāmaṃ dassentehi “sāriputto mahāpañño,
atk-s0511a0:574_2: Kālamegho vāti nīlasaliladharo viya gajjitā iddhivisayeti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a0:575_1: Mahākassapopi cāti uruvelakassapanadīkassapagayākassapakumārakassape khuddānukhuddake there upādāya ayaṃ mahā,
atk-s0511a0:575_5: Dhutaguṇeti ettha kilesadhunanato dhammo dhuto nāma,
atk-s0511a0:575_12: idamaṭṭhikatāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārabhūtā pañca dhammā “appicchaṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma.
atk-s0511a0:575_13: Atha vā kilese dhunanato ñāṇaṃ dhutaṃ nāma,
atk-s0511a0:575_18: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:575_24: āvarāmi dāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0511a0:575_29: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0511a0:575_35: Thero attano ṭhāne seṭṭho ceva koṭibhūto ca.
atk-s0511a0:575_42: candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādīhi anekehi suttanayehi vaṇṇito pasattho,
atk-s0511a0:576_1: Dibbacakkhūnanti dibbaṃ cakkhu yesaṃ atthi te dibbacakkhū,
atk-s0511a0:576_2: tesaṃ dibbacakkhūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo seṭṭhoti attho. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:576_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti.
atk-s0511a0:576_6: Anuruddhatthero bhagavato cūḷapituno amitodanassa nāma sakkassa putto mahānāmassa kaniṭṭhabhātā mahāpuñño paramasukhumālo,
atk-s0511a0:576_7: so attasattamo nikkhamitvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-s0511a0:577_15: Thero kira tathāgatasseva santike vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhitvā bhārukacchakavatthuṃ,
atk-s0511a0:577_17: kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:577_18: Tasmā thero vinayadharānaṃ aggoti evamādinā nayena satthārā vaṇṇitoti vutto.
atk-s0511a0:578_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti etadaggapāḷiyaṃ āropito.
atk-s0511a0:578_9: Therassa kira santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:578_10: Sabbepi te dasabalassa jātabhūmikā jātaraṭṭhavāsino sabbeva khīṇāsavā sabbeva dasakathāvatthulābhino.
atk-s0511a0:578_12: Isīti esati gavesati kusale dhammeti isi.
atk-s0511a0:578_13: Mantāṇiyā puttoti mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto.
atk-s0511a0:579_0: Aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero pana satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena āgantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-s0511a0:579_1: upanissāya viharante kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pabbājetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a0:579_2: vanditvā āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya sayaṃ chaddantadahaṃ gato.
atk-s0511a0:579_3: Puṇṇo pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya therena saddhiṃ āgantvā –
atk-s0511a0:579_4: “mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti kapilapureyeva ohīno,
atk-s0511a0:579_5: so yonisomanasikāraṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a0:579_6: Ettha pana anuruddhatthero ca upālitthero ca ime dve therā bhagavato kapilavatthupuraṃ pavisitvā ñātisamāgamadivase pabbajitā viya dassitā,
atk-s0511a0:579_7: taṃ pana khandhakapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti.
atk-s0511a0:580_0: Atha satthā sāriputtattherādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ cittācāramaññāya attano guṇe kathetumārabhi.
atk-s0511a0:584_0: Tattha opammakusaloti upamāya kusalo. Kaṅkhacchedoti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsayacchedako.
atk-s0511a0:585_0: Idāni te attano guṇe kathesi, te dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:587_0: “Cattāro te asaṅkhyeyyā, koṭi yesaṃ na nāyati;
atk-s0511a0:589_0: Buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:590_7: Idāni te vuttappakāre cattāro asaṅkhyeyye dassetuṃ “sattakāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:590_13: Na sakkā ete vijānitunti yasmā panete anantā,
atk-s0511a0:591_1: Idāni satthā attano iddhivikubbane sañjātacchariyabbhutānaṃ devamanussādīnaṃ kinnāmetaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:593_0: Aññe bahū acchariyā, abbhutā lomahaṃsanā”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a0:594_0: Tattha kinti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ.Etanti idaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0511a0:594_3: aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī”tiādīsu upayogavacane dissati.
atk-s0511a0:594_7: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti ettha kāraṇavacane.
atk-s0511a0:594_8: “Yaṃ vipassī bhagavā kappe udapādī”ti ettha bhumme.
atk-s0511a0:594_10: devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:594_13: Aññe bahū mama acchariyā abbhutavisesā santīti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a0:598_0: Dasasahassī samāgamma, yācanti pañjalī mama”nti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a0:599_3: Yadā panāhaṃ samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāge pariccajitvā ñātatthacariyalokatthacariyabuddhatthacariyānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:599_4: koṭiṃ patvā sattasatakamahādānāni datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā
atk-s0511a0:599_5: dutiye cittavāre tusitabhavane nibbatto tadāpi santusito nāma devarājā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:599_6: Dasasahassī samāgammāti dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:599_8: tayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena na sakkasampattiṃ na māra na brahma na cakkavattisampattiṃ patthentena pūritā,
atk-s0511a0:603_5: Tārayantoti ettha pāramiyo pūrentopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a0:603_7: vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikāni sattapaṇṇāsavassakoṭiyo tattha tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a0:603_8: devatāhi yācito pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi dasamāse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a0:603_9: ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma.
atk-s0511a0:603_10: Rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha nikkhamantopi tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre pabbajantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a0:603_11: chabbassāni padhānaṃ karontopi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0511a0:603_12: pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0511a0:603_13: anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a0:605_0: Atha mahāsatto devatāhi yāciyamānopi devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi.
atk-s0511a0:605_3: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:605_5: buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā nāma natthi,
atk-s0511a0:605_6: tesaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti kathentānaṃ “kinnāmete kathentī”ti na saddahanti,
atk-s0511a0:605_10: Vassasatato ūno āyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:605_12: ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a0:605_14: Vassasatasahassato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma.
atk-s0511a0:605_15: Idāni vassasatāyukā manussāti atha bodhisatto “nibbattitabbakālo”ti addasa.
atk-s0511a0:606_0: Tato dīpaṃ olokento “jambudīpeyeva buddhā nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a0:606_2: katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a0:606_3: Tato kulaṃ vilokento “buddhā nāma lokasammate kule nibbattanti,
atk-s0511a0:606_6: suddhodano nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a0:606_7: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti,
atk-s0511a0:606_8: akhaṇḍapañcasīlāti ayañca mahāmāyā nāma devī edisā,
atk-s0511a0:606_9: ayaṃ me mātā bhavissatīti kittakaṃ assā āyū”ti āvajjento dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari sattadivasāni passi.
atk-s0511a0:606_10: Iti imaṃ pañcavidhavilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me, mārisa,
atk-s0511a0:606_11: buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā sakyarājakule māyādeviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:610_3: kampitthāti sato sampajāno pana bodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkamanto ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu mettāpubbabhāgassa
atk-s0511a0:610_6: Tadā dasasahassīlokadhātu sakalāpi kampi saṅkampi sampakampīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:610_7: Dharaṇīti dhāreti sabbe thāvarajaṅgameti dharaṇī, pathavī.
atk-s0511a0:611_1: Sampajānova nikkhaminti ettha yadā panāhaṃ sato sampajānova mātukucchito dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko
atk-s0511a0:611_2: viya nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena
atk-s0511a0:611_7: okkamanepi mātukucchito nikkhamanepi dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:612_1: Atha bhagavā gabbhokkantiādīsu attanā samasamaṃ adisvā gabbhokkantiādīsu attano acchariyadassanatthaṃ “okkanti me samo natthī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0511a0:612_7: Jātitoti ettha jāyati etāya mātuyāti mātā “jātī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0511a0:612_9: Abhinikkhameti mātukucchito abhinikkhamane pasave satīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:612_10: Sambodhiyanti ettha pasatthā sundarā bodhi sambodhi.
atk-s0511a0:612_14: “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:612_15: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-s0511a0:613_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā sambodhiṃ paṭicca attānaṃ pasaṃsatīti?
atk-s0511a0:613_2: Bhagavato hi sambodhi sabbaguṇadāyikā sabbepi niravasese buddhaguṇe dadāti,
atk-s0511a0:613_4: Aññesaṃ pana kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti,
atk-s0511a0:613_11: Tasmā bhagavā sabbaguṇadāyakattā “sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho”ti attānaṃ pasaṃsati.
atk-s0511a0:613_12: Api ca bhūmiṃ cāletvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0511a0:613_14: Dhammacakkappavattaneti ettha dhammacakkaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti –
atk-s0511a0:614_1: Idāni bhagavato gabbhokkamaneva pathavikampanādikaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “aho acchariyaṃ loke”ti devatāhi ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0511a0:614_2: Tattha buddhānaṃ guṇamahantatāti aho buddhānaṃ guṇamahantabhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:614_4: chappakāraṃ pakampathāti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahāpathavī chappakāraṃ pakampittha calittha. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0511a0:614_10: pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti evaṃ chappakāraṃ anilabalacalitajalataraṅgabhaṅgasaṅghaṭṭitā
atk-s0511a0:614_11: viya nāvā catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā pathavisandhārakajalapariyantā acetanāpi samānā sacetanā
atk-s0511a0:614_12: viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī pītiyā naccantī viya akampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:614_13: Obhāso ca mahā āsīti atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ uḷāro obhāso ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:614_14: Accheraṃ lomahaṃsananti accherañca lomahaṃsanañca ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:615_1: Idāni pathavikampanālokapātubhāvādīsu acchariyesu vattamānesu bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ “bhagavā tamhi samaye”tiādigāthāyo vuttā.
atk-s0511a0:616_1: Caṅkamantovāti dasalokadhātusahassāni ajjhottharitvā ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānova kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:616_2: Lokanāyakoti atha satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto sīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0511a0:616_3: otārento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena nānānayavicittaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0511a0:617_1: catuhatthe caṅkame yathāti ettha satthārā pana nimmitassa tassa caṅkamassa ekā koṭi pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0511a0:617_2: ekā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ evaṃ ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamāno satthā ubho koṭiyo patvāva
atk-s0511a0:617_4: antarā ubho koṭiyo apatvā na nivattati.
atk-s0511a0:617_5: Yathā catuhatthappamāṇe caṅkame caṅkamamāno ubho koṭiyo sīghameva patvā nivattati,
atk-s0511a0:617_7: Kiṃ pana bhagavā dasasahassayojanappamāṇāyāmaṃ caṅkamaṃ rassamakāsi,
atk-s0511a0:617_16: Yathā sabbe devamanussā pakatiyā caṅkamamānaṃ passanti,
atk-s0511a0:617_18: Bhagavā pana caṅkamantova dhammaṃ deseti antarāsamāpattiñca samāpajjati.
atk-s0511a0:618_1: varasarīraṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ viya rajanikaraṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya ca yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ
atk-s0511a0:618_2: aṭṭhārasaratanubbedhaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepasassirikaṃ varakanakagirimiva jaṅgamaṃ anopamāya buddhalīḷāya
atk-s0511a0:618_3: anopamena buddhasirivilāsena caṅkamantaṃ dasasahassidevagaṇaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a0:618_4: Disvāna ayaṃ pana sakalāpi dasasahassī lokadhātu sannipatitā,
atk-s0511a0:618_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ dasabalassa abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ paripuccheyya”nti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0511a0:618_8: katvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasanakhasamujjalaṃ jalajāmalāvikala- kamala-
atk-s0511a0:618_9: makulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ “kīdiso te mahāvīrā”tiādikaṃ paripucchi.
atk-s0511a0:624_0: Kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:625_5: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0511a0:625_7: orimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīra”nti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena pucchānusandhi veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:626_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘iti kira, bho,
atk-s0511a0:626_7: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0511a0:626_10: yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya ‘iti kira, bho,
atk-s0511a0:626_19: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttavasena ajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:627_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0511a0:627_1: tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭikkhepavasena vā yesu suttesu uparidesanā āgacchati,
atk-s0511a0:628_0: Tattha paññāya pāramippattoti sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0511a0:628_9: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca kappasatasahassopacitapuññasambhārānaṃ sesamahāsāvakānaṃ vā avisayo,
atk-s0511a0:629_3: Abhinīhāroti abhinīhāro nāma buddhabhāvatthaṃ mānasaṃ bandhitvā “buddhabyākaraṇaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyamadhiṭṭhāya nipajjanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:631_2: “buddho bodheyyaṃ mutto moceyya”ntiādinā nayena buddhabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ kadā katanti apucchi.
atk-s0511a0:638_0: Kathaṃ upapāramī puṇṇā, paramatthapāramī katha”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a0:639_0: Tattha dānapāramiyaṃ tāva bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo pāramī nāma,
atk-s0511a0:639_4: Evaṃ dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo honti.
atk-s0511a0:639_5: Tattha bodhisattassa dānapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:641_0: Dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:642_0: Evaṃ paraṃ jīvitapariccāgaṃ karontassa dānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:643_0: Tathā sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekanteneva panassa saṅkhapālajātake –
atk-s0511a0:645_0: Bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:646_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa sīlapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:647_0: Tathā mahārajjaṃ pahāya nekkhammapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:649_0: Cajato na hoti lagganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:650_0: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:651_0: Tathā mahosadhapaṇḍitakālādīsu paññāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:653_0: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:654_0: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:655_0: Tathā vīriyapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa mahājanakajātake –
atk-s0511a0:657_0: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:658_0: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa vīriyapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:661_0: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:662_0: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa khantipāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:665_0: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
