atk-s0511a0:666_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa saccapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:668_0: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo;
atk-s0511a0:669_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahi”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:670_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:672_0: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napi bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0511a0:674_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a0:678_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa
atk-s0511a0:679_0: Idāni therena puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a0:685_0: Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pakāsayī lokahitaṃ sadevake”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:686_0: Tattha tassa puṭṭho viyākāsīti tena dhammasenāpatinā puṭṭho hutvā tassa byākāsi,
atk-s0511a0:686_1: attano abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya abhisambodhipariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:686_2: Karavīkamadhuragiroti karavīkasakuṇassa viya madhurā girā yassa so karavīkamadhuragiro,
atk-s0511a0:686_5: karavīkasakuṇā kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitaṃ phalarasaṃ pivitvā pakkhena
atk-s0511a0:686_6: tāḷaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā madamattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti,
atk-s0511a0:686_7: gocarapasutāpi catuppadagaṇā mukhagatānipi tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ nādaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0511a0:686_8: vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvā cittakatā viya tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0511a0:686_10: ākāse pakkhandantā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0511a0:686_11: udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ acālentā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0511a0:686_13: Nibbāpayanto hadayanti kilesaggisantattasabbajanamānasaṃ dhammakathāmatadhārāya sītibhāvaṃ janayantoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:687_1: Amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa purato pana taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:687_2: Tesaṃ aparabhāge koṇḍaññādayo tevīsati buddhāti sabbe dīpaṅkarādayo catuvīsati buddhā idha “atītabuddhā”ti adhippetā,
atk-s0511a0:687_8: Buddhaparamparāgatanti dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva kassapaparamparato āgataṃ desitaṃ nikīlitaṃ vāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:687_9: Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyāti ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ vibhattaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0511a0:687_10: pubbenivāsaṃ anugatā upagatā tāya pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā,
atk-s0511a0:688_1: Atha bhagavā karuṇāsītalena hadayena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ savane niyojento “pītipāmojjajanana”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0511a0:688_2: Tattha pītipāmojjajanananti pītipāmojjakaraṃ pītiyā pubbabhāgaṃ pāmojjaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:688_5: Sabbasampattipaṭilābhanti sabbāpi devamanussasampattiādayo sampattiyo paṭilabhanti etenāti sabbasampattipaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a0:689_2: Sokanudanti soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo.
atk-s0511a0:690_13: na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitaṃ yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu dukkhaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0511a0:690_14: Idha panāyaṃ dukkhavatthusmiṃ dukkhapaccayepi ca daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:690_17: kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggoti buddhavaṃsadesanā vuccati,
atk-s0511a0:690_23: Atha vā pītipāmojjajananaṃ sokasallavinodanaṃ sabbasampattipaṭilābhahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:690_24: sutvā idāni madanimmadanādiguṇavisesāvahaṃ sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ buddhabhāvamaggaṃ paṭipajjathāti sabbesaṃ
atk-s0511a0:699_1: Sā panesā buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:699_3: Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti.
atk-s0511a0:699_4: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayena kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:700_0: Yāni vā pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā,
atk-s0511a0:700_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ bujjhanakabhāvañca oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni.
atk-s0511a0:701_0: Bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0511a0:701_1: Evaṃ puṭṭhena pana bhagavatā yāni kathitāni devatāsaṃyutta bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni tesaṃ pucchāvasiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a0:702_0: Yāni vā pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca desitāni dhammadāyāda-
atk-s0511a0:702_3: Evametesu catūsu suttanikkhepesu imassa buddhavaṃsassa pucchāvasiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a0:707_0: Tattha kappe ca satasahasseti ettha kappa-
atk-s0511a0:707_3: Yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu abhisaddahane dissati.
atk-s0511a0:707_6: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāre.
atk-s0511a0:707_10: tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassā”ti ca evamādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:707_21: mayaṃ sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”ti ettha paṭibhāge.
atk-s0511a0:707_25: Tasmā kappe ca satasahasseti mahākappānaṃ satasahassānanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:707_26: Caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti “catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake”ti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:707_28: Amaraṃ nāma nagaranti “amara”nti ca “amaravatī”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:707_29: Keci panettha aññenāpi pakārena vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi,
atk-s0511a0:707_37: ca samiddhattā devamanussādīnaṃ mano ramayatīti manoramaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:708_0: Dasahi saddehi avivittanti hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena saṅkhasaddena mudiṅgasaddena
atk-s0511a0:708_1: vīṇāsaddena gītasaddena sammatāḷasaddena “bhuñjatha pivatha khādathā”ti dasamena saddenāti;
atk-s0511a0:708_4: Annapānasamāyutanti annena catubbidhenāhārena ca pānena ca suṭṭhu āyutaṃ annapānasamāyutaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:709_0: Idāni te dasa sadde vatthuto dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:711_0: Khādatha pivatha ceva, annapānena ghosita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:712_3: Bherisaṅkharathāni cāti bherisaddena ca saṅkhasaddena ca rathasaddena cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:712_5: ‘khādatha pivathā’ti evamādinayappavattena annapānapaṭisaṃyuttena ghositaṃ abhināditanti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0511a0:712_8: Na ekadeso sakalo dasavidho dassitova. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0511a0:713_0: Evaṃ ekena pariyāyena nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā puna tameva dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:717_8: Devanagaraṃ vāti devanagaraṃ viya ālakamandā viya amaravatī samiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a0:717_9: Āvāsaṃ puññakamminanti āvasanti ettha puññakammino janāti āvāso.
atk-s0511a0:717_14: Sabbakusalamalarajāpavāhakattā puññaṃ kammaṃ yesaṃ atthi te puññakammino,
atk-s0511a0:718_0: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
atk-s0511a0:718_1: saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-s0511a0:718_2: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato,
atk-s0511a0:718_3: so tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo anavayo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu.
atk-s0511a0:718_5: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādivividharatanabharite gabbhe vivaritvā –
atk-s0511a0:718_9: etthakaṃ ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā –
atk-s0511a0:718_11: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā puññāni karonto agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a0:724_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0511a0:725_2: Sā tassa sundarā pasatthāti sumedhoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0511a0:726_5: ‘ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā’ tveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:726_7: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsavacanaṃ katvā voharanti.
atk-s0511a0:726_18: Pāragūti tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ oṭṭhapahatakaraṇamattena pāraṃ gatoti pāragū.
atk-s0511a0:727_0: Athekadivasaṃ so dasaguṇagaṇārādhitapaṇḍito sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:727_7: evaṃbhūtena mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sivaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0511a0:727_8: avassaṃ bhavacārakato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0511a0:730_0: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:738_0: “Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-s0511a0:740_0: Ettha pana gāthāsambandhañca anuttānapadānamatthañca vatvāva gamissāma.
atk-s0511a0:740_6: “Evaṃ cintesaha”nti bhagavā iminā attanā saddhiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ ekattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0511a0:740_7: Tasmā tadā so sumedho ahamevāti pakāsento “evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā”ti bhagavā uttamapurisavasenāha.
atk-s0511a0:741_10: Na so sakkā na hetuyeti tena maggena na sakkā na bhavituṃ.
atk-s0511a0:741_11: So pana maggo hetuyeti hetubhāvāya na na hoti,
atk-s0511a0:742_1: Yathā hi loke dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0511a0:742_2: evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:742_3: yathā ca uṇhe sati tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītalampi atthi,
atk-s0511a0:742_5: Yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi atthiyeva,
atk-s0511a0:742_6: evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikhepanato ajātisaṅkhātena nibbānenāpi bhavitabbamevāti.
atk-s0511a0:752_6: Tividhaggi vijjanteti tividhe rāgādike aggimhi vijjamāneti attho.
atk-s0511a0:752_7: Nibbānanti tassa tividhassa rāgādiaggissa nibbāpanaṃ upasamanaṃ nibbānañca icchitabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:753_1: “yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūratova kamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ vimalasalilaṃ taḷākaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:753_2: ‘katarena nu kho maggena tattha gantabba’nti taḷākaṃ gavesituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:753_6: Evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahātaḷāke vijjamāne yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:753_9: Yathā pana corehi saṃparivārito puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace so na palāyati,
atk-s0511a0:753_12: Evameva kilesacorehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa vijjamāneyeva nibbānamahānagaragāmimhi sive mahāmagge
atk-s0511a0:753_13: tassa maggassa agavesanaṃ nāma na maggassa doso,
atk-s0511a0:753_15: Yathā byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā taṃ byādhiṃ na tikicchāpeti,
atk-s0511a0:753_18: Evameva pana yo kilesabyādhiparipīḷito kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati,
atk-s0511a0:756_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-s0511a0:759_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-s0511a0:762_0: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-s0511a0:765_0: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-s0511a0:768_0: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-s0511a0:771_0: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake”ti.
atk-s0511a0:772_12: So purisoti so corehi pariruddho puriso.
atk-s0511a0:774_0: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:775_6: Na doso so tikicchaketi tikicchakassa doso natthi,
atk-s0511a0:776_0: Evaṃ panāhaṃ cintetvā uttarimpi evaṃ cintesiṃ –
atk-s0511a0:776_1: “yathāpi maṇḍanakajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī gaccheyya,
atk-s0511a0:776_2: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:776_3: Yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya dasante vā veṭhetvā ādāya gacchanti,
atk-s0511a0:776_4: atha kho jigucchamānā oloketumpi anicchantā anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0511a0:776_5: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0511a0:776_6: Yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ nāvaṃ udakagāhiniṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhāva gacchanti,
atk-s0511a0:776_7: evamahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisissāmi.
atk-s0511a0:776_8: Yathā ca koci puriso muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādīni nānāvidhāni ratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a0:776_9: attano ratanavināsabhayena te core chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0511a0:776_13: tasmā mayā imaṃ mahācorasadisaṃ karajakāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:788_0: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:801_0: Tattha yathāpi kuṇapaṃ purisoti yathāpi daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko puriso ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena
atk-s0511a0:801_1: vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyitvā harāyitvā jigucchitvā taṃ kuṇapaṃ mocetvā gaccheyya.
atk-s0511a0:802_0: Uccāraṭṭhānamhīti uccārenti vaccaṃ karonti etthāti uccāro,
atk-s0511a0:802_1: uccāro ca so ṭhānaṃ ceti uccāraṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:802_7: Vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭinti vaccaṃ katvā kuṭiṃ naranāriyo viyāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:803_5: Navacchiddanti cakkhusotādīhi navahi vaṇamukhehi chiddāvacchiddehi yuttattā navacchiddaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:804_1: Bhaṇḍacchedabhayaṃ disvāti bhaṇḍassa acchindanena bhayaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:804_2: Evamevāti so bhaṇḍamādāya gacchanto puriso viya.
atk-s0511a0:804_3: Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ pana kucchitānaṃ paramajegucchānaṃ āyoti kāyo.
atk-s0511a0:804_8: Mahācorasamo viyāti cakkhuādīhi rūpādīsu piyarūpesu sārajjanādivasena pāṇātipātādinnādānādicoro hutvā sabbakusalaṃ vilumpatīti mahācorasamo.
atk-s0511a0:804_9: Tasmā yathā so ratanabhaṇḍamādāya corehi saddhiṃ gacchanto puriso te core pahāya gacchati,
atk-s0511a0:804_10: evamevāhampi imaṃ mahācorasamaṃ kāyaṃ pahāya attano sotthibhāvakaraṃ maggaṃ gavesituṃ gamissāmīti atthasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0511a0:805_0: Athevaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi nekkhammakāraṇaṃ cintetvā punapi cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:805_1: “imaṃ mahādhanarāsiṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-s0511a0:805_2: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi – “ahaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0511a0:806_0: So ca “sādhu devā”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pahāya
atk-s0511a0:806_1: amaravaranagarasadisato amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova nānāmigagaṇavante himavante dhammikaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a0:806_2: pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcadosavivajjitaṃ caṅkamaṃ māpetvā aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ
atk-s0511a0:806_3: abhiññābalaṃ samāharituṃ navadosasamannāgataṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇamupāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:806_4: Evaṃ pana so pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0511a0:806_5: sabbadhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavasena padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-s0511a0:806_6: aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ lābhī ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:828_2: Nāthānāthānanti sanāthānamanāthānañca aḍḍhānañceva daliddānañca “atthikā gaṇhantū”ti saha koṭṭhāgārehi datvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:828_6: Yebhuyyena pana bodhisattā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ pabbataṃ upanissāya abhiññāyo nibbattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:828_8: Assamo sukato mayhantiādinā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālā caṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā,
atk-s0511a0:828_10: kintu sakkena devena pesite vissakammunā devaputtena nimmitā.
atk-s0511a0:828_11: Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nibbattaṃ taṃ sampadaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0511a0:831_9: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dīghato saṭṭhiratano vitthārato diyaḍḍharatano caṅkamo vutto.
atk-s0511a0:831_10: Atha vā pañcadosavivajjitanti pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ parihīnaṃ abhiññābalamāharinti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:831_11: Aṭṭhaguṇasamupetanti “evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye
atk-s0511a0:831_12: ṭhite āneñjappatte”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhaguṇehi samannāgataṃ abhiññābalaṃ āhariṃ ānesinti attho.
atk-s0511a0:832_4: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanadhaññādīsu gaṇhantesu rājapurisesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:832_8: catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti imehi aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ assamaṃ māpesi”nti assamena sambandhaṃ katvā vadanti,
atk-s0511a0:833_4: tattha vasanto attano nivatthapārutaṃ mahagghasāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ pariccajiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:833_5: Sāṭakaṃ pajahanto ca tattha nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a0:833_6: Tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā pakāsitā.
atk-s0511a0:833_11: kiliṭṭho ca dhovitabbo puna rajitabbo ca hoti paribhogena jīraṇabhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:833_12: jiṇṇassa puna tunnakaraṇaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti puna pariyesanāya durabhisambhavabhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:833_17: gahetvā carantassa mahicchabhāvoti etehi navahi dosehi upagataṃ sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a0:833_18: Vākacīranti muñjatiṇaṃ hīrāhīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākamayacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-s0511a0:833_21: saddo ānisaṃsaṭṭho “sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”tiādīsu viya. Ma-
atk-s0511a0:833_33: vākacīre naṭṭhepi anapekkhabhāvoti imehi dvādasahi guṇehi sampannaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:834_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito tattha paṇṇasālāyaṃ viharanto paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya attano nikkhamanakāraṇaṃ paccavekkhamāno evaṃ kira cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:834_4: idha pana me paṇṇasālāya vāso dutiyo gharāvāso viya hoti,
atk-s0511a0:837_0: Tattha aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇanti aṭṭhahi dosehi samākiṇṇaṃ saṃyuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:837_4: senāsanaṃ nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇātīti avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti vuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:837_6: gharaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahapaṭicchādanakaraṇabhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:837_9: ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvoti iti ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:838_0: Guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:838_7: tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti pāpakaraṇārahābhāvo,
atk-s0511a0:838_12: rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya anapekkhabhāvoti iti ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati. Āha ca –
atk-s0511a0:847_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito paṇṇasālāya diṭṭhadoso hutvā rukkhamūlasenāsane laddhānisaṃso viharanto uttaripi cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:847_2: nāhaṃ kenaci pārijuññena nikkhamitvā āhāratthāya pabbajito,
atk-s0511a0:850_3: taṃ duvidhampi attano appicchatāya pahāya pavattaphalena yāpesiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:855_0: Evaṃ pavattamāno sumedhapaṇḍito nacirasseva antosattāhe aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:855_6: Nissajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameti nisajjāya ca ṭhānena ca caṅkamena ca.
atk-s0511a0:856_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito pana seyyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameheva rattindivaṃ vītināmetvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññābalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:856_1: Evaṃ pana abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase samāpattisukhena vītināmente tadā sabbajanasaṅgahakaro mārabalabhayaṃkaro
atk-s0511a0:856_2: ñāṇadīpaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:857_1: ayaṃ kira dīpaṅkaro nāma mahāsatto samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhito
atk-s0511a0:857_2: pathavikampanādīni mahādānāni datvā āyupariyosāne tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi
atk-s0511a0:860_0: Vutte tato so devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ca pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto rammavatīnagare attano
atk-s0511a0:860_1: yasavibhūtiyā vijitavāsudevassa naradevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule sumedhāya deviyā kucchismiṃ āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā
atk-s0511a0:860_2: uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mahatā parivārena parihariyamāno mahādeviyā kucchimhi maṇikūṭagato
atk-s0511a0:860_3: viya kenaci asucinā amakkhito dasa māse vasitvā saliladharavivaragato saradakālacando viya tassā udarato nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:862_0: Tassa pana dīpaṅkarakumārassa paṭisandhikkhaṇepi vijātakkhaṇepi dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni pāṭihāriyāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:862_1: Sabbasabbaññubodhisattesu mātukucchiṃ okkamantesu nikkhamantesu sambujjhantesu dhammacakkaṃ pavattantesūti
atk-s0511a0:862_2: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni pavattanteva.
atk-s0511a0:862_3: Tasmā mayā pākaṭattā dīpaṅkarakumārassa jātiyaṃ dassitāni –
atk-s0511a0:864_0: Pakampi saṅkampi tadā samantā, sahassasaṅkhyā dasalokadhātu.
atk-s0511a0:868_0: Paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhiṃsu, pacchā taṃ manujā pana.
atk-s0511a0:869_0: “Avāditā kenaci cammanaddhā, supokkharā dundubhiyo ca vīṇā;
atk-s0511a0:870_0: Aghaṭṭitānābharaṇāni tasmiṃ, khaṇe samantā madhuraṃ raviṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:871_0: “Chijjiṃsu sabbattha ca bandhanāni, sayaṃ vigacchiṃsu ca sabbarogā;
atk-s0511a0:872_0: Rūpāni passiṃsu ca jātiandhā, saddaṃ samantā badhirā suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:873_0: “Anussatiṃ jātijaḷā manussā, labhiṃsu yānaṃ padasāva paṅgulā;
atk-s0511a0:875_0: “Ākāsaṭṭhaṃ bhūmigatañca sabbaṃ, sayaṃ samantā ratanaṃ viroci;
atk-s0511a0:876_0: Nibbāyi ghore niraye hutāso, nadīsu toyampi ca nappavatti.
atk-s0511a0:879_0: “Na vāyi vāto pharuso kharo vā, samphullapupphā taravo ahesuṃ;
atk-s0511a0:880_0: Viroci cando adhikaṃ satāro, na cāpi uṇho sūriyo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:881_0: “Khagā nabhamhāpi ca rukkhato ca, haṭṭhāva heṭṭhā pathaviṃ bhajiṃsu;
atk-s0511a0:882_0: Mahācatuddīpagato ca megho, pavassi toyaṃ madhuraṃ samantā.
atk-s0511a0:883_0: “Ṭhatvāva dibbe bhavane sakasmiṃ, pasannacittā pana devatāyo;
atk-s0511a0:884_0: Nacciṃsu gāyiṃsu ca vādayiṃsu, seḷiṃsu tā keḷimakaṃsu ceva.
atk-s0511a0:885_0: “Sayaṃ kira dvāramahākavāṭā, khaṇeva tasmiṃ vivaṭā ahesuṃ;
atk-s0511a0:886_0: Mahājane neva khudā pipāsā, pīḷesi lokaṃ kira kañci kañci.
atk-s0511a0:887_0: “Ye niccaverā pana pāṇisaṅghā, te mettacittaṃ paramaṃ labhiṃsu;
atk-s0511a0:888_0: Kākā ulūkehi cariṃsu saddhiṃ, koṇā varāhehi akaṃsu keḷiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:889_0: “Ghorāpi sappānamukhāpi sappā, kīḷiṃsu kāmaṃ nakulehi saddhiṃ;
atk-s0511a0:892_0: Khujjā ahesuṃ samacārukāyā, mūgā ca vācaṃ madhuraṃ lapiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:894_0: Assā ca hesiṃsu pahaṭṭhacittā, gajjiṃsu mattā varavāraṇāpi.
atk-s0511a0:897_1: devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggahaṇassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:897_2: paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:897_3: pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:897_4: cammanaddhadundubhīnaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ mahantiyā dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:899_2: khagānaṃ nagādīhi pathavigamanaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā mahājanassa pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa,
atk-s0511a0:899_4: devatānaṃ sakasakabhavanesveva ṭhatvā naccādīhi kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānudānassa,
atk-s0511a0:900_0: Atha dīpaṅkarakumāro mahatiyā sampattiyā paricāriyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:900_1: anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasirimanubhavanto uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena
atk-s0511a0:900_2: jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā sudassananagarasadisavibhavasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:900_4: Nagaraṃ pavisitvā puna catutthavāre hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā etadavoca – “ahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0511a0:900_8: Atha vissakammo nāma devaputto bodhisattaṃ nānāvirāgavasananivāsanaṃ āmukkamuttāhārakeyūraṃ ruciranavakanakakaṭakamakuṭakuṇḍaladharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:900_10: Atha dīpaṅkarakumāro devakumāro viya caturāsītiyā hatthisahassehi parivuto hatthikkhandhavaragato mahatā
atk-s0511a0:900_11: balakāyena parivuto ratijananaṃ uyyānaṃ pavisitvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha taṃ uyyānamanusañcaritvā paramaruciradassane
atk-s0511a0:900_12: sakahadayasītale silātale nisīditvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0511a0:900_13: Taṅkhaṇaññeva suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavo mahābrahmā aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre ādāya mahāpurisassa cakkhupathe pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a0:901_2: “samaṇaparikkhāro”ti sutvā alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pasādhanabhaṇḍāgārikassa hatthe datvā maṅgalakhaggamādāya
atk-s0511a0:901_3: saddhiṃ makuṭena kese chinditvā antalikkhe ākāse ukkhipi.
atk-s0511a0:901_4: Atha sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena taṃ kesamakuṭaṃ ādāya sinerumuddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ makuṭacetiyaṃ nāma akāsi.
atk-s0511a0:901_5: Atha mahāpuriso devadattiyaṃ arahattadhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā sāṭakayugaṃ ākāse khipi.
atk-s0511a0:901_6: Taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakāsi.
atk-s0511a0:901_7: Dīpaṅkarakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ ekā purisakoṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:901_8: Tāya pana parisāya parivuto bodhisatto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ acari.
atk-s0511a0:901_9: Atha visākhapuṇṇamāya aññataraṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:902_0: Tasmiṃ kira nagare taṃdivasaṃ devatānaṃ balikaraṇatthāya nirudakapāyāsaṃ paciṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:902_1: Tassa pana mahāsattassa saparisassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa manussā adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:902_2: Taṃ kira sabbesaṃ koṭisaṅkhyāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariyattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:902_3: Mahāpurisassa pana patte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:902_4: Taṃ paribhuñjitvā tattheva sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhāya gaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:902_5: vissajjetvā sunandena nāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pipphalibodhirukkhamūlaṃ gantvā tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:902_6: santharitvā navutihatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0511a0:903_0: Tato mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0511a0:903_1: pacchimayāme anulomapaṭilomavasena paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a0:903_2: pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:903_3: vaḍḍhetvā aruṇodaye ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ naditvā sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:903_4: bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanaṃ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisatānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:903_5: devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyetvā catuddīpikamahāmegho viya dhammavassaṃ vassento mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:904_0: Tadā kira sumedhapaṇḍito samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva pathavikampanamaddasa na tāni nimittāni.
atk-s0511a0:912_6: dhammacakkappavattanesu catūsu ṭhānesu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīni nimittānīti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0511a0:912_11: catūsu ṭhānesu pana pavattattā “caturo nimitte”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:912_13: Idāni tesaṃ catunnaṃ nimittānaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ niddisanto “jhānaratisamappito”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:912_15: Jhānaratiyā samappitattā samaṅgībhūtattā tāni nimittāni nāddasanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:913_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0511a0:913_1: paramarammaṃ rammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a0:913_2: Rammanagaravāsino “dīpaṅkaro kira dasabalo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0511a0:913_3: cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā sappiādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā
atk-s0511a0:913_4: bhuttapātarāsā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pupphadhūpagandhahatthā yena buddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:913_5: upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā atimadhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0511a0:913_6: svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:914_0: Te punadivase asadisamahādānaṃ sajjetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vimalakomalehi nīluppalehi chādetvā catujjātigandhena
atk-s0511a0:914_1: paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni surabhikusumāni vikiritvā maṇḍapassa catūsu koṇesu sītalamadhuravāripuṇṇā
atk-s0511a0:914_2: cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā maṇḍapopari jayasumanakusumasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ celavitānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:914_3: bandhitvā suvaṇṇamaṇirajatatārakāhi racayitvā tattha gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmaratanadāmāni olambetvā
atk-s0511a0:914_4: dhūpehi duddinaṃ katvā sakalañca taṃ rammaṃ rammanagaraṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ saphalakadaliyo ca pupphasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a0:914_5: puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā nānāvirāgā dhajapaṭākāyo ca samussāpetvā mahāvīthiyā ubhosu passesu sāṇipākārehi
atk-s0511a0:914_6: parikkhipitvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā udakaparibhinnaṭṭhānesu paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0511a0:914_7: cikkhallakampi pathaviṃ asamaṃ samaṃ katvā muttāsadisāhi vālukāhi ākiranti,
atk-s0511a0:915_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assamapadato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena
atk-s0511a0:915_1: ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente ca alaṅkaronte ca disvā –
atk-s0511a0:915_2: “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva ākāsato oruyha ekamante ṭhatvā te manusse pucchi –
atk-s0511a0:928_0: Tattha paccantadesavisayeti majjhimadesasseva ekapasse paccantadesasaññite janapade.
atk-s0511a0:928_1: Tassa āgamanaṃ magganti tena āgantabbaṃ magganti attho.
atk-s0511a0:928_2: Ahaṃ tena samayenāti ahaṃ tasmiṃ samaye,
atk-s0511a0:928_7: “tadā” cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekatthattā purimassa nikkhamanakiriyāya pacchimassa ca gamanakiriyāya saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo,
atk-s0511a0:929_1: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhaṃ pamoditanti imāni tīṇi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni aññamaññassa atthadīpanāni.
atk-s0511a0:929_11: Tattha ayaṃ mahājano tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamoditahadayo hutvā maggaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0511a0:930_0: Evaṃ tena sumedhatāpasena puṭṭhā te manussā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0511a0:930_2: kiṃ na jānātha dīpaṅkaro nāma buddho anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0511a0:930_3: caramāno anukkamena amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati,
atk-s0511a0:930_4: mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayitvā tasseva buddhassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:930_8: tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:930_12: ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ buddhassa maggaṃ sodhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:930_14: “ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti jānamānā dubbisodhanaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ ativiya visamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0511a0:930_15: “imaṃ okāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha alaṅkarotha cā”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:930_16: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:930_17: “ahaṃ pana imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā paramadassanīyaṃ kātuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0511a0:930_18: evaṃ kate pana maṃ na paritosessati.
atk-s0511a0:930_19: Ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṃsuṃ āharitvā taṃ padesaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0511a0:931_0: Tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite vippakateyeva rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavato kālamārocesuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:931_3: Evaṃ tehi kāle ārocite dasabalo jayasumanakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0511a0:931_4: nivāsetvā tassupari suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena jayasumanakusumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:931_5: bandhitvā kanakagirisikharamatthake lākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto
atk-s0511a0:931_6: viya ca suvaṇṇagghikaṃ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya ca saradasamayarajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento
atk-s0511a0:931_7: viya ca lākhārasena tintakiṃsukakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā gandhakuṭidvārato
atk-s0511a0:931_8: kañcanaguhato sīho viya nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:931_9: Atha sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaramādāya bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:931_10: Te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:938_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi vītadoso vītadosehi vītamoho vītamohehi parivuto ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0511a0:938_1: Atha satthā mahānubhāvānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ catūhi satasahassehi parivuto marugaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a0:938_2: dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto hāritamahābrahmā viya ca aparimitasamayasamupacitakusalabalajanitāya
atk-s0511a0:938_3: anopamāya buddhalīḷāya tārāgaṇaparivuto saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:940_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇe kusume karonto, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo paṭipajji maggaṃ”.
atk-s0511a0:941_0: Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0511a0:941_1: asītiyā anubyañjanehi anurañjitaṃ byāmappabhāya parikkhepaṃ sassirikaṃ indanīlamaṇisadisaṃ ākāse nānappakārā
atk-s0511a0:941_2: vijjulatā viya chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvaṃ akkhīni ummīletvā oloketvā –
atk-s0511a0:941_5: maṇimayaphalakasetuṃ akkamanto viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ akkamanto gacchatu,
atk-s0511a0:941_6: taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti kese mocetvā ajinajaṭāvākacīrāni kāḷavaṇṇe kalale pattharitvā tattheva kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji.
atk-s0511a0:943_0: “Te me puṭṭhā viyākaṃsu, buddho loke anuttaro;
atk-s0511a0:951_0: Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo ve mā upaccagā.
atk-s0511a0:957_0: Buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0511a0:985_0: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittha, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:986_4: Tattha ṭhatvāti yasmiṃ padese ākāsato otari,
atk-s0511a0:986_23: avijjāsavoti ime cattāro āsavā yesaṃ khīṇā pahīnā samucchinnā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā,
atk-s0511a0:987_0: Devā manusse passantīti ettha devānaṃ manussadassane vattabbaṃ natthi,
atk-s0511a0:987_1: pakatidassanavasena pana yathā manussā idha ṭhatvā passanti,
atk-s0511a0:987_8: anuyoge sati sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ hotīti lakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:989_0: Kese muñcitvāhanti ahaṃ kese baddhā kalāpakuṭilajaṭā muñcitvā,
atk-s0511a0:989_7: Mā nanti ettha māti paṭisedhatthe nipāto.
atk-s0511a0:989_10: Hitāya me bhavissatīti taṃ kalale anakkamanaṃ dīgharattaṃ mama hitatthāya bhavissatīti.
atk-s0511a0:990_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito kalalapiṭṭhe nipanno evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:990_1: “sacāhaṃ iccheyyaṃ sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:990_2: aññātakavesena pana me kilese jhāpetvā nibbānappattiyā kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0511a0:990_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:990_5: Tato aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0511a0:993_0: Icchamāno ahaṃ ajja, kilese jhāpaye mama.
atk-s0511a0:1007_3: Idha pana bhikkhū viya āsavakkhayaṃ katvā kiṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1007_4: buddhakare dhamme pūretvā paṭisandhijātibodhidhammacakkappavattanesu mahāpathavikampanaṃ katvā buddho bodhetā,
atk-s0511a0:1008_5: buddhassa mama jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kalalapiṭṭhe sayanenādhikārenāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1009_0: Saṃsārasotanti kammakilesavasena yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitinavasattāvāsesu ito cito ca saṃsaraṇaṃ saṃsāro. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:1012_0: Saṃsāro ca so sotaṃ ceti saṃsārasotaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1017_0: Tattha manussattanti manussattabhāveyeva ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0511a0:1018_0: Liṅgasampattīti manussattabhāve vattamānassāpi purisaliṅge ṭhitasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0511a0:1018_1: na itthiyā vā paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati.
atk-s0511a0:1018_8: yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0511a0:1018_9: Tasmā itthiliṅge ṭhitassa manussajātikassāpi patthanā na samijjhati.
atk-s0511a0:1019_0: Hetūti purisassāpi tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattappattiyā hetusampannasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0511a0:1020_0: Satthāradassananti sace jīvamānakabuddhasseva santike pattheti patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0511a0:1020_1: Parinibbute bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhirukkhamūle vā paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:1020_2: Bhabbābhabbake ñatvā kammavipākaparicchedakañāṇena paricchinditvā byākātuṃ asamatthattā.
atk-s0511a0:1021_0: Pabbajjāti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0511a0:1022_1: na pana imāya guṇasampattiyā virahitassa. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:1023_0: Adhikāroti guṇasampannenāpi yena attano jīvitaṃ buddhānaṃ pariccattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1024_0: Chandatāti abhinīhārasampannassāpi yassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando vāyāmo ca ussāho ca pariyeṭṭhi ca,
atk-s0511a0:1024_5: “yo pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano bāhubalena uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0511a0:1024_7: Yo panimaṃ attano dukkaraṃ na maññati ‘ahaṃ imaṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”’ti evaṃ mahatā chandena ussāhena samannāgato hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1025_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito pana ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvāva buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0511a0:1025_1: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgantvā sumedhapaṇḍitassa sīsabhāge ṭhatvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ sumedhatāpasaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:1025_5: “ito kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisamajjhe byākāsi –
atk-s0511a0:1025_12: ayañhi ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:1025_13: Tasmiṃ panassa attabhāve kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ nivāso bhavissati,
atk-s0511a0:1025_16: upatisso ca kolito ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:1025_18: khemā ca uppalavaṇṇā ca dve aggasāvikā bhavissanti.
atk-s0511a0:1025_19: Ayaṃ paripakkañāṇo hutvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā nigrodhamūle sujātāya
atk-s0511a0:1025_20: nāma kumāriyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiggahetvā nerañjarāya tīre paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha assattharukkhamūle
atk-s0511a0:1046_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a0:1049_0: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-s0511a0:1058_0: Tattha lokavidūti sabbathā viditalokattā pana lokavidū.
atk-s0511a0:1058_1: Bhagavā hi sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathāpi lokaṃ avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0511a0:1060_0: Lokassa antaṃ samitāvi ñatvā, nāsīsatī lokamimaṃ parañcā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:1061_4: Tattha saṅkhāraloko nāma paṭiccasamuppannā pathaviādayo dhammā.
atk-s0511a0:1061_5: Sattaloko nāma saññino asaññino nevasaññināsaññino ca sattā.
atk-s0511a0:1061_7: Ime pana tayopi lokā bhagavatā yathāsabhāvato viditā,
atk-s0511a0:1061_9: Āhutīnaṃ paṭiggahoti dānānaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ arahattā dakkhiṇeyyattā āhutīnaṃ paṭiggaho.
atk-s0511a0:1061_10: Ussīsake maṃ ṭhatvānāti mama sīsasamīpe ṭhatvā.
atk-s0511a0:1061_11: Idaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ vacanaṃ abravīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1062_5: “yathā nāma puriso nadiṃ taranto ujukena titthena tarituṃ asakkonto heṭṭhātitthena uttarati,
atk-s0511a0:1062_6: evameva mayaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalassa sāsane maggaphalaṃ alabhamānā anāgate yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0511a0:1062_7: tadā tava sammukhā maggaphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ samatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1062_8: Dīpaṅkaradasabalo bodhisattaṃ mahāsattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi pupphamuṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a0:1062_9: Tepi catusatasahassā khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ pupphehi ca gandhehi ca pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1062_10: Devamanussā pana tatheva pūjetvā vanditvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1063_0: Atha sabbalokamatidīpaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro bhagavā catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto rammanagaravāsīhi
atk-s0511a0:1063_1: pūjiyamāno devatāhi abhivandiyamāno sañjhāppabhānurañjitavarakanakagirisikharo viya jaṅgamamāno anekesu
atk-s0511a0:1063_2: pāṭihāriyesu vattamānesu tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena gantvā nānāsurabhikusumagandhavāsitaṃ cuṇṇasammodagandhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1063_3: samussitadhajapaṭākaṃ gandhānubaddhahadayehi bhamaragaṇehi gumbagumbāyamānaṃ dhūpandhakāraṃ amarapurasadisasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1063_4: abhirammaṃ rammanagaraṃ pavisitvā paññatte mahārahe buddhāsane yugandharamatthake saradasamayarucirakararajanikaro
atk-s0511a0:1063_5: timiranikaranidhanakaro kamalavanavikasanakaro divasakaro viya dasabaladivasakaro nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:1063_6: Bhikkhusaṅghopi paṭipāṭiyā attano attano pattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:1063_7: Rammanagaravāsino pana upāsakā saddhādiguṇasampannā nānāvidhakhajjādīhi samalaṅkataṃ vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1063_8: asadisaṃ sukhanidānaṃ dānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1064_0: Atha kho bodhisatto dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatamiva maññamāno pamuditahadayo sabbesu paṭikkantesu sayanā vuṭṭhāya –
atk-s0511a0:1064_2: Evaṃ nisinne mahāsatte sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sādhukāraṃ datvā –
atk-s0511a0:1064_5: ‘pāramiyo vicinissāmī’ti nisinnakāle yāni pubbanimittāni nāma paññāyanti,
atk-s0511a0:1064_6: tāni sabbānipi ajja pātubhūtāni nissaṃsayena tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0511a0:1064_9: so ekanteneva buddho bhavissati’ tasmā tvaṃ attano vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā paggaṇhā”ti bodhisattaṃ nānappakārāhi thutīhi abhitthaviṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1085_0: Devā manussā asurā ca, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1091_0: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.
atk-s0511a0:1094_0: Vasībhūto ahaṃ jhāne, abhiññāsu pāramiṃ gato.
atk-s0511a0:1106_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1109_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1112_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1115_0: Tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1117_0: “Latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade;
atk-s0511a0:1118_0: Tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1121_0: Tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1123_0: “Mānussakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade;
atk-s0511a0:1127_0: Tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1133_0: Tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1136_0: Tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1145_0: Tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1147_0: “Na honti aratī sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade;
atk-s0511a0:1148_0: Tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1151_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1153_0: “Rogā tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassasi;
atk-s0511a0:1154_0: Tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1157_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1160_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1163_0: Sopajja vāyatī gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1166_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1169_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1171_0: “Kuṭṭā kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā;
atk-s0511a0:1174_0: “Cutī ca upapattī ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0511a0:1179_0: Tattha idaṃ sutvāna vacananti idaṃ dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato bodhisattassa byākaraṇavacanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0511a0:1179_1: Asamassāti samassa sadisassa abhāvato asamassa. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:1180_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0511a0:1182_0: Mahesinoti mahante sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhe esi gavesīti mahesī,
atk-s0511a0:1182_3: ukkaṭṭhaniddeso panāyaṃ sabbepi dasasahassilokadhātuyā nāgasupaṇṇayakkhādayopi āmoditāva.
atk-s0511a0:1182_4: Buddhabījaṃ kira ayanti ayaṃ kira buddhaṅkuro uppannoti āmoditāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1183_3: Sadevakāti saha devehi sadevakā dasasahassī namassantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1184_4: Yadi muñcāmāti yadi imaṃ bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā akatakiccā gamissāmāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1184_5: Mama kammaṃ pakittetvāti mama bhāvitamatthaṃ byākaritvā.
atk-s0511a0:1185_2: abhivādetvāna pakkamunti devādayo sabbepi ime maṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā suppatiṭṭhitapañcaṅgā
atk-s0511a0:1185_3: vanditvā nivattitvā punappunaṃ oloketvā madhuratthabyañjanāhi nānappakārāhi thutīhi vaṇṇentā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1186_0: Dassanaṃ me atikkanteti mama dassanavisayaṃ bhagavati atikkante.
atk-s0511a0:1186_5: Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujinti katapallaṅko hutvā puppharāsimhi nisīdinti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1187_6: Avisesena “me samā natthī”ti vatvā idāni tameva niyamento “asamo iddhidhammesū”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:1188_0: Atha sumedhatāpaso dasabalassa byākaraṇaṃ sutvā buddhabhāvaṃ karatalagatakālamiva maññamāno pamuditahadayo
atk-s0511a0:1188_1: dasasu lokadhātusahassesu suddhāvāsamahābrahmāno atītabuddhadassāvino niyatabodhisattānaṃ byākaraṇe uppajjamānapāṭihāriyadassanena
atk-s0511a0:1188_2: tathāgatavacanassa avitathataṃ pakāsento maṃ paritosayantā imā gāthāyo āhaṃsūti dassento bhagavā “pallaṅkābhujane
atk-s0511a0:1189_10: Tāni ajja padissareti pubbepi niyatabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkābhujane yāni nimittāni uppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:1189_12: Tasmā tvaṃ dhuvameva buddho bhavissasīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1190_13: Tepajja pupphitānīti tāni pupphāni ajja pupphitānīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1191_5: Ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā cāti ākāsagatā ca bhūmigatā ca ratanānīti muttādīni ratanāni.
atk-s0511a0:1191_9: Turiyāti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ susiraṃ ghananti pañca turiyāni.
atk-s0511a0:1191_10: Tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalaturiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1191_18: Abhiravantīti tatra tatra kusalehi sumuñcitā suppatāḷitā suvāditā viya abhiravanti,
atk-s0511a0:1192_13: Tepi ajja padissantīti tepi sūriyassa vimalabhāvā tārakā ajja divā dissanti.
atk-s0511a0:1194_10: Ajjapetanti ajja tava pallaṅkābhujanepi etaṃ bhayaṃ na hotevāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1194_11: Tena liṅgena jānāmāti tena kāraṇena sabbeva mayaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0511a0:1195_12: Ākāsabhūtāti te kuṭṭakavāṭapabbatā āvaraṇaṃ tirokaraṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontā,
atk-s0511a0:1196_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito dīpaṅkarassa dasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya sañjātussāho hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:1196_3: Yathā hi ākāse khittassa leḍḍussa patanaṃ dhuvaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1196_8: evameva buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ amoghaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1202_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1204_0: “Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1206_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1210_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1214_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1218_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1222_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmaha”nti.
atk-s0511a0:1223_1: dasasahassī na cūbhayanti dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0511a0:1224_6: Dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahanti ahaṃ ekaṃseneva buddho bhavissāmīti niyatavasena avassambhāvivasena ca vattamānavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1226_0: “Svāhaṃ addhā buddho bhavissāmī”ti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno buddhakārake dhamme upadhāretuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:1226_2: uddhaṃ adho disāsu vidisāsūti anukkamena sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto pubbe porāṇakehi bodhisattehi
atk-s0511a0:1226_3: āsevitanisevitaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ disvā evaṃ attānaṃ ovadi –
atk-s0511a0:1226_5: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ pūreyyāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1226_6: Yathā hi nikujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva na paccāharati,
atk-s0511a0:1226_7: evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttadāraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā sabbattha yācakānaṃ sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1226_8: nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhimūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissasī”ti paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1229_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-s0511a0:1234_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1237_0: “Yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adho kato;
atk-s0511a0:1241_0: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adho kato”ti.
atk-s0511a0:1242_2: Buddhattakarā nāma dhammā dānapāramitādayo dasa dhammā.
atk-s0511a0:1242_11: kattha nu kho te buddhakārakadhammā uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ disāsu vidisāsūti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a0:1243_4: ajja paṭṭhāya ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramī pūretabbā mayāti evaṃ samādiyāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1243_7: Yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasīti bodhimūlamupagantvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pattuṃ icchasi ce.
atk-s0511a0:1243_8: Yassa kassacīti udakassa vā khīrassa vā yassa kassaci sampuṇṇo.
atk-s0511a0:1243_13: Na tattha parirakkhatīti tasmiṃ vamane na parirakkhati,
atk-s0511a0:1243_17: Kumbho viya adho katoti heṭṭhāmukhīkato viya kumbho.
atk-s0511a0:1243_21: jīvitapariccāgena paramatthapāramiñca pūrehī”ti evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovadi.
atk-s0511a0:1244_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1244_3: Yathā camarī migo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati,
atk-s0511a0:1244_4: evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī”ti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1252_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1256_0: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1259_0: Parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi”nti.
atk-s0511a0:1260_0: Tattha na heteti na hi eteyeva.
atk-s0511a0:1260_2: Dutiyaṃ sīlapāraminti sīlaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0511a0:1260_5: Tasmā sīlapāramī pūretabbāti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1262_0: Catūsu bhūmīsu sīlānīti catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattasīlāni,
atk-s0511a0:1262_2: Bhūmivasena pana dvīsuyeva bhūmīsu pariyāpannaṃ tampi catusīlamevāti.
atk-s0511a0:1263_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1263_3: Yathāpi suciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a0:1263_5: evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise katvā passa,
atk-s0511a0:1263_6: sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1263_7: evaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1271_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1275_0: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttiṃyeva gavesati.
atk-s0511a0:1279_3: Na tattha rāgaṃ janetīti tattha andughare rāgaṃ sinehaṃ na janeti na uppādeti.
atk-s0511a0:1279_4: “Imaṃ andugharaṃ muñcitvā nāhaṃ aññattha gamissāmī”ti evaṃ tattha rāgaṃ na janeti,
atk-s0511a0:1280_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1280_3: Hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1280_4: Yathāpi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādibhedesu kulesu kiñci kulaṃ avivajjetvā paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanamattaṃ labhati,
atk-s0511a0:1280_5: evameva tvampi sabbe paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pucchanto buddho bhavissasī”ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1288_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1292_0: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1296_6: Yāpananti yāpanamattaṃ pāṇadhāraṇaṃ āhāraṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1296_10: kiṃ anavajja”ntiādinā nayena tattha tattha abhiññāte paṇḍite jane upasaṅkamitvā paripucchantoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1297_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1297_3: Yathāpi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1297_4: evaṃ tvampi sabbabhavesu sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo anolīnavīriyo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1305_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1314_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1314_4: Yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi,
atk-s0511a0:1314_5: na ca tena pathavī sinehaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0511a0:1314_7: evameva tvampi sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanesu khamo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1322_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1326_0: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-s0511a0:1330_11: tassa tena nikkhepena paṭighānurodhaṃ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1330_12: Sammānāvamānakkhamoti sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanasaho tvampi bhavāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1330_18: Ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā yattha yattha viseso atthi,
atk-s0511a0:1330_19: taṃ tameva vatvā pāṭhantaraṃ dassetvā gamissāmāti.
atk-s0511a0:1331_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1331_3: asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādīnaṃ vasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ nāma mā bhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1331_4: Yathāpi osadhītārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ vijahitvā aññāya vīthiyā na gacchati,
atk-s0511a0:1331_6: evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya musāvādaṃ nāma avadantoyeva buddho bhavissasī”ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1339_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1343_0: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito.
atk-s0511a0:1345_0: “Tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkama hi vīthito;
atk-s0511a0:1347_3: osadhagahaṇe osadhītārakaṃ uditaṃ disvā osadhaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0511a0:1347_11: Utuvaṭṭeti hemante ca vassāne cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1347_12: Na vokkamati vīthitoti taṃ taṃ utumhi attano gamanavīthito na vokkamati na vigacchati,
atk-s0511a0:1347_15: Atha vā osadhī nāmāti siṅgiverapipphalimaricādikaṃ osadhaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1347_16: Na vokkamatīti yaṃ yaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ osadhaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1347_17: taṃ taṃ phaladānaṃ okkamma attano phalaṃ adatvā na nivattati.
atk-s0511a0:1348_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1348_5: yathā pabbato nāma sabbadisāsu vāte paharantepi na kampati na calati,
atk-s0511a0:1348_7: evameva tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī”ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti.
atk-s0511a0:1356_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1357_0: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1364_1: Acaloti niccalo suppatiṭṭhitoti acalattāva suṭṭhu patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0511a0:1365_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1365_4: Yathāpi udakaṃ nāma pāpajanassapi kalyāṇajanassapi sītabhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati,
atk-s0511a0:1365_5: evameva tvampi sabbasattesu mettacittena ekacittova hutvā buddho bhavissasī”ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti.
atk-s0511a0:1373_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1374_0: Mettāya asamo hoti, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-s0511a0:1381_0: Tattha asamo hohīti mettābhāvanāya asadiso hohi.
atk-s0511a0:1382_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a0:1382_4: Yathāpi pathavī nāma sucimpi asucimpi ca pakkhipamāne majjhattāva hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1382_5: evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho bhavissasī”ti dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1390_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a0:1398_0: Tattha tulābhūtoti majjhattabhāve ṭhito yathā tulāya daṇḍo samaṃ tulito samaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a0:1398_2: evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu tulāsadiso hutvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a0:1399_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito ime dasa pāramidhamme vicinitvā tato paraṃ cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:1399_1: “imasmiṃ loke bodhisattehi paripūretabbā bodhipācanā buddhattakarā dhammā ettakāyeva,
atk-s0511a0:1399_3: imā pana pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi natthi,
atk-s0511a0:1399_7: Evaṃ tāsaṃ attano hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya punappunaṃ sammasanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasi,
atk-s0511a0:1399_14: jīvitapariccāgo paramatthapāramiyo nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa
atk-s0511a0:1399_16: Tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā vipulā ayaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1399_17: mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo viya uppīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca mahāviravaṃ viravamānā
atk-s0511a0:1399_19: Kulālacakkaṃ viya telayantacakkaṃ viya ca paribbhami.
atk-s0511a0:1402_0: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-s0511a0:1408_0: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:1409_0: Tattha ettakāyevāti niddiṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ pāramitānaṃ anūnādhikabhāvassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1409_4: Tato dasapāramito añño buddhakārakadhammo natthīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1410_6: taṃ dhāreti dhīyati vā etthāti vasudhā. Kā sā? Medanī.
atk-s0511a0:1410_8: Sumedhapaṇḍite pana pāramiyo vicinante tassa ñāṇatejena dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1412_0: Evaṃ mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavantaṃ parivisayamānā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0511a0:1412_2: Ghaṭādīni kulālabhaṇḍāni pavaṭṭentāni aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1412_5: bhūtayakkhadevatāsu aññatarāvaṭṭo vā’ti na hi mayaṃ etaṃ jānāma.
atk-s0511a0:1412_6: Api ca kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano bhayena upadduto,
atk-s0511a0:1412_7: kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa pāpakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0511a0:1413_4: yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito ‘anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’ti byākato,
atk-s0511a0:1413_6: tassa sammasantassa dhammatejena sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu ekappahārena kampati ceva viravati cā”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:1416_0: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā seti bhūmiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1425_0: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a0:1428_0: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-s0511a0:1435_3: tassa yā tattha parisā ṭhitā āsīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1438_0: Tato mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanādīni ādāya rammanagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a0:1438_1: bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rammanagarameva pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:1438_2: Atha kho bodhisatto dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1441_0: Sabbe maṃ upasaṅkamma, punāpi maṃ abhivandisuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1445_0: Tattha mano nibbāyīti mahājanassa pathavikampane ubbiggahadayassa tattha kāraṇaṃ sutvā mano nibbāyi,
atk-s0511a0:1446_0: Atha kho bodhisattaṃ dayitasabbasattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā dibbehi mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā –
atk-s0511a0:1446_2: tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle mahati patthanā patthitā,
atk-s0511a0:1446_4: mā te tattha bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1446_5: Sarīre te appamattakopi rogo mā uppajjatu,
atk-s0511a0:1446_7: Yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca,
atk-s0511a0:1446_8: tatheva tvampi taṃ samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhiṃ phusassū”tiādīni thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:1446_9: evaṃ payirudāhitvā bodhisattaṃ abhivādetvā attano attano devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1446_11: “ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake buddho bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a0:1446_12: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya ākāsamabbhuggantvā isigaṇavantaṃ himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1451_0: “Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-s0511a0:1452_0: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1455_0: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1473_0: Tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1479_0: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:1480_0: Tattha dibbanti mandāravapāricchattakasantānakusesayādikaṃ dibbakusumaṃ devā mānusakā ca mānusapupphaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1481_3: Soko rogo vinassatūti socanasaṅkhāto soko rujanasaṅkhāto rogo ca vinassatu.
atk-s0511a0:1482_0: Samayeti tassa tassa rukkhassa pupphanasamaye sampatteti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1483_2: Lokā muccitvāti lokadhammehi alitto hutvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1487_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā puna bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ
atk-s0511a0:1487_1: onītapattapāṇiṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṃ sotukāmā upanisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1487_2: Atha satthā tesaṃ paramamadhuraṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ dānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a0:1499_0: Ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato.
atk-s0511a0:1501_0: Na dajjā sukhappadaṃ dānaṃ, dānaṃ cittappamodanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1505_0: Kittimanantaṃ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā.
atk-s0511a0:1506_0: “Datvā dānaṃ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṃ dīghañcāyu;
atk-s0511a0:1507_0: Sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṃ, sagge saddhiṃ kīḷati devehi;
atk-s0511a0:1510_0: Dadāti taṃ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṃ, paccekabhūmiṃ pana buddhabhūmi”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:1511_0: Evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṃ katvā dānānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:1512_0: “Sīlaṃ sukhānaṃ paramaṃ nidānaṃ, sīlena sīlī tidivaṃ payāti;
atk-s0511a0:1514_0: “Avassayo sīlasamo janānaṃ, kuto panañño idha vā parattha;
atk-s0511a0:1515_0: Sīlaṃ guṇānaṃ paramā patiṭṭhā, yathā dharā thāvarajaṅgamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1518_6: nibbānanagarappavesane ca sīlasamaṃ dvāraṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:1522_0: Yo samaṃ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati. ;
atk-s0511a0:1523_0: “Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṃ taggaramallikā vā;
atk-s0511a0:1524_0: Satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
atk-s0511a0:1527_0: “Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
atk-s0511a0:1530_0: Visodhayati sattānaṃ, yaṃ ve sīlajalaṃ malaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1531_0: “Na taṃ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1532_0: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
atk-s0511a0:1534_0: Yaṃ sameti idaṃ ariyaṃ, sīlaṃ accantasītalaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1538_0: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
atk-s0511a0:1541_1: “idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:1541_2: Ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo ekantasukho niccamettha kīḷā niccaṃ sampattiyo labhanti.
atk-s0511a0:1541_3: Cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhanti.
atk-s0511a0:1541_4: Tāvatiṃsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:1541_6: “ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo na tattha chandarāgo kātabbo”ti kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme
atk-s0511a0:1541_8: Evaṃ tassa mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ca ekacce pañcasīlesu ca ekacce sotāpattiphale
atk-s0511a0:1541_9: ca ekacce sakadāgāmiphale ekacce anāgāmiphale ekacce catūsupi phalesu ekacce tīsu vijjāsu ekacce chasu
atk-s0511a0:1541_10: abhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassanamahāvihārameva pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:1547_0: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1550_0: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0511a0:1563_1: Saraṇanti ettha saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa gantā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:1563_2: Sarati hiṃsati vināsetīti saraṇaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
atk-s0511a0:1563_4: Taṃ pana saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatiṃ parikkilesaṃ hanati hiṃsati vināsetīti saraṇanti vuccatīti.
atk-s0511a0:1564_0: “Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1566_0: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1568_0: “Ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1570_2: Evaṃ tāva saraṇaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇassa gantā cāti idaṃ tayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1571_4: Saraṇāgamane kañcīti kañci puggalaṃ saraṇagamane nivesetīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1571_10: Kañci pañcasu sīlesūti kañci puggalaṃ pañcasu viratisīlesu nivesesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1571_13: Sīle dasavidhe paranti aparaṃ puggalaṃ dasavidhe sīle nivesesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1571_15: tassa kañci puggalaṃ dasa kusaladhamme samādapesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1571_16: Kassaci deti sāmaññanti ettha paramatthato sāmaññanti maggo vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:1573_0: Caturo phalamuttameti cattāri uttamāni phalānīti attho. Ma-
atk-s0511a0:1573_3: Yathopanissayaṃ cattāro magge cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni kassaci adāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1573_4: Kassaci asame dhammeti kassaci asadise cattāro paṭisambhidādhamme adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1574_0: Kassaci varasamāpattiyoti kassaci pana nīvaraṇavigamena padhānabhūtā aṭṭha samāpattiyo adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1574_1: Tisso kassaci vijjāyoti kassaci puggalassa upanissayavasena dibbacakkhuñāṇapubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaāsavakkhayañāṇānaṃ vasena tisso vijjāyo.
atk-s0511a0:1574_2: Chaḷabhiññā pavecchatīti cha abhiññāyo kassaci adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1575_0: Tena yogenāti tena nayena tenānukkamena ca.
atk-s0511a0:1575_4: Ito uparipi īdisesu vacanesu atītakālavaseneva attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0511a0:1575_5: Tena vitthārikaṃ āsīti tena dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato ovādena anusāsaniyā vitthārikaṃ vitthataṃ visālībhūtaṃ sāsanaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1576_0: Mahāhanūti mahāpurisānaṃ kira dvepi hanūni paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisākārāni hontīti mahantāni hanūni yassa so mahāhanu,
atk-s0511a0:1576_6: Bahū jane tārayatīti bahū buddhaveneyye jane tāresi.
atk-s0511a0:1577_3: Disvāti buddhacakkhunā vā samantacakkhunā vā disvā.
atk-s0511a0:1577_5: Idaṃ pana dasasahassiyaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1578_0: Dīpaṅkaro kira satthā buddhattaṃ patvā bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe mahābrahmuno
atk-s0511a0:1578_1: dhammajjhesanaṃ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisataṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:1579_0: Atha satthā attano puttassa samavaṭṭakkhandhassa usabhakkhandhassa nāma ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā taṃ atrajaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1579_1: pamukhaṃ katvā rāhulovādasadisaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā devamanussānaṃ navutikoṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:1580_0: Puna bhagavā amaravatīnagaradvāre mahāsirīsarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā mahājanassa bandhanāmokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1580_1: katvā devagaṇaparivuto divasakarātirekajutivisarabhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paramasītale
atk-s0511a0:1580_2: paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā sabbadevagaṇapītisañjananiṃ attano jananiṃ sumedhādeviṃ pamukhaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a0:1580_3: sabbalokaviditavisuddhidevo devadevo dīpaṅkaro bhagavā sabbasattahitakaraṃ paramātirekagambhīrasukhumaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1580_4: buddhivisadakaraṃ sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desetvā navutidevakoṭisahassānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:1587_0: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1587_1: Tattha sunandārāme koṭisatasahassānaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1591_0: Athāparena samayena dasabalo catūhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā mahājanānuggahaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1591_1: karonto cārikaṃ caramāno anukkamena ekasmiṃ padese mahājanakatasakkāraṃ sabbalokavissutaṃ amanussapariggahitaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1591_4: So kira pabbato nāradena nāma yakkhena pariggahito ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1591_5: Tattha pana tassa yakkhassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ mahājano manussabaliṃ upasaṃharati.
atk-s0511a0:1592_0: Atha dīpaṅkaro kira bhagavā tassa mahājanassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tato bhikkhusaṅghaṃ cātuddisaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1592_1: pesetvā adutiyo asahāyo mahākaruṇābalavasaṅgatahadayo tañca yakkhaṃ vinetuṃ taṃ nāradapabbataṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0511a0:1592_2: Atha so manussabhakkho sakahitanirapekkho paravadhadakkho yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno kodhaparetamānaso
atk-s0511a0:1592_3: dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpetukāmo taṃ pabbataṃ cālesi.
atk-s0511a0:1592_4: So kira pabbato tena cāliyamāno bhagavato ānubhāvena tasseva matthake patamāno viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1593_1: “handa naṃ agginā jhāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ atibhīmadassanaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0511a0:1593_2: So aggikkhandho paṭivāte khitto viya attanova dukkhaṃ janesi,
atk-s0511a0:1593_3: na pana bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattampi daḍḍhuṃ samattho ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1593_5: na daḍḍho”ti olokento dasabalaṃ saradasamayavimalakaranikaraṃ sabbajanaratikaraṃ rajanikaramiva sītalajalatalagatakamalakaṇṇikāya
atk-s0511a0:1593_10: imaṃ pana samaṇaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ me paṭisaraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0511a0:1594_0: Athevaṃ pana so cintetvā bhagavato cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā –
atk-s0511a0:1594_4: So desanāpariyosāne dasahi yakkhasahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0511a0:1594_5: Tasmiṃ kira divase sakalajambudīpatalavāsino manussā tassa balikammatthaṃ ekekagāmato ekekaṃ purisaṃ āhariṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1594_7: Atha so yakkho taṃ divasaṃ ābhatataṇḍulādikaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃyeva datvā te balikammatthāya ānītamanusse dasabalassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0511a0:1595_0: Atha satthā te manusse ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā antosattāheyeva sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā māghapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0511a0:1595_5: pannarasūposathadivaso cāti imāni cattāri aṅgāni nāma.
atk-s0511a0:1599_0: Tattha pavivekagateti gaṇaṃ pahāya gate. Samiṃsūti sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1600_0: Yadā pana dīpaṅkaro lokanāyako sudassananāmake pabbate vassāvāsamupagañchi,
atk-s0511a0:1600_1: tadā kira jambudīpavāsino manussā anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ karonti.
atk-s0511a0:1600_2: Tasmiṃ kira samajje sannipatitā manussā dasabalaṃ disvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā tatra pasīditvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1600_3: Mahāpavāraṇadivase satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ vipassanākathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:1600_4: Taṃ sutvā te sabbe saṅkhāre sammasitvā vipassanānupubbena maggānupubbena ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1606_0: Ayaṃ gāthā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya nidānavaṇṇanāya dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse likhitā.
atk-s0511a0:1607_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati dhammaṃ desente dasasahassānañca vīsatisahassānañca dhammābhisamayo ahosiyeva.
atk-s0511a0:1607_1: Ekassa pana dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ catunnanti ca ādivasena abhisamayānaṃ anto natthi.
atk-s0511a0:1607_2: Tasmā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1611_5: Evaṃ asaṅkhyeyyābhisamayattā ca vitthārikaṃ mahantappattaṃ bahūhi paṇḍitehi devamanussehi niyyānikanti
atk-s0511a0:1611_6: jaññaṃ jānitabbaṃ adhisīlasikkhādīhi iddhañca samādhiādīhi phītañca ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1615_0: Tattha suvisodhitanti suṭṭhu bhagavatā sodhitaṃ visuddhaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1615_1: Dīpaṅkaraṃ kira satthāraṃ sabbakālaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cattāri satasahassāni parivārenti.
atk-s0511a0:1615_2: Tena ca samayena ye sekkhā kālakiriyaṃ karonti,
atk-s0511a0:1615_5: Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ supupphitaṃ susamiddhaṃ khīṇāsavehi bhikkhūhi ativiya sobhittha.
atk-s0511a0:1620_0: “Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1625_0: Tattha cattāri satasahassānīti gaṇanāya dassitā evaṃ dassitagaṇanā ime bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ “chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā”ti vuttanti evamattho gahetabbo.
atk-s0511a0:1625_1: Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṃ mahiddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1625_3: bhagavantaṃ muñcitvā katthaci na gacchantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a0:1625_6: saddo samavāyādīsu navasu atthesu dissati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:1627_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:1628_3: Appattamānasāti appattaṃ anadhigataṃ mānasaṃ yehi te appattamānasā.
atk-s0511a0:1628_4: Mānasanti rāgassa ca cittassa ca arahattassa ca adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1628_6: yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha pana rāgo “mānaso”ti vutto.
atk-s0511a0:1628_7: “Cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍara”nti ettha cittaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1628_29: Adhisīlampi sikkhati adhicittampi adhipaññampi sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu,
atk-s0511a0:1630_0: Tassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:1630_3: sumaṅgalo ca tisso cāti dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:1630_5: nandā ca sunandā cāti dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:1630_9: Kiṃ panimesaṃ jātanagarādīnaṃ dassane payojananti ce? Vuccate –
atk-s0511a0:1630_10: yassa yadi neva jātanagaraṃ na pitā na mātā paññāyeyya,
atk-s0511a0:1630_11: imassa pana neva jātanagaraṃ na pitā na mātā paññāyati,
atk-s0511a0:1630_12: devo vā sakko vā yakkho vā māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe,
atk-s0511a0:1630_13: devānampi īdisaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ anacchariyanti maññamānā na sotabbaṃ na saddahitabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1645_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1650_0: “Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0511a0:1652_0: Tattha sudevo nāma khattiyoti sudevo nāmassa khattiyo pitā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1652_4: Dīparukkho vāti sampajjalitadīpamālākulo dīparukkho viya ārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānapāripūrisampanno dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīro
atk-s0511a0:1652_6: Sālarājāva phullitoti pupphito sabbaphāliphullo sālarājarukkho viya ca sabbaphāliphullo yojanasatubbedho
atk-s0511a0:1652_7: pāricchatto viya ca asītihatthubbedho bhagavā ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a0:1653_6: Sā ca iddhīti sā ca sampatti ānubhāvo.
atk-s0511a0:1653_7: So ca yasoti so ca parivāro.
atk-s0511a0:1653_8: Sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti taṃ sabbaṃ vuttappakāraṃ sampattijātaṃ antarahitaṃ apagatanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1653_9: Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti sabbe pana saṅkhatadhammā nanu rittā tucchā,
atk-s0511a0:1654_14: Tassa pana dīpaṅkarassa bhariyānaṃ tisatasahassaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1661_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ pana pañca vemattāni honti āyuvemattaṃ pamāṇavemattaṃ kulavemattaṃ padhānavemattaṃ rasmivemattanti.
atk-s0511a0:1661_1: Tattha āyuvemattaṃ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā.
atk-s0511a0:1661_2: Tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato vassasatasahassaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:1662_0: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā.
atk-s0511a0:1663_0: Kulavemattaṃ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti keci brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a0:1664_0: Padhānavemattaṃ nāma kesañci padhānaṃ ittarameva hoti yathā kassapassa bhagavato,
atk-s0511a0:1665_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0511a0:1665_6: Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:1666_0: Tathā sabbabuddhānaṃ cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti.
atk-s0511a0:1666_4: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti.
atk-s0511a0:1666_6: So pana khuddako vā mahanto vā hoti.
atk-s0511a0:1667_0: Aparaṃ pana amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca visesaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1667_1: Amhākaṃ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako assarājā nidhikumbhā
atk-s0511a0:1667_7: Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca,
atk-s0511a0:1667_8: māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ceva āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:1668_0: Iti bhagavā dīpaṅkaro yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccaṃ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:1669_6: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tamhā kappā ādito paṭṭhāyuppannuppanne sabbabuddhe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:1672_0: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0511a0:1676_0: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0511a0:1686_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati parinibbute tassa sāsanaṃ vassasatasahassaṃ pavattittha.
atk-s0511a0:1686_1: Atha buddhānubuddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ antaradhānena sāsanampissa antaradhāyi.
atk-s0511a0:1686_2: Athassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṃ kappe koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:1686_3: So pana bhagavā soḷasaasaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappānañca satasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā bodhiñāṇaṃ paripācetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise
atk-s0511a0:1686_4: attabhāve ṭhatvā tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā
atk-s0511a0:1686_5: tusitapurato cavitvā rammavatīnagare sunandassa nāma rañño kule sujātāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:1686_6: Tassapi paṭisandhikkhaṇe dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṃse vuttappakārāni dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1686_7: So devatāhi katārakkhasaṃvidhāno dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito nikkhamitvā sabbasattuttaro uttarābhimukho
atk-s0511a0:1686_8: sattapadavītihārena gantvā sabbā ca disā viloketvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi –
atk-s0511a0:1687_0: Tato kumārassa nāmakaraṇadivase nāmaṃ karontā “koṇḍañño”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1687_2: Tassa kira tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ – rāma, surāma,
atk-s0511a0:1687_4: Tesu tīṇi satasahassāni nāṭakitthīnaṃ naccagītavāditakusalānaṃ sabbakālaṃ paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1688_0: So pana jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvā ājaññarathena nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ cari.
atk-s0511a0:1688_1: Koṇḍaññakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ dasa janakoṭiyo anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1688_2: So tehi parivuto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandagāme samasahitaghanapayodharāya
atk-s0511a0:1688_3: yasodharāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā phalapallavaṅkurasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a0:1688_4: sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye gaṇaṃ pahāya sunandakājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a0:1688_5: gahetvā sālakalyāṇirukkhaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbadisābhāgaṃ oloketvā bodhirukkhaṃ piṭṭhito
atk-s0511a0:1688_6: katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a0:1688_7: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ visodhetvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
atk-s0511a0:1688_8: visodhetvā pacchimayāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā
atk-s0511a0:1688_9: udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā cattāri maggañāṇāni
atk-s0511a0:1688_10: cattāri ca phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ cha
atk-s0511a0:1688_11: asādhāraṇañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhimūle nisinnova –
atk-s0511a0:1692_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1697_0: Paññāpetuṃ gatī natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:1698_0: Evaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimūleyeva phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ paṭicca –
atk-s0511a0:1698_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo addasa.
atk-s0511a0:1698_2: “Ime pana kulaputtā samupacitakusalamūlā maṃ pabbajantaṃ anupabbajitā mayā saddhiṃ padhānaṃ caritvā maṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:1698_3: handāhaṃ imesaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti evaṃ upadhāretvā –
atk-s0511a0:1698_6: “tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya,
atk-s0511a0:1699_0: Tasmiñca samaye tā dasa bhikkhukoṭiyo arundhavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya devavane viharanti.
atk-s0511a0:1699_1: Te pana bhikkhū dasabalaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānasā paccuggantvā,
atk-s0511a0:1699_7: Tatra koṇḍañño dasabalo munigaṇaparivuto buddhāsane nisinno tidasagaṇaparivuto dasasatanayano viya vimalagaganatalagato
atk-s0511a0:1699_8: saradasamayarajanikaro viya tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a0:1699_9: Atha satthā tesaṃ sabbabuddhanisevitaṃ anuttaraṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1712_0: Tattha dīpaṅkarassa aparenāti dīpaṅkarassa satthuno aparabhāgeti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1712_4: Heṭṭhato avīci upari bhavaggaṃ tiriyato anantā lokadhātuyo etthantare ekapuggalopi tassa mukhaṃ oloketvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:1712_7: Tassa hi bhagavato vassasatasahassāni yāva parinibbānasamayaṃ etthantare bhikkhuparisāya gaṇanaparicchedo nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0511a0:1713_0: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0511a0:1714_0: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:1716_2: catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā mahāpathavī viya pakativātena lābhālābhaiṭṭhāniṭṭhādīhi akampanabhāvato “dharaṇūpamo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:1717_3: Ñāṇena gaganūpamoti ettha bhagavato ñāṇassa anantabhāvena anantākāsena upamā katā.
