atk-s0511a0:1720_0: Tasmā anantassa ñāṇassa anantena ākāsena upamā katāti.
atk-s0511a0:1721_0: Indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggasaccappakāsananti etesaṃ indriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggasaccānaṃ gahaṇena satipaṭṭhānasammappadhāniddhipādāpi gahitāva honti.
atk-s0511a0:1721_1: Tasmā indriyādīnaṃ catusaṅkhepānaṃ vasena sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ pakāsanadhammaṃ pakāsesi,
atk-s0511a0:1722_0: Tato aparabhāge mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo sukhume attabhāve māpetvā imasmiññeva cakkavāḷe sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1722_1: Tattha kira aññataro devaputto koṇḍaññadasabalaṃ maṅgalapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0511a0:1726_3: yadā pana bhagavā gaganatale titthiyamānamaddanaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto dhammaṃ desesi tadā asītikoṭisahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1731_0: Koṇḍañño kira satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamavassaṃ candavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya candārāme vihāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1731_1: Tattha sucindharassa nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālassa putto bhaddamāṇavo nāma yasodharabrāhmaṇassa putto subhaddamāṇavo
atk-s0511a0:1731_2: ca koṇḍaññassa buddhassa sammukhā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannamānasā dasahi māṇavakasahassehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:1732_0: Atha koṇḍañño satthā jeṭṭhamāsapuṇṇamāya subhaddattherappamukhena koṭisatasahassena parivuto pātimokkhamuddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1732_2: Tato aparabhāge koṇḍaññasatthuno putte vijitasene nāma arahattaṃ patte taṃpamukhassa koṭisahassassa majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1732_4: Athāparena samayena dasabalo janapadacārikaṃ caranto udenarājānaṃ nāma navutikoṭijanaparivāraṃ pabbājesi saddhiṃ tāya parisāya.
atk-s0511a0:1732_5: Tasmiṃ pana arahattaṃ patte taṃpamukhehi navutiyā arahantakoṭīhi bhagavā parivuto pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1739_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā candavatīnagare paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a0:1739_1: So kira anekanaravaraparivuto salilanidhinivasanaṃ sameruyugandharaṃ aparimitavasudharaṃ vasundharaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena paripāleti.
atk-s0511a0:1739_2: Atha koṇḍañño buddhopi koṭisatasahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto janapadacārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena candavatīnagaraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:1740_1: “sammāsambuddho kira amhākaṃ nagaraṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā paccuggantvā bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0511a0:1740_2: svātanāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena nimantetvā punadivase bhattavidhiṃ suṭṭhu paṭiyādetvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa
atk-s0511a0:1740_5: temāsaṃ mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto idheva vasathā”ti yācitvā tayo māse nirantaraṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa asadisamahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1741_1: “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā dhammamassa desesi.
atk-s0511a0:1741_2: So satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rajjaṃ niyyātetvā pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca
atk-s0511a0:1741_3: ca abhiññāyo uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0511a0:1756_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a0:1784_0: Tameva atthaṃ sādhento, mahārajjaṃ jine adaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1792_0: Tattha ahaṃ tena samayenāti ahaṃ tasmiṃ samaye.
atk-s0511a0:1792_2: Samuddaṃ antamantenāti ettha cakkavāḷapabbataṃ sīmaṃ mariyādaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ samuddaṃ antaṃ katvā issariyaṃ vattayāmīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1793_0: Rājā kira cakkavattī cakkaratanānubhāvena vāmapassena sineruṃ katvā samuddassa uparibhāgena aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ pubbavidehaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0511a0:1793_8: Evaṃ ovāde dinne taṃ cakkaratanaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati.
atk-s0511a0:1793_10: tathā tathā saṃkhittaūmivipphāraṃ hutvā ogacchamānaṃ mahāsamuddasalilaṃ yojanamattaṃ oggantvā antosamuddaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1793_11: ubhosu passesu veḷuriyamaṇibhitti viya paramadassanīyaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a0:1793_12: evaṃ puratthimasāgarapariyantaṃ gantvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ paṭinivattati.
atk-s0511a0:1793_13: Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṃ sā parisā aggato hoti,
atk-s0511a0:1793_14: majjhe rājā cakkavattī ante cakkaratanaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a0:1793_15: Tampi jalaṃ jalantena viyogaṃ asahamānamiva nemimaṇḍalapariyantaṃ abhihanantameva tīramupagacchati.
atk-s0511a0:1794_0: Evaṃ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṃ pubbavidehaṃ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1794_1: jambudīpaṃ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho gacchati.
atk-s0511a0:1794_2: Taṃ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṃ jambudīpaṃ abhivijinitvā dakkhiṇasamuddato paccuttaritvā sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1794_3: aparagoyānaṃ vijetuṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi sāgarapariyantaṃ abhivijinitvā pacchimasamuddatopi
atk-s0511a0:1794_4: uttaritvā aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ uttarakuruṃ vijetuṃ tatheva gantvā taṃ samuddapariyantaṃ katvā tatheva
atk-s0511a0:1794_6: Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā sāgarapariyantāya pathaviyā issariyaṃ adhigataṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a0:1795_3: Saha lokagganāthenāti saddhiṃ dasabalena koṭisatasahassānanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1795_6: Aparimeyyito kappeti ito paṭṭhāya satasahassakappādhikāni tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā ekasmiṃ bhaddakappeti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1796_1: Tameva atthaṃ sādhentoti tameva buddhakārakamatthaṃ dānapāramiṃ pūrento sādhento nipphādentoti attho.

atk-s0511a0:1812_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1815_0: Yathā hi gaganamuḷūbhi, evaṃ so upasobhatha.
atk-s0511a0:1820_0: “Sā ca atuliyā jinassa iddhi, ñāṇaparibhāvito ca samādhi;

atk-s0511a0:1822_4: vicittā āsi medanīti ayaṃ medanī khīṇāsavehi ekakāsāvapajjotā vicittā paramadassanīyā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1822_7: tārāgaṇehi gaganatalaṃ viya khīṇāsavehi vicittā ayaṃ medanī sobhitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1823_3: Koṇḍaññabuddhassa kira kāle parinibbāyamānā bhikkhū sattatālappamāṇamākāsamabbhuggantvā asitajaladharavivaragatā
atk-s0511a0:1823_4: vijjulatā viya samantato vijjotamānā tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā nirupādānā dahanā viya parinibbāyiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1826_0: “Na heva dhātuyo tassa, satthuno, vikiriṃsu tā;
atk-s0511a0:1828_0: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgantvā sattayojanikaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ haritālamanosilāya mattikākiccaṃ telasappīhi udakakiccaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpesunti.
atk-s0511a0:1832_0: Koṇḍaññe kira satthari parinibbute tassa sāsanaṃ vassasatasahassaṃ pavattittha.
atk-s0511a0:1832_2: Koṇḍaññassa pana aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyamatikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattiṃsu maṅgalo, sumano, revato,
atk-s0511a0:1832_4: Tattha maṅgalo pana lokanāyako kappasatasahassādhikāni soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure
atk-s0511a0:1832_5: nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā pañcasu pubbanimittesu uppannesu buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi,
atk-s0511a0:1832_6: tadā dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatāyo ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe sannipatitvā āyācanti –
atk-s0511a0:1835_0: Evaṃ devehi āyācito katapañcavilokano tusitā kāyā cavitvā sabbanagaruttame uttaranagare anuttarassa uttarassa
atk-s0511a0:1835_1: nāma rañño kule uttarāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0511a0:1835_4: Tassā uttarāya kira mahādeviyā kucchismiṃ sabbalokamaṅgalassa maṅgalassa mahāsattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0511a0:1835_5: paṭṭhāya sarīrappabhā rattindivaṃ asītihatthappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pharitvā candālokasūriyālokehi anabhibhavanīyā
atk-s0511a0:1835_7: Sā ca aññenālokena vinā attano sarīrappabhāsamudayeneva andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā dhātīhi paricāriyamānā vicarati.
atk-s0511a0:1836_0: Sā kira devatāhi katārakkhā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena paramasurabhikusumaphaladharasākhāviṭape kamalakuvalayasamalaṅkate ruru- sīha- byaggha- gaja- gavaya-
atk-s0511a0:1836_1: mahiṃsapasadavividhamigagaṇavicarite paramaramaṇīye uttaramadhuruyyāne nāma maṅgaluyyāne maṅgalamahāpurisaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0511a0:1836_2: So jātamattova mahāsatto sabbā disā viloketvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0511a0:1836_3: Tasmiñca khaṇe sakaladasasahassilokadhātūsu devatā dissamānasarīrā dibbamālādīhi samalaṅkatagattā tattha
atk-s0511a0:1836_6: Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa lakkhaṇapāṭhakā sabbamaṅgalasampattiyā jātoti “maṅgalakumāro” tveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1837_0: Tassa kira yasavā rucimā sirimāti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1837_2: Tattha mahāsatto navavassasahassāni dibbasukhasadisaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavitvā yasavatiyā aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0511a0:1837_3: sīlavaṃ nāma puttaṃ labhitvā cattāri nimittāni disvā alaṅkataṃ paṇḍaraṃ nāma sundaraturaṅgavaramāruyha
atk-s0511a0:1837_5: Taṃ pana pabbajantaṃ tisso manussakoṭiyo anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1837_6: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso aṭṭha māse padhānacariyamacari.
atk-s0511a0:1838_0: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya uttaragāme uttaraseṭṭhino dhītāya uttarāya nāma dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1838_1: paribhuñjitvā surabhikusumālaṅkate nīlobhāse manorame sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā uttarena nāma
atk-s0511a0:1838_2: ājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā asitañjanagirisaṅkāsaṃ akkantavarakanakajālakūṭaṃva sītacchāyaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1838_3: vividhamigagaṇasampātavirahitaṃ mandamāluteritāya ghanasākhāya samalaṅkataṃ naccantamiva pītiyā virocamānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1838_4: nāgabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā mattavaranāgagāmī nāgabodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbuttarapasse ṭhatvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:1838_5: tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sabalaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1838_6: mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā pubbenivāsadibbacakkhuñāṇāni paṭilabhitvā paccayākārasammasanaṃ katvā khandhesu
atk-s0511a0:1838_7: aniccādivasena abhinivisitvā anukkamena anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā –
atk-s0511a0:1842_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a0:1845_0: Maṅgalassa pana sammāsambuddhassa aññehi buddhehi adhikatarā sarīrappabhā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1845_1: Yathā pana aññesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ samantā asītihatthappamāṇā vā byāmappamāṇā vā sarīrappabhā ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:1845_3: Tassa pana bhagavato sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1845_8: Divā sūriyālokena viya sattā niccaṃ buddhālokeneva sabbakammāni karontā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1845_9: Sāyaṃ pupphanakakusumānaṃ pāto ca ravanakasakuṇādīnañca vasena loko rattindivaparicchedaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_0: Kiṃ pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ayamānubhāvo natthīti?
atk-s0511a0:1846_2: Tepi hi ākaṅkhamānā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ tato vā bhiyyo ābhāya phareyyuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1846_3: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato pubbapatthanāvasena aññesaṃ byāmappabhā viya sarīrappabhā niccameva dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_4: So kira bodhisattakāle vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve saputtadāro vaṅkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_5: Atheko sabbajanaviheṭhako kharadāṭhiko nāma manussabhakkho mahesakkho yakkho mahāpurisassa dānajjhāsayataṃ
atk-s0511a0:1846_6: sutvā brāhmaṇavaṇṇena upasaṅkamitvā mahāsattaṃ dve dārake yāci.
atk-s0511a0:1846_7: Mahāsatto “dadāmi brāhmaṇassa puttake”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udakapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ kampento dve dārake adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_8: Atha kho yakkho tassa passantasseva mahāpurisassa taṃ brāhmaṇavaṇṇaṃ pahāya analajālapiṅgalavirūpanayano
atk-s0511a0:1846_10: hutvā te dārake muḷālakalāpaṃ viya gahetvā khādi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_11: Mahāpurisassa yakkhaṃ oloketvā mukhe vivaṭamatte aggijālaṃ viya lohitadhāraṃ uggirantaṃ tassa mukhaṃ disvāpi kesaggamattampi domanassaṃ na uppajji.
atk-s0511a0:1846_12: “Sudinnaṃ vata me dāna”nti cintayato panassa sarīre mahantaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_13: So “imassa me nissandena anāgate iminā nīhārena rasmiyo nikkhamantū”ti patthanamakāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1846_14: Tassa taṃ patthanaṃ nissāya buddhabhūtassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamitvā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ phariṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1847_1: Ayaṃ kira bodhisattakāle ekassa buddhassa cetiyaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:1847_2: “imassa buddhassa mama jīvitaṃ pariccajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti daṇḍadīpikāveṭhananiyāmena sakalasarīraṃ veṭhāpetvā
atk-s0511a0:1847_3: ratanamattamakuḷaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sugandhasappissa pūrāpetvā tattha sahassavaṭṭiyo
atk-s0511a0:1847_4: jāletvā taṃ sīsenādāya sakalasarīraṃ jālāpetvā jinacetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto sakalarattiṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a0:1847_5: Evaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vāyamantassa lomakūpamattampi usumaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0511a0:1847_7: Dhammo hi nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0511a0:1848_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0511a0:1849_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī”ti. ;
atk-s0511a0:1850_0: Imassāpi kammassa nissandena tassa sarīrobhāso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:1857_4: Tathāhi “saṇḍāsena jātarūpaṃ gahetvā ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne suvaṇṇakārānaṃ mūsā “ukkā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:1857_6: ukkaṃ bandhitvā ukkāmukhaṃ ālimpeyyā”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammārānaṃ aṅgārakapallaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1857_8: anto jhāyati no bahī”ti āgataṭṭhāne kammāruddhanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1857_13: avijjandhakārapaṭicchannassa avijjandhakārābhibhūtassa lokassa dhammamayaṃ ukkaṃ dhāresīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1858_5: Dasasahassī virocatīti candasūriyālokaṃ vinā buddhālokeneva dasasahassī virocatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1859_0: Maṅgalasammāsambuddho pana adhigatabodhiñāṇo bodhimūleyeva sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā –
atk-s0511a0:1859_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti upadhārento attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tisso koṭiyo upanissayasampannaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a0:1859_3: “ime kulaputtā maṃ pabbajantaṃ anupabbajitā upanissayasampannā ca,
atk-s0511a0:1859_4: te mayā visākhapuṇṇamāya vivekatthikena vissajjitā sirivaḍḍhananagaraṃ upanissāya sirivanagahanaṃ gantvā viharanti,
atk-s0511a0:1859_5: handāhaṃ tattha gantvā dhammaṃ tesaṃ desessāmī”ti attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā haṃsarājā viya gaganatalamabbhuggantvā sirivanagahane paccuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:1859_6: Te ca bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ vanditvā antevāsikavattaṃ dassetvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1862_0: Te te saccarasaṃ pītvā, vinodenti mahātamaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1866_1: Saccavaruttameti saccāni ca varāni ca saccavarāni,
atk-s0511a0:1866_5: Te teti te te devamanussā buddhena bhagavatā vinītā.
atk-s0511a0:1866_7: Vinodenti mahātamanti tena tena maggena pahātabbaṃ mohatamaṃ vinodenti,
atk-s0511a0:1867_0: “Magge phale ca nibbāne, rukkhe paññattiyaṃ tathā;
atk-s0511a0:1869_1: “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”ntiādīsu magge āgato.
atk-s0511a0:1869_4: “Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ettha assattharukkhe.
atk-s0511a0:1869_5: “Bodhi kho rājakumāro bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandatī”ti ettha paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:1869_11: Sambodhiṃ patvā dhammaṃ desentassa tassa bhagavato paṭhame dhammadesaneti attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0511a0:1870_0: Yadā pana cittaṃ nāma nagaraṃ upanissāya viharanto campakarukkhamūle kaṇḍambarukkhamūle amhākaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0511a0:1870_1: viya titthiyānaṃ mānamaddanaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā surāsurayuvatiratisambhavane ruciranavakanakarajatamayavarabhavane
atk-s0511a0:1870_2: tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakarukkhamūle paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā abhidhammaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a0:1870_5: Yadā pana sunando nāma cakkavattirājā surabhinagare pūritacakkavattivatto hutvā cakkaratanaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0511a0:1870_6: Taṃ kira maṅgaladasabale loke uppanne cakkaratanaṃ ṭhānā osakkitaṃ disvā sunando rājā vigatānando brāhmaṇe paripucchi –
atk-s0511a0:1870_9: Tato te tassa rañño osakkanakāraṇaṃ byākariṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1870_10: “Cakkavattirañño āyukkhayena vā pabbajjūpagamanena vā buddhapātubhāvena vā cakkaratanaṃ ṭhānā osakkatīti vatvā tuyhaṃ pana, mahārāja,
atk-s0511a0:1870_15: Taṃ sutvā sunando cakkavattirājā saparijano taṃ cakkaratanaṃ sirasā vanditvā āyāci –
atk-s0511a0:1871_0: Tato samupāgatānando sunando cakkavattirājā chattiṃsayojanaparimaṇḍalāya parisāya parivuto sabbalokamaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1871_1: maṅgaladasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā sasāvakasaṅghaṃ satthāraṃ mahādānena santappetvā arahantānaṃ koṭisatasahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1871_2: kāsikavatthāni datvā tathāgatassa sabbaparikkhāre datvā sakalalokavimhayakaraṃ bhagavato pūjaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a0:1871_3: maṅgalaṃ sabbalokanāthaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ vimalakamalamakuḷasamamañjaliṃ sirasi
atk-s0511a0:1871_5: Puttopi tassa anurājakumāro nāma tatheva nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:1872_0: Tadā sunandacakkavattirājappamukhānaṃ tesaṃ bhagavā anupubbikathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:1872_1: Sunando cakkavattī saddhiṃ parisāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:1872_2: Atha satthā tesaṃ pubbacariyaṃ olokento iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ disvā cakkajālasamalaṅkataṃ dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā – “etha,
atk-s0511a0:1872_4: Sabbe taṅkhaṇaṃyeva duvaṅgulakesā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ākappasampannā hutvā bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1882_3: Varuttamanti varo bhagavā uttamaṃ dhammabherinti attho.
atk-s0511a0:1883_0: Atha maṅgale kira lokanāthe mekhale pure viharante tasmiṃyeva pure sudevo ca dhammaseno ca māṇavakā māṇavakasahassaparivārā
atk-s0511a0:1883_2: Māghapuṇṇamāya dvīsu aggasāvakesu saparivāresu arahattaṃ pattesu satthā koṭisatasahassabhikkhugaṇamajjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1883_4: Puna uttarārāme nāma anuttare ñātisamāgame pabbajitānaṃ koṭisatasahassānaṃ samāgame pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1883_6: Sunandacakkavattibhikkhugaṇasamāgame navutikoṭisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:1890_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto surucibrāhmaṇagāme suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:1890_1: sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1890_2: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasabalassa madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā saraṇaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0511a0:1890_3: “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti sasāvakasaṅghaṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantesi.
atk-s0511a0:1890_11: sabbehipi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi.
atk-s0511a0:1891_0: Brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ svātanāya nimantetvā attano gharaṃ gacchanto cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:1891_3: Tassa kira sā cintanā caturāsītiyojanasahassappamāṇe merumatthake ṭhitassa devarājassa dasasatanayanassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhākāraṃ janesi.
atk-s0511a0:1891_4: Atha sakko devarājā āsanassa uṇhabhāvaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:1891_5: “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti samuppannaparivitakko dibbena cakkhunā manussalokaṃ olokento mahāpurisaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:1891_6: “ayaṃ mahāsatto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā tassa nisīdanatthāya cintesi,
atk-s0511a0:1891_7: mayāpi tattha gantvā puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakīvaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā vāsipharasuhattho mahāpurisassa purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1891_8: So “atthi nu kho kassaci bhatiyā kattabbakamma”nti āha.
atk-s0511a0:1892_0: Mahāsatto disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:1892_2: yo yo yaṃ yaṃ icchati maṇḍapaṃ vā pāsādaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci nivesanādikaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1892_3: tassa tassa taṃ taṃ kātuṃ samatthomhī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:1892_12: So dvādasayojanappamāṇo padeso kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samatalo paramaramaṇīyo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1892_13: Puna so “ettake ṭhāne sattaratanamayo daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo maṇḍapo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi.
atk-s0511a0:1892_14: Tato tāvadeva maṇḍapasadiso pathavitalaṃ bhinditvā maṇḍapo uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0511a0:1892_15: Tassa sovaṇṇamayesu thambhesu rajatamayā ghaṭakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1893_0: Tato maṇḍapassa antarantarāpi kiṅkiṇikajālā olambatū”ti olokesi,
atk-s0511a0:1893_2: yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikasseva turiyassa paramamanoramo madhuro saddo niccharati,
atk-s0511a0:1893_6: “Koṭisatasahassasaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni ca kappiyamahagghapaccattharaṇāni ādhārakāni ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintesi,
atk-s0511a0:1893_9: taṅkhaṇaṃyeva udakacāṭiyo paramasītalena madhurena suvisuddhasugandhakappiyavārinā puṇṇā kadalipaṇṇapihitamukhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:1893_10: So dasasatanayano ettakaṃ māpetvā brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā – “ehi, ayya,
atk-s0511a0:1893_11: tava maṇḍapaṃ disvā mayhaṃ bhatiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:1893_13: Tassa olokentasseva sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:1894_2: mayhaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ āgamma addhā sakkassa devarañño bhavanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:1894_3: tato sakkena devānamindena ayaṃ maṇḍapo nimmito”ti.
atk-s0511a0:1894_4: “Na kho pana me yuttaṃ evarūpe maṇḍape ekadivasaṃyeva dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0511a0:1894_6: Bāhirakadānaṃ nāma tattakampi samānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ hadayaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,

atk-s0511a0:2096_0: Athāparena samayena nagaruttare uttare nagare sabbārindamo arindamo nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2096_1: So kira bhagavantaṃ attano nagaramanuppattaṃ sutvā tīhi janakoṭīhi parivuto bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a0:2096_2: svātanāya nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā tigāvutavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:2096_4: Atha bhagavā tassa manonukūlaṃ vicittanayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:2101_0: Athāparena samayena revato satthā uttaranigamaṃ nāma upanissāya viharanto sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:2101_1: Tadā kira uttaranigamavāsino manussā yāgubhattakhajjakabhesajjapānakādīni āharitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhikkhū paripucchiṃsu – “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0511a0:2101_5: Athātīte tasmiṃ sattāhe bhagavantaṃ nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitaṃ saradasamaye sūriyo viya attano anūpamāya
atk-s0511a0:2101_6: buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṃsaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2101_7: Bhagavā ca tesaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā guṇānisaṃsaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:2105_0: Sudhaññavatīnagare paṭhamamahāpātimokkhuddese ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattānaṃ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2105_1: Mekhalanagare koṭisatasahassasaṅkhātānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2105_2: Revatassa pana bhagavato dhammacakkānuvattako varuṇo nāma aggasāvako paññavantānaṃ aggo ābādhiko ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2105_3: Tattha gilānapucchanatthāya sampattamahājanassa lakkhaṇattayaparidīpakaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā koṭisatasahassaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2105_4: purisānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā caturaṅginike sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:2114_0: So tadā byādhito āsi, patto jīvitasaṃsayaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2118_1: Patto jīvitasaṃsayanti ettha jīvite saṃsayaṃ jīvitasaṃsayaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:2118_3: na vā pāpuṇātīti evaṃ jīvitasaṃsayaṃ patto,
atk-s0511a0:2118_5: na maratīti jīvite saṃsayaṃ pattoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2118_6: Ye tadā upagatā munīti iti dīghabhāve sati bhikkhūnaṃ upari hoti,
atk-s0511a0:2118_7: rasse anussarena saddhiṃ varuṇassa upari hoti.
atk-s0511a0:2119_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā brāhmaṇadhamme pāraṃ gato revataṃ
atk-s0511a0:2119_1: sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya silokasahassena dasabalaṃ kittetvā
atk-s0511a0:2119_4: “ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2122_0: Upagantvā revataṃ buddhaṃ, saraṇaṃ tassa gañchahaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2137_0: Āharissāmi taṃ dhammaṃ, yaṃ mayhaṃ abhipatthita”nti.
atk-s0511a0:2138_0: Tattha saraṇaṃ tassa gañchahanti taṃ saraṇaṃ agañchiṃ ahaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:2138_16: Yaṃ mayhaṃ abhipatthitanti yaṃ mayā abhipatthitaṃ buddhattaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:2139_0: Tassa pana revatassa bhagavato nagaraṃ sudhaññavatī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2139_3: varuṇo ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2139_5: bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2141_0: Divā ceva tadā rattiṃ, niccaṃ pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2164_0: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2167_0: Tāvatā diṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2172_0: “So ca kāyo ratananibho, so ca dhammo asādiso;
atk-s0511a0:2174_5: So ca kāyo ratananibhoti so ca tassa bhagavato kāyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo.
atk-s0511a0:2178_0: Tassa pana aparabhāge tassa sāsanepi antarahite sobhito nāma bodhisatto kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0511a0:2178_1: asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devehi āyācito tusitapurato
atk-s0511a0:2178_2: cavitvā sudhammanagare sudhammarājassa kule sudhammāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:2178_3: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sudhammuyyāne mātukucchito parisuddhavirājitaghanameghapaṭalato puṇṇacando viya nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2178_4: Tassa paṭisandhiyaṃ jātiyañca pāṭihāriyāni pubbe vuttappakārāni.
atk-s0511a0:2179_0: So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasitvā sattattiṃsanāṭakitthisahassānaṃ aggāya aggamahesiyā makhiladeviyā
atk-s0511a0:2179_1: kucchismiṃ sīhakumāre nāma putte uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā sañjātasaṃvego pāsādeyeva pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a0:2179_2: tattheva ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ bhāvetvā cattāri jhānāni paṭilabhitvā sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyamacari.
atk-s0511a0:2179_3: Tato makhilamahādeviyā dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā abhinikkhamanatthāya cittamuppādesi –
atk-s0511a0:2179_4: “ayaṃ pāsādo alaṅkatapaṭiyatto mahājanassa passantasseva ākāsena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ majjhekatvā pathaviyaṃ otaratu,
atk-s0511a0:2179_5: imā ca itthiyo mayi bodhimūle nisinne avuttā sayameva pāsādato nikkhamantū”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2179_6: Sahacittuppādā pāsādo ca sudhammarājabhavanato uppatitvā asitañjanasaṅkāsamākāsamabbhuggañchi.
atk-s0511a0:2179_7: So samosaritasurabhikusumadāmasamalaṅkatapāsādatalo sakalampi gaganatalaṃ samalaṅkurumāno viya kanakarasadhārāsadisarucirakaranikaro
atk-s0511a0:2179_8: divasakaro viya ca saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca virocamāno vilambamānavividhavicittakiṅkiṇikajālo yassa
atk-s0511a0:2179_9: kira vāteritassa sukusalajanavāditassa pañcaṅgikassa turiyassa viya saddo vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2180_0: Dūrato paṭṭhāya suyyamānena madhurena sarena sattānaṃ sotāni odahamāno gharacaccaracatukkavīthiādīsu
atk-s0511a0:2180_1: ṭhatvā pavattitakathāsallāpesu manussesu nātinīcena nātiuccena taruvaravanamatthakāvidūrenākāsena palobhayamāno
atk-s0511a0:2180_2: viya taruvarasākhānānāratanajutivisarasamujjalena vaṇṇena jananayanāni ākaḍḍhento viya ca puññānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2180_4: Tattha nāṭakitthiyopi pañcaṅgikassa varaturiyassa madhurena sarena upagāyiṃsu ceva vilapiṃsu ca.
atk-s0511a0:2180_8: surabhikusumavasanābharaṇasobhitā amaravarasenā viya paramaruciradassanā dharaṇī viya gaganatalena pāsādaṃ parivāretvā agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2181_0: Tato pāsādo gantvā aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ ujuvipulavaṭṭakkhandhaṃ kusumapallavamakulasamalaṅkataṃ nāgarukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2181_2: Nāṭakitthiyo ca kenaci avuttāva tato pāsādato otaritvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2181_3: Anekaguṇasobhito kira sobhitopi mahāpuriso mahājanakataparivāroyeva rattiyā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjāyo uppādesi.
atk-s0511a0:2181_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammajjhesanaṃ paṭijānitvā –
atk-s0511a0:2181_9: “kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti buddhacakkhunā olokento attano vemātike kaniṭṭhabhātike asamakumārañca sunettakumārañca disvā –
atk-s0511a0:2181_10: “ime dve kumārā upanissayasampannā gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā,
atk-s0511a0:2181_11: handāhaṃ imesaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ākāsenāgantvā sudhammuyyāne otaritvā dvepi kumāre uyyānapālena pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0511a0:2181_12: tehi saparivārehi parivuto mahājanamajjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2194_3: sakagehe ṭhatvā sattadivasabbhantareyeva puthujjanabhāvato cittaṃ vinivattetvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2194_9: Ahūti gaṇanāya na vattabbā parisā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2195_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagaradvāre cittapāṭaliyā mūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā navakanakamaṇimayabhavane
atk-s0511a0:2195_1: tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā abhidhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:2199_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagare jayaseno nāma rājakumāro yojanappamāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā asokassakaṇṇacampakanāgapunnāgavakulasurabhicūtapanasāsanasālakunda-
atk-s0511a0:2199_1: sahakārakaravīrāditaruvaranirantaraṃ ārāmaṃ ropetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0511a0:2199_2: Dānānumodanaṃ katvā yāgaṃ vaṇṇetvā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:2206_0: Puna uggato nāma rājā sunandanagare sunandaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2206_1: Tasmiṃ dāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ koṭisataṃ arahantānaṃ sannipāto,
atk-s0511a0:2206_2: tesaṃ majjhe sobhito bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:2206_4: Puna mekhalānagare dhammagaṇo dhammagaṇārāmaṃ nāma pavarārāmaṃ mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a0:2206_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā saha sabbaparikkhārehi dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2206_6: Tasmiṃ samāgame ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajitānaṃ navutiyā arahantakoṭīnaṃ sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:2206_8: Yadā pana bhagavā dasasatanayanapure vassaṃ vasitvā pavāraṇāya suravaraparivuto otari,
atk-s0511a0:2206_9: tadā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi saddhiṃ caturaṅgike sannipāte pavāresi.
atk-s0511a0:2211_0: “Uggato nāma so rājā, dānaṃ deti naruttame;
atk-s0511a0:2219_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare ubhato sujāto ‘sujāto’ nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā sobhitassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a0:2219_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa temāsaṃ mahādānamadāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2219_2: Sopi naṃ “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2231_2: “anāgate ayaṃ gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “avitathavacanā hi buddhā”ti buddhattappattiatthanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2232_0: Tassa pana sobhitassa bhagavato sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2232_3: asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2232_5: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2241_0: Bujjhamāno ca so buddho, nāgamūle abujjhatha.
atk-s0511a0:2253_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2258_0: “So ca buddho asamasamo, tepi sāvakā balappattā;
atk-s0511a0:2264_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhuppādarahitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2264_1: Atīte pana tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṃ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti.
atk-s0511a0:2264_2: Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a0:2264_3: devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṃ nāma rājadhāniyaṃ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya
atk-s0511a0:2264_4: yasodharāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:2264_5: Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2264_7: Sā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena bodhisattaṃ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi.
atk-s0511a0:2265_1: yasmā jātiyaṃ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:2265_3: So anukkamena vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a0:2265_4: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2265_6: So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2266_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ cari.
atk-s0511a0:2266_1: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a0:2266_2: sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:2266_3: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2266_4: ābhujitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā –
atk-s0511a0:2271_0: “So chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbaṃ, viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a0:2278_0: Byāharantaṃ giraṃ sutvā, amataṃ pāpuṇanti te”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2279_6: aññena devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2279_7: So chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbanti sabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ chinditvā.
atk-s0511a0:2279_8: Viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṃsetvā,
atk-s0511a0:2279_10: Anivattigamanaṃ magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ anivattīti vuccati,
atk-s0511a0:2279_12: Taṃ anivattigamanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2280_1: Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo,
atk-s0511a0:2280_3: Ākāsova anantoti yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi,
atk-s0511a0:2280_5: evaṃ bhagavāpi buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro.
atk-s0511a0:2280_7: Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2280_8: Dassanenapi taṃ buddhanti tassa buddhassa dassanenāpīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2280_15: Teti ye tassa giraṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0511a0:2281_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2281_1: olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne disvā –
atk-s0511a0:2281_2: “kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari.
atk-s0511a0:2281_3: So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2286_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā asurehi durabhibhavane
atk-s0511a0:2286_1: tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinno temāsaṃ abhidhammavassaṃ vassāpayi.
atk-s0511a0:2290_0: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a0:2291_0: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2296_1: Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2296_4: Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ sattannaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2296_7: Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ channaṃ arahantasatasahassānaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:2309_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi.
atk-s0511a0:2310_3: Rāgo aṅgaṇaṃ doso aṅgaṇaṃ moho aṅgaṇa”nti.
atk-s0511a0:2310_7: “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2310_12: Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṃ atthi te tapassino,
atk-s0511a0:2311_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
atk-s0511a0:2311_1: So “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā paramaruciradassanaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ abhirucirarajanikaramaṇḍalasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2311_2: maṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2311_3: Atha naṃ bhagavā bhattānumodanasamaye “anāgate kappasatasahassādhike ekasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye atikkante gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2326_0: Tattha uttariṃ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṃ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2327_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2327_3: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2327_5: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2327_13: Sivikāyānena gamanaṃ pana sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2342_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2347_0: “So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a0:2349_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati.
atk-s0511a0:2349_1: Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṃ dvādasayojanappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0511a0:2349_3: Sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṃ sabbampi aniccamukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vinaṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2349_5: tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe saṅkhārāti attho. Ma-
atk-s0511a0:2350_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2350_1: Imesaṃ pana therānaṃ vatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2354_0: Anomadassissa pana bhagavato aparabhāge vassasatasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā
atk-s0511a0:2354_1: hutvā puna anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyamānā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2354_2: Tathā padumo nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0511a0:2354_3: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā campakanagare asamassa nāma rañño kule rūpādīhi
atk-s0511a0:2354_4: asamāya asamāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:2354_5: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena campakuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2354_6: Jāte pana kumāre ākāsato sakalajambudīpe samuddapariyante padumavassaṃ nipati.
atk-s0511a0:2354_7: Tenassa nāmaggahaṇadivase nāmaṃ gaṇhantā nemittakā ca ñātakā ca “mahāpadumakumāro”tveva nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2355_0: Atha mahāsatto uttarāya nāma mahādeviyā rammakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2355_2: So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya dhaññavatīnagare sudhaññaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0511a0:2355_3: dhītāya dhaññavatiyā nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā mahāsālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a0:2355_4: titthakājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā mahāsoṇabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:2355_5: tiṇasantharakaṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā tīsu
atk-s0511a0:2355_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno āyācanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2355_9: adhivāsetvā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte puggale upaparikkhanto attanā saha pabbajite koṭisaṅkhe bhikkhū
atk-s0511a0:2355_10: disvā taṅkhaṇeyeva anilapathena gantvā dhaññavatīnagarasamīpe dhanañjayuyyāne otaritvā tehi parivuto
atk-s0511a0:2365_0: Tattha asamaṃ sīlanti aññesaṃ sīlena asadisaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:2365_10: Tassa “tayo abhisamayā”ti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:2366_0: Athāparena samayena padumo bhagavā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ sālakumārañca upasālakumārañca ñātisamāgame
atk-s0511a0:2366_1: saparivāre pabbājetvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento navuti koṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:2373_0: Yadā pana subhāvitatto nāma rājā padumassa buddhassa buddhapadumavadanassa santike koṭisatasahassaparivāro ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajito,
atk-s0511a0:2374_0: Athāparena samayena mahāpadumo munivasabho usabhasamagatī usabhavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0511a0:2374_3: Tattha ca bahavo manussā pasannacittā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2374_4: Tato dasabalo tehi ca aññehi ca tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresi.
atk-s0511a0:2374_7: te kathinānisaṃsaṃ sutvā pāṭipade pañcasu māsesu pañcānisaṃsadāyakaṃ kathinacīvaramadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2374_8: Tato taṃ bhikkhū dhammasenāpatiṃ aggasāvakaṃ visālamatiṃ sālattheraṃ kathinatthāratthaṃ yācitvā kathinacīvaraṃ tassādaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2374_9: Therassa kathinacīvare kayiramāne bhikkhū sibbane sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2374_10: Padumo pana sammāsambuddho sūcicchidde suttāni āvunitvā adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2374_11: Niṭṭhite pana cīvare bhagavā tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a0:2375_0: Athāparena samayena sīhavikkantagāmī purisasīho viya buddhasīho gosiṅgasālavanasadise paramasurabhikusumaphalabhāravinamitasākhāviṭape
atk-s0511a0:2375_1: vimalakamalakuvalayasamalaṅkate sisiramadhuravārivāhena paripūrite ruru- camara- sīha- byaggha- aja- haya- gavaya-
atk-s0511a0:2375_3: samantato gumbagumbāyamāne phalarasapamuditahadayāhi kākalisadisamadhuravirutāhi kokilavadhūhi upagīyamāne
atk-s0511a0:2375_4: paramaramaṇīye vivitte vijane yogānukūle pavane vassāvāsamupagañchi.
atk-s0511a0:2375_5: Tasmiṃ viharantaṃ saparivārakaṃ dasabalaṃ tathāgataṃ dhammarājaṃ buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā manussā
atk-s0511a0:2375_6: tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2388_9: “Tadā āsi samāgamo”tipi pāṭho yadi atthi sundaro bhaveyya.
atk-s0511a0:2389_0: Tadā tathāgate tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vasante amhākaṃ bodhisatto sīho hutvā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0511a0:2389_1: nisinnaṃ disvā pasannacitto hutvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sañjātapītisomanasso tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā
atk-s0511a0:2389_2: sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2389_3: Atha satthā tassa sattāhassa accayena nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya narasīho sīhaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0511a0:2407_6: Manasā cintayitvānāti “sabbepi bhikkhū idha āgacchantū”ti manasāva cintetvā.
atk-s0511a0:2408_0: Tassa pana padumassa bhagavato campakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2408_3: sālo ca upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2408_5: rādhā ca surādhā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2408_9: rūpādīhi guṇehi anuttarā uttarā nāmassa aggamahesī,
atk-s0511a0:2420_0: Pabhā niddhāvatī tassa, asamā sabbato disā.
atk-s0511a0:2423_0: Sabbāpi tā hatā honti, patvā jinapabhuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2426_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2432_0: Jahitvā sabbasaṅkhāre, nibbuto so yathā sikhī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2433_0: Tattha ratanaggimaṇippabhāti ratanappabhā ca aggippabhā ca maṇippabhā ca.
atk-s0511a0:2433_2: Jinapabhuttamanti jinassa sarīrappabhaṃ uttamaṃ patvā hatāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2433_9: Yathā sikhīti aggi viya nirupādāno nibbutiṃ sugato gatoti.
atk-s0511a0:2437_0: Padumabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite vassasatasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyamānā dasavassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2437_1: Puna vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā parihāyamānā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2437_2: Tadā dasabaladharo tevijjo catuvesārajjavisārado vimuttisārado nārado nāma narasattuttamo satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:2437_3: So cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0511a0:2437_4: dhaññavatī nāma nagare sakavīriyavijitavāsudevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule aggamahesiyā nirūpamāya
atk-s0511a0:2437_5: anomāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:2437_6: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena dhanañjayuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2437_7: Nāmaggahaṇadivase pana nāmakaraṇe kayiramāne sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ upabhogakkhamāni anurūpāni ābharaṇāni ākāsato kapparukkhādīhi patiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2437_8: Tenassa narānaṃ arahāni ābharaṇāni adāsīti “nārado”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2438_1: Vijito vijitāvī vijitābhirāmoti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2438_2: Tassa nāradakumārassa kulasīlācārarūpasampannaṃ manonukūlaṃ vijitasenaṃ nāma ativiya dhaññaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ aggamahesiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2438_3: Taṃ ādiṃ katvā vīsatisahassādhikaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2438_4: Tassā vijitasenāya deviyā sabbalokānandakare nanduttarakumāre nāma jāte so cattāri nimittāni disvā caturaṅginiyā
atk-s0511a0:2438_5: mahatiyā senāya parivuto nānāvirāgatanuvaravasananivasano āmukkamuttāhāramaṇikuṇḍalo varakeyūramakuṭakaṭakadharo
atk-s0511a0:2438_6: paramasurabhigandhakusumasamalaṅkato padasāva uyyānaṃ gantvā sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā bhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0511a0:2438_9: Taṃ sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sinerumuddhani sattaratanamayaṃ cetiyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2439_0: Mahāpuriso pana devadattāni kāsāyāni vatthāni paridahitvā tattheva uyyāne pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2439_2: So sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya vijitasenāya aggamahesiyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2439_3: paribhuñjitvā tattheva uyyāne divāvihāraṃ katvā sudassanuyyānapālena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0511a0:2439_4: mahāsoṇabodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā nisīditvā mārabalaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2439_5: vidhamitvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā –
atk-s0511a0:2439_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā brahmuno yācito paṭiññaṃ datvā dhanañjayuyyāne
atk-s0511a0:2439_8: attanā saha pabbajitehi satasahassabhikkhūhi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2454_0: Pāpuṇī kevalaṃ bodhiṃ, buddhañāṇe ca cuddasa.
atk-s0511a0:2458_3: dayito orasi gahetvā lālito putto dayitaoraso nāma.
atk-s0511a0:2459_0: Tatthāsi rukkhoti tasmiṃ uyyāne eko kira rukkho rattasoṇo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2459_1: So kira navutihatthubbedho samavaṭṭakkhandho sampannavividhaviṭapasākho nīlabahalavipulapalāso sandacchāyo
atk-s0511a0:2459_2: devatādhivuṭṭhattā vigatavividhavihagagaṇasañcāro dharaṇītalatilakabhūto tarurajjaṃ viya kurumāno paramaramaṇīyadassano
atk-s0511a0:2459_5: sabbalokavikhyāto attano sampattiyā sabbattha pākaṭo vissutoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2459_9: Tamajjhappatvāti taṃ soṇarukkhaṃ patvā adhipatvā upagammāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2460_4: Tena vicini saṅkhāreti tena vipassanāñāṇena rūpādike saṅkhāre vicini.
atk-s0511a0:2460_5: Ukkujjamavakujjakanti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca vicinīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2460_6: Tasmā paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena
atk-s0511a0:2460_7: samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggānukkamena sakale buddhaguṇe
atk-s0511a0:2461_5: Abhivāhayīti maggodhinā ca kilesodhinā ca sabbe kilese abhivāhayi,
atk-s0511a0:2461_11: cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti evamimāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni nāma, ca-
atk-s0511a0:2461_13: tena aparānipi catasso paṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇāni
atk-s0511a0:2461_14: dasabalañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2462_0: Evaṃ buddhattaṃ patvā brahmāyācanaṃ adhivāsetvā dhanañjayuyyāne attanā saha pabbajite satasahassabhikkhū sammukhe katvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2462_2: Tadā kira mahādoṇanagare doṇo nāma nāgarājā gaṅgātīre paṭivasati mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo mahājanena sakkato garukato mānito pūjito.
atk-s0511a0:2462_3: So yasmiṃ visaye janapadavāsino manussā tassa balikammaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0511a0:2462_4: tesaṃ visayaṃ avassena vā ativassena vā sakkharavassena vā vināseti.
atk-s0511a0:2463_0: Atha tīradassano nārado satthā doṇassa nāgarājassa vinayane bahūnaṃ pāṇīnaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā mahatā
atk-s0511a0:2463_3: ettha ghoraviso uggatejo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo nāgarājā paṭivasati,
atk-s0511a0:2463_4: so taṃ mā viheṭhessati na gantabba”nti.
atk-s0511a0:2463_5: Bhagavā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2463_6: Gantvā ca tatthassa nāgarājassa sakkāratthāya kate paramasurabhigandhe pupphasanthare nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:2463_7: Mahājano kira “nāradassa ca munirājassa doṇassa ca nāgarājassa dvinnampi yuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipati.
atk-s0511a0:2464_0: Atha ahināgo munināgaṃ tathā nisinnaṃ disvā makkhaṃ asahamāno sandissamānakāyo hutvā padhūpāyi.
atk-s0511a0:2464_4: Atha so nāgarājā dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhantāhi dhūmajālāhi ativiya kilantasarīro dukkhaṃ asahamāno “visavegena naṃ māressāmī”ti visaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0511a0:2464_6: Taṃ pana visaṃ dasabalassa sarīre ekalomampi kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0511a0:2464_8: “kā nu kho samaṇassa pavattī”ti olokento saradasamaye sūriyaṃ viya candaṃ viya ca paripuṇṇaṃ chabbaṇṇāhi
atk-s0511a0:2464_11: mayā pana attano balaṃ ajānantena aparaddha”nti cintetvā tāṇaṃ gavesī bhagavantaṃyeva saraṇamupagañchi.
atk-s0511a0:2464_12: Atha nārado munirājā taṃ nāgarājaṃ vinetvā tattha sannipatitassa mahājanassa cittappasādanatthaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2471_0: Tattha pāṭiheraṃ tadākāsīti akāsi yamakapāṭihāriyanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2472_0: Yadā pana attano puttaṃ nanduttarakumāraṃ ovadi,
atk-s0511a0:2476_0: Yadā pana thullakoṭṭhitanagare bhaddasālo ca vijitamitto ca dve brāhmaṇasahāyakā amatarahadaṃ gavesamānā
atk-s0511a0:2476_3: “ayaṃ loke vivaṭacchado sammāsambuddho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavati sañjātasaddhā saparivārā bhagavato santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2476_4: Tesu pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattesu bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassamajjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2480_0: Yasmiṃ samaye nārado sammāsambuddho ñātisamāgame attano paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a0:2485_0: Yadā pana mahādoṇanāgarājassa vinayane pasanno verocano nāma nāgarājā gaṅgāya nadiyā tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2485_1: sattaratanamayaṃ maṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā saparivāro sajanapade
atk-s0511a0:2485_2: attano dānaggadassanatthāya nimantetvā nāganāṭakāni ca tāḷāvacare vividhavesālaṅkāradhare sannipātetvā
atk-s0511a0:2485_4: Bhojanāvasāne bhagavā mahāgaṅgaṃ otārento viya anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2485_5: Tadā bhattānumodane dhammaṃ sutvā pasannānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ asītibhikkhusatasahassānaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2490_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapasse assamaṃ māpetvā pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ca ciṇṇavasī hutvā paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a0:2490_1: Atha tasmiṃ anukampāya nārado bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi dasahi ca anāgāmiphalaṭṭhehi upāsakasahassehi parivuto taṃ assamapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2490_2: Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvāva pamuditahadayo saparivārassa bhagavato nivāsatthāya assamaṃ māpetvā sakalarattiṃ
atk-s0511a0:2490_3: satthuguṇaṃ kittetvā bhagavato dhammakathaṃ sutvā punadivase uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato āhāraṃ āharitvā
atk-s0511a0:2490_5: Evaṃ sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā himavantato anagghaṃ lohitacandanaṃ āharitvā tena lohitacandanena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0511a0:2490_6: Tadā naṃ dasabalo amaranaraparivuto dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0511a0:2505_5: tesu asamasamesu samo “asamasamasamo”ti vattabbe ekassa samasaddassa lopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:2505_11: Bhiyyo hāsetva mānasanti uttarimpi hāsetvā tosetvā hadayaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2505_12: Adhiṭṭhahiṃ vataṃ ugganti uggaṃ vataṃ adhiṭṭhāsiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2506_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nāradassa dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2506_3: bhaddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2506_5: uttarā ca phaggunī ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2506_12: vijito vijitāvī vijitābhirāmoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2523_0: “Na keci tena samayena, samantā yojane janā;
atk-s0511a0:2527_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2533_0: Dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, nibbuto so narāsabho.
atk-s0511a0:2537_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocati,
atk-s0511a0:2537_5: Tattha byāmappabhā kāyāti byāmappabhā viyāti byāmappabhā,
atk-s0511a0:2538_5: Ukkā vā padīpe vā kecipi janā na ujjālenti na pajjālenti.
atk-s0511a0:2539_2: tatheva tassa sāsanaṃ arahantehi vicittaṃ upasobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2539_4: Sesake paṭipannaketi arahante ṭhapetvā kalyāṇaputhujjanehi saddhiṃ sese sekkhapuggaleti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2539_6: sesapuggale saṃsārato tāretuṃ dhammasetuṃ ṭhapetvā katasabbakicco hutvā parinibbāyīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2543_2: Tato paraṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhā loke na uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2543_4: Tato kappesu ca asaṅkhyeyyesu vītivattesu ito kappasatasahassamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe eko vijitamāro ohitabhāro
atk-s0511a0:2543_5: merusāro asaṃsāro sattasāro sabbalokuttaro padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:2543_6: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā haṃsavatīnagare sabbajanānandakarassānandassa
atk-s0511a0:2543_7: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā uditoditakule jātāya sujātāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:2543_8: Sā devatāhi katārakkhā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena haṃsavatuyyāne padumuttarakumāraṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0511a0:2543_9: Paṭisandhiyañcassa jātiyañca heṭṭhā vuttappakārāni pāṭihāriyāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2544_5: vasavattināmakā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2544_6: Vasudattādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassāni vīsatisahassāni ca paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2544_7: So vasudattāya deviyā putte sabbaguṇānuttare uttarakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā –
atk-s0511a0:2544_9: Tassa cintitamatteva vasavattināmako pāsādo kumbhakāracakkaṃ viya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā devavimānamiva
atk-s0511a0:2544_10: puṇṇacando viya ca gaganatalena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ majjhekaronto sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya āgatapāsādo
atk-s0511a0:2545_0: Mahāpuriso kira tato pāsādato otaritvā arahattaddhajabhūtāni kāsāyāni vatthāni devadattiyāni pārupitvā tattheva pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2545_2: Mahāsattena sahagatāya parisāya ṭhapetvā itthiyo sabbe pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2545_3: Mahāpuriso tehi saha sattāhaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya ujjeninigame rucānandaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a0:2545_4: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sumittājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a0:2545_5: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā salalabodhiṃ upagantvā taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2545_6: santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhame yāme
atk-s0511a0:2545_7: pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dutiye yāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā tatiye yāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato
atk-s0511a0:2545_8: vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2545_9: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a0:2545_11: Tadā kira dasasahassacakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ sakalampi alaṅkarontaṃ viya padumavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0511a0:2550_0: “Maṇḍakappo vā so āsi, yamhi buddho ajāyatha;
atk-s0511a0:2552_1: Maṇḍakappo vā so āsīti ettha yasmiṃ kappe dve sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a0:2552_3: Duvidho hi kappo suññakappo asuññakappo cāti.
atk-s0511a0:2553_2: Tattha guṇasārarahite kappe guṇasāruppādakassa guṇasārajananassa ekassa sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvena “sārakappo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:2553_3: Yasmiṃ pana kappe dve lokanāyakā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a0:2553_8: tattha manussā pamuditahadayā attanā patthitapaṇidhānavasena varayanti.
atk-s0511a0:2553_10: Yattha pana kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a0:2553_15: Tasmiṃ pana kappe yebhuyyena sattā kalyāṇasukhabahulā honti.
atk-s0511a0:2555_0: Varakappe tayo buddhā, sāramaṇḍe caturo buddhā;
atk-s0511a0:2556_0: Pañca buddhā bhaddakappe, tato natthādhikā jinā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2557_1: so sārakappopi samāno guṇasampattiyā maṇḍakappasadisattā “maṇḍakappo”ti vutto.
atk-s0511a0:2558_0: Padumuttaro pana parisuttaro bhagavā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā –
atk-s0511a0:2558_2: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā vimalakomalakesarakaṇṇikāni jalajāmalāvikalavipulapalāsāni thalajāni jalajāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2558_3: Tesaṃ kira dhurapattāni navutihatthāni kesarāni tiṃsahatthāni kaṇṇikā dvādasahatthā ekekassa navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇavo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2558_5: Tassa ubhinnaṃ bāhānamantaraṃ aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ nalāṭaṃ pañcahatthaṃ hatthapādā ekādasahatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2558_6: Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇavo uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0511a0:2558_7: aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uggantvā manosilācuṇṇavicuṇṇitaṃ viya katvā paccottharanti.
atk-s0511a0:2558_8: Tadupādāya satthā padumuttarotveva loke paññāyitthāti saṃyuttabhāṇakā vadanti.
atk-s0511a0:2559_0: Atha sabbalokuttaro padumuttaro bhagavā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte satte
atk-s0511a0:2559_1: olokento mithilanagare devalaṃ sujātañcāti dve rājaputte upanissayasampanne disvā taṅkhaṇaññeva anilapathena
atk-s0511a0:2559_2: gantvā mithiluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena dvepi rājakumāre pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0511a0:2559_3: Tepi ca “amhākaṃ pitucchāputto padumuttarakumāro pabbajitvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā amhākaṃ nagaraṃ sampatto,
atk-s0511a0:2559_4: handa naṃ mayaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāmā”ti saparivārā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2559_5: Tadā dasabalo tehi parivuto tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocamāno tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0511a0:2563_0: Athāparena samayena saradatāpasasamāgame mahājanaṃ nirayasantāpena santāpetvā dhammaṃ desento sattatiṃsasatasahassasaṅkhe
atk-s0511a0:2567_0: Yadā pana ānandamahārājā vīsatiyā purisasahassehi vīsatiyā amaccehi ca saddhiṃ padumuttarassa sammāsambuddhassa santike mithilanagare pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2567_1: Padumuttaro ca bhagavā te sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tehi parivuto gantvā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0511a0:2567_2: Tattha so amhākaṃ bhagavā viya kapilapure gaganatale ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a0:2574_0: Tattha ānandaṃ upasaṅkamīti pitaraṃ ānandarājānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2577_0: Desanākusalo buddho, tāresi janataṃ bahu”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a0:2579_0: Yadā pana satthā mithilanagare mithiluyyāne koṭisatasahassabhikkhugaṇamajjhe māghapuṇṇamāya puṇṇacandasadisavadano pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2583_0: Yadā pana bhagavā vebhārapabbatakūṭe vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā pabbatasandassanatthaṃ āgatassa mahājanassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2583_1: desetvā navutikoṭisahassāni ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā tehi parivuto pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2587_0: Puna bhagavati guṇavati tilokanāthe mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ kurumāne janapadacārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2592_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto anekadhanakoṭiko jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiko hutvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa sacīvaraṃ varadānamadāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2592_1: Sopi taṃ bhattānumodanāvasāne “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2598_0: Satasahasse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:2604_2: Sabhattaṃ dussamadāsahanti sacīvaraṃ bhattaṃ adāsiṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2605_0: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2608_0: Na tesaṃ keci paricaranti, raṭṭhato nicchubhanti te.
atk-s0511a0:2611_0: Tuvaṃ nātho mahāvīra, saraṇaṃ hohi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a0:2618_4: Tattha sassatādidiṭṭhivasena taranti etthāti titthaṃ, laddhi.
atk-s0511a0:2618_7: Padumuttarassa kira bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2618_9: tepi īdisā ahesunti dassanatthaṃ “byāhatā titthiyā”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2618_12: Na tesaṃ keci paricarantīti tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ kecipi purisā parikammaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0511a0:2618_22: ussādenti tesaṃ nivāsaṃ na dentīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2619_0: Upagañchuṃ buddhasantiketi evaṃ tehi raṭṭhavāsīhi manussehi ussādiyamānā sabbepi aññatitthiyā samāgantvā padumuttaradasabalameva saraṇamagamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2619_1: “Tvaṃ amhākaṃ satthā nātho gati parāyanaṃ saraṇa”nti evaṃ vatvā saraṇamagamaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2619_5: Pañcasīle patiṭṭhahīti pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2619_9: Tanti taṃ bhagavato sāsananti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:2620_0: Tassa pana padumuttarassa bhagavato haṃsavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2620_3: devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2620_5: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2620_8: sarīrappabhā cassa samantā dvādasa yojanāni gaṇhi,
atk-s0511a0:2620_12: Padumuttaro pana bhagavā paramābhirāme nandārāme kira parinibbuto.
atk-s0511a0:2620_14: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgamma dvādasayojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2638_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2642_2: Dvādasayojaneti samantato dvādasayojane ṭhāne bhagavato sarīrappabhā pharitvā rattindivaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2643_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pāramipūraṇādipunappunāgatamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā visesatthameva vatvā gamissāma.
atk-s0511a0:2647_0: Padumuttare pana sammāsambuddhe parinibbute sāsanepissa antarahite sattatikappasahassāni buddhā nuppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:2647_2: Ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthake ekasmiṃ kappe sumedho sujāto cāti dve sammāsambuddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2647_3: Tattha adhigatamedho sumedho nāma bodhisatto pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudassananagare
atk-s0511a0:2647_4: sudattassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sudattāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2647_5: accayena sudassanuyyāne taruṇadivasakaro viya saliladharavivaragato mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2648_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sumanadeviyā punabbasumitte nāma putte jāte hatthiyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2648_2: So tehi parivuto aḍḍhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya nakulanigame nakulaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a0:2648_3: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sirivaḍḍhājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a0:2648_4: gahetvā nīpabodhimūle vīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā abhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:2648_6: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno
atk-s0511a0:2648_7: dhammadesanāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhabbapuggale olokento attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ saraṇakumārañca sabbakāmikumārañca
atk-s0511a0:2648_8: attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnañca koṭisataṃ catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā
atk-s0511a0:2648_9: sudassananagarasamīpe sudassanuyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātike pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ parivārānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2661_2: dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya pasannāni nettāni honti.
atk-s0511a0:2661_9: Ujūti brahmujugatto ujumeva uggatasarīro devanagare samussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇasadisavarasarīroti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2662_0: Yadā pana bhagavā kumbhakaṇṇasadisānubhāvaṃ kumbhakaṇṇaṃ nāma manussabhakkhaṃ yakkhaṃ mahāaṭavimukhe
atk-s0511a0:2662_1: sandissamānaghorasarīraṃ vattaniaṭavisañcāraṃ pacchinditvā pavattamānaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ
atk-s0511a0:2662_2: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento disvā ekakova asahāyo tassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ gantvā anto
atk-s0511a0:2662_4: Atha kho so yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno daṇḍāhato ghoraviso āsiviso viya saṃkuddho dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo
atk-s0511a0:2662_5: attano attabhāvaṃ ghorataraṃ katvā pabbatasadisaṃ sīsaṃ katvā sūriyamaṇḍalasadisāni akkhīni nimminitvā
atk-s0511a0:2662_7: pabbatabilasadisavipularattamukho thūlapiṅgalakharapharusakeso atibhayānakadassano hutvā āgantvā sumedhassa
atk-s0511a0:2662_8: bhagavato purato ṭhatvā padhūpāyanto pajjalanto pāsāṇapabbataggijāla- salila- kaddama-
atk-s0511a0:2662_10: vālukappakārā navavidhā vassavuṭṭhiyo vassetvāpi bhagavato lomaggamattampi cāletuṃ asakkonto “bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2662_11: pañhaṃ pucchitvā māressāmī”ti āḷavako viya pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0511a0:2662_12: Ayaṃ bhagavā pañhābyākaraṇena taṃ yakkhaṃ vinayamupanesi.
atk-s0511a0:2662_13: Tato dutiyadivase kirassa raṭṭhavāsino manussā sakaṭabharitena bhattena saha rājakumāraṃ āharitvā yakkhassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2662_16: Tadā tasmiṃ samāgame dasabalo yakkhassa manonukūlaṃ dhammaṃ desento.
atk-s0511a0:2666_0: Yadā pana upakārinagare sirinandanuyyāne cattāri saccāni pakāsayi,
atk-s0511a0:2670_2: Puna devakūṭe pabbate kathinatthate dutiye navutikoṭiyo.
atk-s0511a0:2670_3: Puna tatiye bhagavati cārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2683_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto uttaro nāma sabbajanuttaro māṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2683_1: vissajjetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tadā dasabalassa dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a0:2706_0: Tassa pana sumedhassa bhagavato sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2706_3: saraṇo ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2706_5: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2718_0: Obhāseti disā sabbā, cando tāragaṇe yathā.
atk-s0511a0:2721_0: Tatheva tassa ratanaṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2724_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2731_0: Tattha cando tāragaṇe yathāti yathā nāma gagane paripuṇṇacando tārāgaṇe obhāseti pakāseti,
atk-s0511a0:2732_0: Cakkavattimaṇī nāmāti yathā nāma cakkavattirañño maṇiratanaṃ catuhatthāyāmaṃ sakaṭanābhisamapariṇāhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2732_3: tassevaṃ āgacchantassa samantato yojanappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ ābhā pharati,
atk-s0511a0:2732_4: evameva tassa sumedhassāpi bhagavato sarīrato ābhāratanaṃ samantato yojanaṃ pharatīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2737_0: Tato tassāparabhāge tasmiṃyeva maṇḍakappe anupubbena aparimitāyukesu sattesu anukkamena parihāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu
atk-s0511a0:2737_1: jātesu sujātarūpakāyo parisuddhajāto sujāto nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:2737_2: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sumaṅgalanagare uggatassa nāma rañño kule pabhāvatiyā
atk-s0511a0:2737_3: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2737_4: Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa nāmaṃ karonto sakalajambudīpe sabbasattānaṃ sukhaṃ janayanto jātoti “sujāto” tvevassa nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2737_6: Sirī upasirī sirinando cāti tassa tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2738_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sirīnandādeviyā upasene nāma putte uppanne haṃsavahaṃ nāma varaturaṅgamāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2738_1: Taṃ pana pabbajantaṃ manussānaṃ koṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2738_2: Atha so tehi parivuto nava māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sirīnandananagare sirīnandanaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0511a0:2738_3: dhītāya dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a0:2738_4: sunandājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā veḷubodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tettiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2738_5: santharitvā sūriye dharamāneyeva samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhānuciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2738_6: udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ
atk-s0511a0:2738_7: purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā sumaṅgalanagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a0:2738_8: sumaṅgaluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0511a0:2738_9: tesaṃ saparivārānaṃ majjhe nisinno dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2739_0: Yadā pana bhagavā sudassanuyyānadvāre mahāsālamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devesu tāvatiṃsesu vassāvāsaṃ upāgami,
atk-s0511a0:2739_3: Yadā pana sujāto dasabalo pitusantikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0511a0:2745_0: Evaṃ sobhati sambuddho, jalanto siriyā sadā.
atk-s0511a0:2758_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ maṇḍakappe sumedho bhagavā uppanno,
atk-s0511a0:2758_1: tattheva kappe sujātopi bhagavā uppannoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2758_2: Sīhahanūti sīhassa viya hanu assāti sīhahanu.
atk-s0511a0:2758_5: Assa pana mahāpurisassa sīhassa heṭṭhimahanu viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni honti.
atk-s0511a0:2759_0: Sudhammavatīnagare sudhammuyyāne āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā saṭṭhisatasahassāni ehibhikkhubhāvena
atk-s0511a0:2759_3: Tato paraṃ tidivorohaṇe bhagavato paññāsasatasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2759_4: Puna “sudassanakumāro bhagavato santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto”ti sutvā “mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0511a0:2759_5: āgatāni cattāri purisasatasahassāni gahetvā sudassanatthero sujātaṃ narāsabhaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a0:2759_6: Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2773_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a0:2773_1: dhammakathaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattahi ratanehi saddhiṃ catumahādīparajjaṃ datvā
atk-s0511a0:2773_3: Sakaladīpavāsino janā raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ sādhetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānamadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2797_0: Tattha catudīpamhīti saparivāradīpānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2797_4: Atha vā uttame buddheti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a0:2797_13: Tiṃsakappasahassamhīti ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthaketi attho.
atk-s0511a0:2798_0: Tassa pana sujātassa bhagavato sumaṅgalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2798_3: sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2798_5: nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2798_7: so kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho paramaramaṇīyo veḷuriyamaṇivaṇṇehi vimalehi pattehi sañchannavipulasākho mayūrapiñchakalāpo viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a0:2798_8: Tassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ paṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:2809_0: “So ca rukkho ghanakkhandho, acchiddo hoti pattiko;
atk-s0511a0:2810_0: Uju vaṃso brahā hoti, dassanīyo manoramo.
atk-s0511a0:2813_0: Yathā subaddho morahattho, evaṃ sobhati so dumo.
atk-s0511a0:2815_0: “Na tassa kaṇṭakā honti, nāpi chiddaṃ mahā ahu;
atk-s0511a0:2825_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2830_0: “So ca buddho asamasamo, guṇāni ca tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a0:2832_8: Ekakkhandhoti avaniruho eko adutiyo cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2832_10: Tato sākhā pabhijjatīti tato vaṃsaggato pañcavidhā sākhā nikkhamitvā pabhijjittha.
atk-s0511a0:2832_13: Morahatthoti ātapasannivāraṇatthaṃ kato baddho morapiñchakalāpo vuccati.
atk-s0511a0:2833_0: Na tassa kaṇṭakā hontīti tassa vaṃsassa kaṇṭakinopi rukkhassa kaṇṭakā nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2833_5: Sabbākāravarūpetoti sabbena ākārena varehiyeva upeto sabbākāravarūpeto nāma.
atk-s0511a0:2834_6: “iminā ca iminā ca sadiso”ti vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato anūpamoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2834_7: Guṇāni ca tānīti guṇā ca te,
atk-s0511a0:2838_0: Sujātassa pana aparabhāge ito aṭṭhakappasatādhikasahassakappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassī,
atk-s0511a0:2838_3: Tattha piyadassī nāma bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudhaññavatīnagare
atk-s0511a0:2838_4: sudattassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā candasadisavadanāya candādeviyā nāma kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a0:2838_5: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena varuṇuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:2838_6: Tassa pana nāmaggahaṇadivase lokassa piyānaṃ pāṭihāriyavisesānaṃ dassitattā “piyadassī”tveva nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2838_8: Tassa kira sunimmalavimalagiribrahānāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2839_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā vimalādeviyā kañcanaveḷe nāma putte uppanne ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2839_2: So tehi parivuto mahāpuriso cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya varuṇabrāhmaṇagāme vasabhabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0511a0:2839_3: dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sujātājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a0:2839_4: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā kakudhabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tepaññāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2839_5: ābhujitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā tattheva sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2839_6: vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ ariyadhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ ñatvā ākāsena tattha gantvā usabhavatīnagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a0:2840_0: Puna usabhavatiyā nāma nagarassa avidūre sudassanapabbate sudassano nāma devarājā paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a0:2840_2: Sakalajambudīpe pana manussā tassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ baliṃ upasaṃharanti.
atk-s0511a0:2840_3: So sudassano devarājā nararājena saddhiṃ ekāsane nisīditvā baliṃ sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0511a0:2840_4: Atha piyadassī bhagavā “tassa sudassanassa devarājassa taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vinodessāmī”ti tasmiṃ devarāje
atk-s0511a0:2840_5: yakkhasamāgamaṃ gate tassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirisayanaṃ āruhitvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñcanto yugandharapabbate
atk-s0511a0:2840_7: Tassa parivāraparicārikā devatāyo mālāgandhavilepanādīhi dasabalaṃ pūjetvā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2841_0: Sudassanopi devarājā yakkhasamāgamato āgacchanto attano bhavanato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo niccharante disvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:2841_1: “aññesu pana divasesu mama bhavanassa edisī anekaraṃsijālasamujjalavibhūti na diṭṭhapubbā.
atk-s0511a0:2841_2: Ko nu kho idha paviṭṭho devo vā manusso vā”ti olokento udayagirisikharamatthake saradasamayadivasakaramiva
atk-s0511a0:2841_3: chabbaṇṇaraṃsijālena abhijjalantaṃ nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:2841_4: “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo mama parivārena parijanena parivuto varasayane nisinno”ti kodhābhibhūtamānaso –
atk-s0511a0:2841_5: “handāhaṃ imassa attano balaṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā sakalaṃ taṃ pabbataṃ ekajālamakāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2841_6: “Iminā aggijālena chārikābhūto muṇḍakasamaṇo”ti olokento anekaraṃsijālavisaravipphuritavarasarīraṃ pasannavadanavaṇṇasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2841_9: handāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ udakoghena osādetvā māressāmī”ti atigambhīraṃ udakoghaṃ vimānābhimukhaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2842_0: Tato udakoghena puṇṇe tasmiṃ vimāne nisinnassa tassa bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattaṃ vā sarīre lomamattaṃ vā na temittha.
atk-s0511a0:2842_2: “iminā samaṇo nirassāso mato bhavissatī”ti mantvā udakaṃ saṅkhipitvā olokento bhagavantaṃ asitajaladharavivaragataṃ
atk-s0511a0:2842_3: saradasamayarajanikaramiva vividharaṃsijālavisarena virocamānaṃ sakaparisaparivutaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā attano
atk-s0511a0:2842_6: Athassa bhagavato ānubhāvena sabbāvudhāni nānāvidhaparamaruciradassanā surabhikusumamālā hutvā dasabalassa pādamūle nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2843_0: Tato taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā sudassano devarājā paramakupitamānaso bhagavantaṃ ubhohi hatthehi pādesu gahetvā
atk-s0511a0:2843_1: attano bhavanato nīharitukāmo ukkhipitvā mahāsamuddaṃ atikkamitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ gantvā –
atk-s0511a0:2843_2: “kiṃ nu kho samaṇo jīvati vā mato vā”ti olokento tasmiṃyeva āsane nisinnaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:2843_4: nāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ ito nikkaḍḍhituṃ sakkomi.
atk-s0511a0:2844_0: Atha dasabalo tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tathā adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0511a0:2844_2: Tasmiñca divase sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tasseva upahāradānatthāya sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2844_3: Te bhagavato pāde gahetvā nisinnaṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ nararājāno disvā –
atk-s0511a0:2844_4: “amhākaṃ devarājā munirājassa piyadassissa satthuno pādaparicariyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a0:2844_7: pasannacittā sabbe bhagavantaṃ namassamānā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2844_8: Tattha piyadassī bhagavā taṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:2845_0: Yadā pana navayojanappamāṇe kumudanagare buddhapaccatthiko devadatto viya soṇatthero nāma mahāpadumakumārena
atk-s0511a0:2845_1: saddhiṃ mantetvā tassa pitaraṃ ghātetvā puna piyadassībuddhassa vadhāya nānappakāraṃ payogaṃ katvāpi
atk-s0511a0:2845_2: ghātetuṃ asakkonto so doṇamukhanāgarājārohaṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ palobhetvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0511a0:2845_3: “yadā panāyaṃ samaṇo piyadassī imaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0511a0:2845_4: tadā doṇamukhaṃ nāma gajavaraṃ vissajjetvā piyadassīsamaṇaṃ mārehī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2846_1: “ayaṃ samaṇo ṭhānantarāpi maṃ cāveyyā”ti mantvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dutiyadivase dasabalassa nagarappavesanasamayaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2846_3: sundarakkhandhāsanaṃ anuvaṭṭaghanajaghanaṃ nicitagūḷhajāṇuantaraṃ īsāsadisaruciradantaṃ suvāladhiṃ apacitamecakaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2846_5: sattappatiṭṭhaṃ sattadhā pabhinnaṃ sabbaso vissavantaṃ viggahavantamiva antakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piṇḍakabaḷañjanadhūpalepādivisesehi
atk-s0511a0:2846_6: bhiyyopi mattappamattaṃ katvā arivāraṇavāraṇaṃ erāvaṇavāraṇamiva arijanavāraṇaṃ munivāraṇaṃ māraṇatthāya pesesi.
atk-s0511a0:2846_7: Atha so dviradavaro muttamattova gajamahiṃsaturaṅganaranāriyo hantvā hatarudhiraparirañjitasadantakarasarīro
atk-s0511a0:2846_9: gijjhādīhi anupariyāyamāno hatamahiṃsanaraturaṅgadiradādīnaṃ aṅgāni ālumpitvā manussabhakkho yakkho viya
atk-s0511a0:2846_10: bhakkhayanto dūratova dasabalaṃ sissagaṇaparivutaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā anilagaruḷasadisavego vegena bhagavantamabhigañchi.
atk-s0511a0:2847_0: Atha puravāsino pana janā bhayasantāpaparipūritamānasā pāsādapākāracayatarūpagatā tathāgatābhimukhamabhidhāvantaṃ disvā hāhākārasaddamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2847_1: Keci pana upāsakā taṃ nānappakārehi nayehi nivārayitumārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2847_2: Atha so buddhanāgo hatthināgamāyantamoloketvā karuṇāvipphārasītalahadayo mettāya taṃ phari.
atk-s0511a0:2847_3: Tato so hatthināgo mettāpharaṇena mudukatahadayasantāno attano dosāparādhaṃ ñatvā lajjāya bhagavato purato
atk-s0511a0:2847_4: ṭhātuṃ asakkonto pathaviyaṃ pavisanto viya sirasā bhagavato pādesu nipati.
atk-s0511a0:2847_5: Evaṃ nipanno pana so timiranikarasadisasarīro sañchāppabhānurañjitavarakanakagirisikharasamīpamupagato asitasaliladharanikaro viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a0:2848_0: Athevaṃ munirājapādamūle karirājānaṃ sirasā nipatantaṃ disvā nāgarajanā paramapītipūritahadayā sādhukārasīhanādaṃ ukkuṭṭhisaddaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2848_4: Atha bhagavā tamasitagirisikharamiva pādamūle nipannaṃ diradavaraṃ oloketvā aṅkusadhajajālasaṅkhacakkālaṅkatena
atk-s0511a0:2848_5: karatalena gajavaramatthakaṃ parāmasitvā tassa cittācārānukūlāya dhammadesanāya taṃ anusāsi –
atk-s0511a0:2849_0: “Gajavara vadato suṇohi vācaṃ, mama hitamatthayutañca taṃ bhajāhi;
atk-s0511a0:2850_0: Tava vadhanirataṃ paduṭṭhabhāvaṃ, apanaya santamupehi cārudanti.
atk-s0511a0:2851_0: “Lobhena dosena ca mohato vā, yo pāṇino hiṃsati vāraṇinda;
atk-s0511a0:2852_0: So pāṇaghātī sucirampi kālaṃ, dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhoti.
atk-s0511a0:2853_0: “Mākāsi mātaṅga punevarūpaṃ, kammaṃ pamādena madena vāpi;
atk-s0511a0:2854_0: Avīciyaṃ dukkhamasayha kappaṃ, pappoti pāṇaṃ atipātayanto.
atk-s0511a0:2855_0: “Dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhotvā, manussalokaṃ yadi yāti bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a0:2857_0: “Yathā ca pāṇā paramaṃ piyā te, mahājane kuñjara mandanāga;
atk-s0511a0:2858_0: Tathā parassāpi piyāti ñatvā, pāṇātipāto parivajjanīyo.
atk-s0511a0:2859_0: “Dose ca hiṃsānirate viditvā, pāṇātipātā virate guṇe ca;
atk-s0511a0:2860_0: Pāṇātipātaṃ parivajjaya tvaṃ, sagge sukhaṃ icchasi ce parattha.
atk-s0511a0:2861_0: “Pāṇātipātā virato sudanto, piyo manāpo bhavatīdha loke;
atk-s0511a0:2862_0: Kāyassa bhedā ca paraṃ panassa, saggādhivāsaṃ kathayanti buddhā.
atk-s0511a0:2863_0: “Dukkhāgamaṃ nicchati koci loke, sabbopi jāto sukhamesateva;
atk-s0511a0:2864_0: Tasmā mahānāga vihāya hiṃsaṃ, bhāvehi mettaṃ karuṇañca kāle”ti.
atk-s0511a0:2865_0: Athevaṃ dasabalenānusāsiyamāno dantivaro saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā paramavinīto vinayācārasampanno sisso viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2865_1: Evaṃ so piyadassī bhagavā amhākaṃ satthā viya dhanapālaṃ doṇamukhaṃ karivaraṃ damitvā tattha mahājanasamāgame dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:2884_0: Sumaṅgalanagare pālito nāma rājaputto ca purohitaputto sabbadassikumāro cāti dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2884_1: Te piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe cārikaṃ carante “attano nagaraṃ sampatto”ti sutvā koṭisatasahassaparivārā
atk-s0511a0:2884_2: paccuggamanaṃ katvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhagavato bhattānumodanāvasāne
atk-s0511a0:2884_4: Tesaṃ pana majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2884_6: Athāparena samayena sudassanadevarājassa samāgame navutikoṭiyo arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2884_9: Puna doṇamukhavinayane asītikoṭiyo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2891_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto kassapo nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo itihāsapañcamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā satthu
atk-s0511a0:2891_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassapariccāgena paramārāmaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca pañcasīlesu
atk-s0511a0:2891_4: “ito aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2900_0: Saraṇe pañcasīle ca, daḷahaṃ katvā samādiyiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2909_0: Tattha saraṇe pañcasīle cāti tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni cāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2909_1: Aṭṭhārase kappasateti ito aṭṭhasatādhikassa kappasahassassa accayenāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2910_0: Tassa pana bhagavato sudhaññaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2910_3: pālito ca sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:2910_5: sujātā ca dhammadinnā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2925_0: Yathā ahu pabhā tassa, asamassa mahesino.
atk-s0511a0:2932_0: Tattha sālarājā vāti sabbaphāliphullo paramaramaṇīyadassano samavaṭṭakkhandho sālarājā viya dissati.
atk-s0511a0:2936_0: Piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukesu
atk-s0511a0:2936_1: manussesu anukkamena parihāyitvā vassasatasahassāyukesu jātesu paramatthadassī atthadassī nāma buddho
atk-s0511a0:2936_3: So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā paramasobhane sobhane nāma nagare sāgarassa nāma
atk-s0511a0:2936_4: rañño kule aggamahesiyā sudassanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse gabbhe vasitvā sucindhanuyyāne
atk-s0511a0:2936_6: Mātukucchito mahāpurise nikkhantamatte sucirakālanihitāni kulaparamparāgatāni mahānidhānāni dhanasāmikā
