atk-s0511a0:2936_10: girivāhananāmakā paramasurabhijanakā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2937_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā visākhādeviyā selakumāre nāma putte uppanne sudassanaṃ nāma assarājaṃ abhiruhitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:2937_2: Tehi parivuto so mahāpuriso aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sucindharanāgiyā upahāratthāya
atk-s0511a0:2937_3: ānītaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ mahājanena sandissamānasabbasarīrāya nāgiyā saha suvaṇṇapātiyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2937_4: paribhuñjitvā taruṇatarusatasamalaṅkate taruṇasālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye dhammarucinā
atk-s0511a0:2937_5: mahārucinā nāma nāgarājena dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā campakabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tepaññāsahatthāyāmavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:2937_6: kusatiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sambodhiṃ patvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ –
atk-s0511a0:2937_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanāyācanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2937_9: sampaṭicchitvā attanā saha pabbajitanavabhikkhukoṭiyo ariyadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā
atk-s0511a0:2937_10: anomanagarasamīpe anomuyyāne otaritvā tehi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:2938_0: Puna bhagavati lokanāyake devalokacārikaṃ caritvā tattha dhammaṃ desente koṭisatasahassānaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2938_1: Yadā pana bhagavā atthadassī amhākaṃ bhagavā viya kapilavatthupuraṃ sobhanapuraṃ pavisitvā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a0:2954_3: so kappo varakappo”ti heṭṭhā padumuttarabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0511a0:2955_0: Sucandakanagare kira santo ca rājaputto upasanto ca purohitaputto tīsu vedesu sabbasamayantaresu ca sāramadisvā
atk-s0511a0:2955_1: nagarassa catūsu dvāresu cattāro paṇḍite visārade ca manusse ṭhapesuṃ –
atk-s0511a0:2955_2: “yaṃ pana tumhe paṇḍitaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā passatha suṇātha vā,
atk-s0511a0:2955_4: Tena ca samayena atthadassī lokanātho sucandakanagaraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:2955_5: Atha tehi niveditā purisā gantvā tesaṃ dasabalassa tatthāgamanaṃ paṭivedesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:2955_6: Tato te santopasantā tathāgatāgamanaṃ sutvā pahaṭṭhamānasā sahassaparivārā dasabalaṃ asamaṃ paccuggantvā
atk-s0511a0:2955_7: abhivādetvā nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa asadisaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase sakalanagaravāsīhi
atk-s0511a0:2955_9: Tasmiṃ kira divase aṭṭhanavutisahassāni ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:2955_10: Tāya parisāya majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2956_0: Yadā pana bhagavā attano puttassa selattherassa dhammaṃ desento aṭṭhāsītisahassāni pasādetvā ehibhikkhubhāvena
atk-s0511a0:2956_3: Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammaṃ desento aṭṭhasattatisahassāni arahattaṃ pāpetvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:2966_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto campakanagare susīmo nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo lokasammato ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2966_1: So sabbavibhavajātaṃ dīnānāthakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ vissajjetvā himavantasamīpaṃ gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a0:2966_2: aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattetvā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo hutvā mahājanassa kusalākusalānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2966_3: dhammānaṃ anavajjasāvajjabhāvañca dassetvā buddhuppādaṃ āgamayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:2967_0: Athāparena samayena atthadassimhi lokanāyake loke uppajjitvā sudassanamahānagare aṭṭhannaṃ parisānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:2967_1: majjhe dhammāmatavassaṃ vassente tassa dhammaṃ sutvā saggalokaṃ gantvā dibbāni mandāravapadumapāricchattakādīni
atk-s0511a0:2967_2: pupphāni devalokato āharitvā attano ānubhāvaṃ dassento dissamānasarīro catūsu disāsu catuddīpikamahāmegho
atk-s0511a0:2967_3: viya pupphavassaṃ vassetvā samantato pupphamaṇḍapaṃ pupphamayagghitoraṇahemajālādīni pupphamayāni katvā
atk-s0511a0:2982_0: Tattha jaṭiloti jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭilo.
atk-s0511a0:2982_1: Mahiyā seṭṭhasammatoti sakalenapi lokena seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti evaṃ sammato sambhāvitoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:2983_0: Tassa pana bhagavato sobhanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:2983_5: dhammā ca sudhammā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:2983_8: Sarīrappabhā samantato sabbakālaṃ yojanamattaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0511a0:2998_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, pharanti yojanaṃ sadā.
atk-s0511a0:3005_0: Tattha uḷurājāva pūritoti saradasamayaparipuṇṇavimalasakalamaṇḍalo tārakarājā viyāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3005_7: Sopi bhagavā catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khayena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā anupamanagare anomārāme parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:3009_0: Atthadassimhi sammāsambuddhe parinibbute antarakappe ca vītivatte aparimitāyukesu sattesu anupubbena
atk-s0511a0:3009_1: parihāyitvā vassasatasahassāyukesu jātesu dhammadassī nāma satthā lokālokakaro lobhādilokamalavinayakaro
atk-s0511a0:3009_3: Sopi bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā saraṇanagare sabbalokasaraṇassa saraṇassa
atk-s0511a0:3009_4: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sunandāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:3009_5: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena saraṇuyyāne mātukucchito pāvussakāle saliladharavivaragato puṇṇacando viya nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3009_6: Mahāpurise pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatteyeva adhikaraṇavohārasatthapotthakesu adhammiyā vohārā sayameva antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3010_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā vicikoḷideviyā puññavaḍḍhane nāma putte uppanne devakumāro viya ativiya sukhumālo
atk-s0511a0:3010_1: devasampattimiva sampattimanubhavamāno majjhimayāme vuṭṭhāya sirisayane nisinno niddopagatānaṃ itthīnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3010_2: vippakāraṃ disvā sañjātasaṃvego mahābhinikkhamanāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0511a0:3010_3: Cittuppādasamanantaramevassa sudassanapāsādo gaganatalamabbhuggantvā caturaṅginiyā senāya parivuto dutiyo
atk-s0511a0:3010_4: divasakaro viya dibbavimānaṃ viya ca gantvā rattakuravakatarubodhisamīpeyeva otaritvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3010_5: Mahāpuriso kira brahmunā upanītāni kāsāyāni gahetvā pabbajitvā pāsādato otaritvā avidūre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3010_6: Pāsādo puna ākāsena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ antokatvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3010_7: Itthiyopi saparivārā pāsādato otaritvā aḍḍhagāvutamattaṃ gantvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3010_8: Tattha itthiyo ca tāsaṃ paricārikā ceṭikāyo ca ṭhapetvā sabbe manussā taṃ anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3011_0: Atha dhammadassī bodhisatto sattāhaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā vicikoḷideviyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a0:3011_1: badaravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sirivaḍḍhanena nāma yavapālakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a0:3011_2: gahetvā bimbijālabodhiṃ upagantvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3011_5: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvāva bodhisamīpe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā katabrahmayācano attanā
atk-s0511a0:3011_6: saddhiṃ pabbajitassa bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassassa saddhammappaṭivedhasamatthataṃ ñatvā aṭṭhārasayojanikamaggaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3011_7: ekāheneva isipatanaṃ gantvā tehi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0511a0:3019_0: Yadā pana tagaranāmake nagare sañjayo nāma rājā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhammaṃ khemato ca disvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3019_3: Atha satthā dhammadassī tesaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā ākāsena gantvā sañjayassa tāpasassa assamapadaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3019_4: gantvā ākāse ṭhatvā tesaṃ tāpasānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0511a0:3023_0: Yadā pana sakko devānamindo dasabalassa dhammaṃ sotukāmo taṃ upasaṅkami,
atk-s0511a0:3023_1: tadā asītiyā koṭīnaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3027_0: Yadā pana saraṇanagare vemātikabhātikaṃ padumakumāraṃ phussadevakumārañca saparivāre pabbājesi,
atk-s0511a0:3027_1: tasmiṃ antovasse pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassānaṃ majjhe visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresi,
atk-s0511a0:3027_3: Puna bhagavato devalokato orohaṇe satakoṭīnaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3027_4: Yadā pana sudassanārāme terasannaṃ dhutaguṇānaṃ guṇe ānisaṃse pakāsetvā hāritaṃ nāma mahāsāvakaṃ etadagge ṭhapesi,
atk-s0511a0:3027_5: tadā asītiyā koṭīnaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3040_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto sakko devarājā hutvā dvīsu devalokesu devehi parivuto āgantvā dibbehi gandhapupphādīhi dibbaturiyehi ca tathāgataṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0511a0:3052_0: Tassa pana bhagavato saraṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3052_3: padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3052_5: khemā ca sabbanāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3073_0: Cavi candova gagane, nibbuto so sasāvako”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3074_3: Upasobhathāti yathā gagane vijju ca majjanhike sūriyo ca upasobhati,
atk-s0511a0:3074_5: Samakanti sabbehi narasattehi samameva tassa āyu ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3074_7: Candovāti gaganato candimā viya cavīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3074_8: Dhammadassī kira bhagavā sālavatīnagare kesārāme parinibbāyi sesamettha gāthāsu pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a0:3078_0: Dhammadassimhi bhagavati parinibbute antarahite cassa sāsane tasmiṃ kappe atīte kappasahasse ca sattasu
atk-s0511a0:3078_1: kappasatesu ca chasu kappesu ca atikkantesu ito catunavutikappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova lokatthacaro
atk-s0511a0:3078_2: adhigataparamattho siddhattho nāma satthā loke pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3081_0: Nihanitvā tamaṃ sabbaṃ, sūriyo abbhuggato yathā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3082_0: Siddhattho bodhisattopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā vebhāranagare udenassa
atk-s0511a0:3082_1: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā suphassāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena
atk-s0511a0:3082_3: Jāte pana mahāpurise sabbesaṃ āraddhakammantā ca icchitā ca atthā siddhimagamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3083_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā somanassādeviyā putte anupamakumāre uppanne āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṃ suvaṇṇasivikāya nikkhamitvā vīriyuyyānaṃ gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3083_2: Mahāpuriso kira tehi saddhiṃ dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ asadisabrāhmaṇagāme sunettāya
atk-s0511a0:3083_3: nāma brāhmaṇakaññāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā badaravane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a0:3083_4: varuṇena nāma yavapālena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā kaṇikārabodhiṃ upagantvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:3083_5: tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3083_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3083_8: koṭisatasahassānaṃ catusaccapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā anilapathena gantvā gayāmigadāye otaritvā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3090_2: Puna bhīmarathanagare bhīmarathena nāma raññā nimantito nagaramajjhe kate santhāgāre nisinno karavīkarutamañjunā
atk-s0511a0:3090_3: savanasukhena paramamadhurena paṇḍitajanahadayaṅgamena amatābhisekasadisena brahmassarena dasa disā paripūrento
atk-s0511a0:3094_0: Yadā pana vebhāranagare ñātisamāgame buddhavaṃsaṃ desento navutikoṭīnaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0511a0:3096_0: “Yadā buddho dhammaṃ desesi, vebhāre so puruttame;
atk-s0511a0:3098_0: Amararuciradassane amaranagare nāma sambalo ca sumitto ca dve bhātaro rajjaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3098_1: Atha siddhattho satthā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā gaganatalena gantvā amaranagaramajjhe
atk-s0511a0:3098_2: otaritvā cakkālaṅkatatalehi caraṇehi pathavitalaṃ maddanto viya padacetiyāni dassetvā amaruyyānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0511a0:3098_4: Tato dvepi bhātikarājāno dasabalassa padacetiyāni disvā padāni anugantvā siddhatthaṃ adhigataparamatthaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3098_5: satthāraṃ sabbalokanetāraṃ saparivāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3098_7: Tassa te dhammakathaṃ sutvā sañjātasaddhā hutvā sabbeva pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3098_8: Tesaṃ koṭisatānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3098_10: Vebhāranagare ñātisamāgame pabbajitānaṃ navutikoṭīnaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3098_12: Sudassanavihāre sannipatitānaṃ asītikoṭīnaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3104_0: Ete āsuṃ tayo ṭhānā, vimalānaṃ samāgame”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3105_1: asītiyāpi ca koṭinanti navutīnaṃ koṭīnaṃ asītiyāpi ca koṭīnaṃ sannipātā ahesunti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3105_2: Ete āsuṃ tayo ṭhānāti etāni tīṇi sannipātaṭṭhānāni ahesunti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3106_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto surasenanagare maṅgalo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā vedavedaṅgānaṃ pāraṃ gantvā anekakoṭisaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3106_1: dhanasannicayaṃ dīnānāthādīnaṃ pariccajitvā vivekārāmo hutvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānābhiññāyo
atk-s0511a0:3106_3: “siddhattho nāma buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā yāya jambuyā ayaṃ jambudīpo paññāyati,
atk-s0511a0:3106_4: iddhiyā taṃ jambuṃ upasaṅkamitvā tato phalaṃ āharitvā navutikoṭibhikkhuparivāraṃ siddhatthaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0511a0:3106_7: “ito catunavutikappamatthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3121_2: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ vebhāraṃ nāma ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3121_6: sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3121_8: sīvalā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3140_0: Tattha saṭṭhiratananti saṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ nabhaṃ uggatoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3140_4: Pupphāpetvānāti jhānābhiññāmaggaphalasamāpattipupphehi pupphite paramasobhaggappatte katvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3141_0: Siddhattho kira satthā kañcanaveḷunagare anomuyyāne parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:3145_0: Tassa pana siddhatthassa bhagavato aparabhāge eko kappo buddhasuñño ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3145_2: phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3145_3: Tattha tisso nāma mahāpuriso pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā khemakanagare janasandhassa
atk-s0511a0:3145_4: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā padumadalasadisanayanāya padumānāmāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3146_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā subhaddādeviyā putte ānandakumāre uppanne sonuttaraṃ nāma anuttaraṃ turaṅgavaramāruyha
atk-s0511a0:3146_3: So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya vīranigame vīraseṭṭhissa dhītāya
atk-s0511a0:3146_4: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā salalavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye vijitasaṅgāmakena
atk-s0511a0:3146_5: nāma yavapālena upanītā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā asanabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a0:3146_6: tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā tattha pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā adhigatasabbaññutaññāṇo –
atk-s0511a0:3146_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā yasavatī nagare brahmadevaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3146_9: udayañca dve rājaputte saparivāre upanissayasampanne ākāsena gantvā yasavatīmigadāye otaritvā uyyānapālena
atk-s0511a0:3146_10: rājaputte pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ saparivārānaṃ avisārinā byāpinā madhurena brahmassarena dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0511a0:3154_0: “Tassāpi atulā iddhi, atulaṃ sīlaṃ samādhi ca;
atk-s0511a0:3159_0: Tattha sabbatthāti sabbesu dhammesu pāraṃ gantvā.
atk-s0511a0:3159_1: Dasasahassimhīti dasasahassiyaṃ athāparena samayena tissena satthārā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3159_2: koṭi mahāpurisassa gaṇavāsaṃ pahāya bodhimūlamupagamanasamaye aññatra gatā.
atk-s0511a0:3159_3: Sā tissena sammāsambuddhena dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”nti sutvā yasavatīmigadāyaṃ āgantvā dasabalamabhivādetvā taṃ parivāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3159_6: Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame maṅgalapariyosāne saṭṭhiyā koṭīnaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3163_0: Tattha dutiyo navutikoṭīnanti dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi navutikoṭipāṇīnanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3163_3: Idāni parimocite satte sarūpato dassento “naramarū”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:3164_0: Yasavatīnagare kira antovassaṃ pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ satasahassehi parivuto pavāresi,
atk-s0511a0:3164_2: Ubhato sujātassa sujātassa nāma rañño nārivāhanakumāro nārivāhananagaraṃ anuppatte bhagavati lokanāthe
atk-s0511a0:3164_3: saparivāro paccuggantvā dasabalaṃ sabhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ asadisadānaṃ datvā attano rajjaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3164_4: puttassa niyyātetvā saparivāro sabbalokādhipatissa tissasammāsambuddhassa santike ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3164_5: Tassa kira sā pabbajjā sabbadisāsu pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3164_6: Tasmā tato tato āgantvā nārivāhanakumāraṃ mahājano anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3164_7: Tadā tathāgato navutiyā bhikkhusatasahassassa majjhagato pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3164_9: Puna khemavatīnagare ñātisamāgame buddhavaṃsadhammakathaṃ sutvā asītisatasahassāni tassa santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:3174_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto yasavatīnagare sujāto nāma rājā hutvā iddhaṃ phītaṃ janapadaṃ anekakoṭidhanasannicayaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3174_1: anurāgamupagatahadayañca parijanaṃ tiṇanaḷamiva pariccajitvā jātiādīsu saṃviggahadayo nikkhamitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3174_2: pabbajitvā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo hutvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭasarīro
atk-s0511a0:3174_3: hutvā sapatisso tissaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:3174_5: Atha so evaṃ cintetvā iddhiyā saggalokaṃ gantvā cittalatāvanaṃ pavisitvā padumapāricchattakamandāravādīhi
atk-s0511a0:3174_6: dibbakusumehi ratanamayaṃ caṅkoṭakaṃ gāvutappamāṇaṃ pūretvā gahetvā gaganatalena āgantvā dibbehi surabhikusumehi
atk-s0511a0:3174_8: Ekañca maṇidaṇḍakaṃ suvaṇṇamayakaṇṇikaṃ padumarāgamaṇimayapaṇṇaṃ sugandhakesaracchattaṃ viya padumacchattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3174_11: “ito dvenavute kappe gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3180_0: Buddhoti saddaṃ sutvāna, pīti me upapajjatha.
atk-s0511a0:3186_0: Tamahaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā, matthake dhārayiṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3189_0: Dvenavute ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:3195_0: Tattha mayi pabbajiteti mayi pabbajitabhāvaṃ upagate.
atk-s0511a0:3196_0: Tassa pana bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3196_3: brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3196_5: phussā ca sudattā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3199_0: Padumā nāma janikā, tissassa ca mahesino.
atk-s0511a0:3218_3: Yathā yojanānaṃ satānucco himavā pañcapabbato sudūre ṭhitānampi uccabhāvena ca sommabhāvena ca atiramaṇīyo hutvā dissati,
atk-s0511a0:3218_8: Ussavoti himabindu valāhakaussavaandhakārā viya anilasūriyadīpehi aniccatānilasūriyadīpehi upadduto parinibbuto sasāvako bhagavāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3219_0: Tisso kira bhagavā sunandavatīnagare sunandārāme parinibbāyi. Sesamettha gāthāsu pākaṭamevāti.
atk-s0511a0:3223_0: Tassa tissassa bhagavato aparabhāge anukkamena parihāyitvā puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā hutvā anupubbena
atk-s0511a0:3223_1: hāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu jātesu tasmiṃyeva kappe phusso nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0511a0:3223_2: Sopi bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā kāsikanagare jayasenarañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0511a0:3223_3: sirimāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sirimuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3224_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā kisāgotamiyā anupame nāma putte uppanne alaṅkatagajavarakkhandhagato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3224_2: So tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā tato gaṇaṃ pahāya sattāhaṃ ekacariyaṃ anubrūhayamāno
atk-s0511a0:3224_3: vasitvā visākhapuṇṇamāya aññatare nagare aññatarassa seṭṭhino dhītāya sirivaḍḍhāya nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3224_4: paribhuñjitvā siṃsapāvane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sirivaḍḍhena nāma upāsakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a0:3224_5: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā āmalakabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patvā –
atk-s0511a0:3224_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3224_8: bhikkhūnaṃ koṭīnaṃ dhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā ākāsena gantvā saṅkassanagare isipatane migadāye
atk-s0511a0:3234_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a0:3234_4: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanato suttagumbajālapūvasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3234_8: Amatambunāti amatasaṅkhātena dhammakathāsalilena tappayanto pāvassīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3235_0: Yadā pana bārāṇasīnagare sirivaḍḍho nāma rājā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3235_1: Tena saha pabbajitānaṃ tāpasānaṃ navutisatasahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3235_4: Yadā pana attano puttassa anupamakumārassa dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a0:3235_5: tadā asītiyā satasahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3239_0: Tato aparena samayena kaṇṇakujjanagare surakkhito rājaputto ca purohitaputto dhammasenakumāro ca phusse
atk-s0511a0:3239_1: sammāsambuddhe attano nagaraṃ sampatte saṭṭhiyā purisasatasahassehi saddhiṃ paccuggantvā vanditvā nimantetvā
atk-s0511a0:3239_2: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā te saparivārā pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a0:3239_4: Tesaṃ saṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3239_6: Puna kāsinagare jayasenarañño saṭṭhimattānaṃ ñātīnaṃ samāgame buddhavaṃsaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a0:3239_7: taṃ sutvā paññāsasatasahassāni ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3239_10: Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame maṅgalakathaṃ sutvā cattālīsapurisasatasahassāni pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3249_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto arindamanagare vijitāvī nāma khattiyo hutvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā
atk-s0511a0:3249_1: tassa mahādānaṃ datvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya bhagavato santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā tepiṭakadharo
atk-s0511a0:3255_0: Dvenavute ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:3264_0: Tassa pana bhagavato kāsikaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3264_3: surakkhito ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3264_5: cālā ca upacālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3274_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3277_0: Sopi satthā atulayaso, nibbuto so sasāvako”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3278_3: Sopi satthā atulayasoti sopi satthā amitayasoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3278_5: tassa so sabbameva vuttappakāraṃ visesaṃ hitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3279_0: Phusso kira sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ senārāme parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:3283_0: Phussassa buddhassa aparabhāge sāntarakappe tasmiñca kappe vītivatte ito ekanavutikappe vijitasabbakappo
atk-s0511a0:3283_1: parahitaniratasaṅkappo sabbattha vipassī vipassī nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:3283_2: So pāramiyo pūretvā anekaratanamaṇivisarasamujjotitabhavane tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0511a0:3283_3: anekabandhumato bandhumato rañño bandhumatiyā nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:3283_4: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena kheme migadāye mātudarato asitanīradarājito puṇṇacando viya nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3283_5: Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa lakkhaṇapāṭhakā ñātakā ca divā ca rattiñca antarantarā nimmisasañjanitandhakāravirahena visuddhaṃ passanti,
atk-s0511a0:3283_8: So aṭṭhavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Nanda- sunanda-
atk-s0511a0:3284_0: Sudassanādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ vīsati ca sahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3284_2: So aṭṭhavassasahassānaṃ accayena cattāri nimittāni disvā sutanudeviyā samavaṭṭakkhandhe nāma tanaye jāte
atk-s0511a0:3284_5: So tehi parivuto mahāpuriso aṭṭhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sudassanaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a0:3284_6: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā kusumasamalaṅkate sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sujātena nāma yavapālakena
atk-s0511a0:3284_7: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pāṭalibodhiṃ samalaṅkataṃ disvā dakkhiṇadisābhāgena taṃ upāgami.
atk-s0511a0:3285_0: Tassā pana pāṭaliyā samavaṭṭakkhandho taṃ divasaṃ paṇṇāsaratano hutvā abbhuggato sākhā paṇṇāsaratanā ubbedhena ratanasataṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_1: Taṃdivasameva sā pāṭalī kaṇṇikābaddhehi viya pupphehi paramasurabhigandhehi mūlato paṭṭhāya sabbasañchannā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_7: Mahāsamuddopi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi kuvalayuppalakumudehi sañchanno sītalamadhurasalilo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_8: Sabbampi ca dasasahassi cakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ dhajamālākulaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_9: Tattha tattha paṭimālāgulavippakiṇṇaṃ nānāsurabhikusumasajjitadharaṇītalaṃ dhūpacuṇṇandhakāraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_10: Taṃ upagantvā tepaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya –
atk-s0511a0:3285_12: tāva ito na uṭṭhahāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3285_13: Evaṃ nisīditvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā maggānukkamena cattāri maggañāṇāni maggānantaraṃ cattāri
atk-s0511a0:3285_14: phalañāṇāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇaṃ pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇāni
atk-s0511a0:3285_15: cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni ca sakale ca buddhaguṇe hatthagate katvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappo bodhipallaṅke nisinnova –
atk-s0511a0:3290_0: Paññāpetuṃ gatī natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukha”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:3291_0: Evaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā attano vemātikassa
atk-s0511a0:3291_1: bhātikassa khaṇḍakumārassa ca purohitaputtassa tissakumārassa ca upanissayasampattiṃ oloketvā ākāsena
atk-s0511a0:3291_2: gantvā kheme migadāye otaritvā ubhopi te uyyānapālena pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ parivārānaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3294_0: Vipassī nāma nāmena, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0511a0:3301_4: Ubho bodhesīti attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtanti ubho bodhesi.
atk-s0511a0:3301_5: Gaṇanāya na vattabboti devatānaṃ abhisamayavasena gaṇanaparicchedo natthīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3302_0: Athāparena samayena khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtaṃ anupabbajitāni caturāsītibhikkhusahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:3306_2: sambuddhamanupabbaju”nti ettha ete pana caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā purisā vipassissa kumārassa upaṭṭhākapurisāyeva.
atk-s0511a0:3306_3: Te pātova vipassikumārassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kumāramadisvā pātarāsatthāya gantvā bhuttapātarāsā “kuhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:3306_4: kumāro”ti pucchitvā tato “uyyānabhūmiṃ gato”ti sutvā “tattheva naṃ dakkhissāmā”ti nikkhantā nivattamānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3306_5: tassa sārathiṃ disvā “kumāro pabbajito”ti sutvā sutaṭṭhāneyeva sabbābharaṇāni muñcitvā antarāpaṇato kāsāyāni
atk-s0511a0:3306_7: Pabbajitvā ca te gantvā mahāpurisaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3307_0: Tato vipassī bodhisatto “padhānacariyaṃ caranto ākiṇṇo viharāmi,
atk-s0511a0:3307_1: na kho panametaṃ pātirūpaṃ yatheva maṃ ime gihibhūtā pubbe parivāretvā caranti,
atk-s0511a0:3307_2: idānipi tatheva kiṃ iminā gaṇenā”ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ukkaṇṭhitvā “ajjeva gacchāmī”ti cintetvā puna –
atk-s0511a0:3307_7: Taṃdivasañca uruvelagāmasadise ekasmiṃ gāme gāmavāsino manussā svātanāya saddhiṃ parisāya mahāpurisaṃ nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3307_8: Te tesaṃ caturāsītisahassānaṃ mahāpurisassa ca pāyāsameva paṭiyādayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3307_9: Atha vipassī mahāpuriso punadivase visākhapuṇṇamāya tasmiṃ gāme tehi pabbajitajanehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3307_10: Tatra te pabbajitā mahāpurisassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3308_1: “ayaṃ kālo nikkhamitu”nti nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāraṃ pidahitvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3308_2: Te kira pabbajitā sāyaṃ bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā –
atk-s0511a0:3308_3: “ativikālo jāto upadhārethā”ti vatvā paṇṇasāladvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ apassantāpi “kuhiṃ nu gato mahāpuriso”ti nānubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3308_4: “Gaṇavāse nibbinno eko viharitukāmo maññe mahāpuriso buddhabhūtaṃyeva taṃ passissāmā”ti antojambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Atha te –
atk-s0511a0:3308_5: “vipassinā kira buddhattaṃ patvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”nti sutvā anukkamena sabbe te pabbajitā bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā kheme migadāye sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3315_1: sambuddhaṃ anupabbajunti ettha anunā yogato sambuddhanti upayogavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3315_6: Upanisādinoti gantvā upanissāya dhammadānaṃ dadatoti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3315_7: Tepīti te caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā pabbajitā vipassissa upaṭṭhākabhūtā.
atk-s0511a0:3315_10: Kheme migadāye vipassīsammāsambuddhaṃ dve ca aggasāvake anupabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno vipassī bhagavā –
atk-s0511a0:3316_0: “Khantīparamaṃ tapo titikkhā, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā;
atk-s0511a0:3317_0: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto.
atk-s0511a0:3322_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0511a0:3323_1: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthāyo hontīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3323_3: Puna yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3323_4: Yadā pana vipassissa vemātikā tayo bhātaro paccantaṃ vūpasametvā bhagavato upaṭṭhānakiriyāya laddhavarā
atk-s0511a0:3323_5: hutvā attano nagaraṃ netvā upaṭṭhahantā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3323_6: Tesaṃ asītisatasahassānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā bhagavā kheme migadāye pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3334_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā anekanāgakoṭisatasahassaparivāro
atk-s0511a0:3334_1: hutvā saparivārassa dasabalassa asamabalasīlassa karuṇāsītalahadayassa sakkārakaraṇatthaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3334_2: candamaṇḍalasaṅkāsaṃ daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ dibbavibhavānurūpaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3334_3: mahādānaṃ datvā sattaratanakhacitaṃ mahārahaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ nānāmaṇijutivisarasamujjalaṃ pīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3334_4: Tadā naṃ pīṭhānumodanāvasāne “ito ayaṃ ekanavutikappe buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3362_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0511a0:3365_0: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-s0511a0:3374_8: Maṇimuttaratanakhacitanti maṇimuttādīhi vividhehi ratanehi khacitanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3374_9: Sabbābharaṇabhūsitanti sabbābharaṇehi vāḷarūpādīhi ratanamayehi maṇḍitanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3375_0: Tassa pana vipassissa bhagavato bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3375_3: khaṇḍo ca tisso ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3375_5: candā ca candamittā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3375_8: sarīrappabhā sabbakālaṃ satta yojanāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi asītivassasahassāni āyu,
atk-s0511a0:3390_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3400_2: Maggāmaggañca ācikkhīti “amatādhigamāya ayaṃ maggo ucchedasassatadiṭṭhivirahitā majjhimā paṭipadā maggo
atk-s0511a0:3400_3: kāyakilamathādiko nāyaṃ maggo”ti sesaputhujjane ācikkhīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3400_5: Lakkhaṇañca kusumitanti cittalakkhaṇādīhi phullitaṃ maṇḍitaṃ bhagavato sarīranti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3404_0: Vipassissa aparabhāge antarahite ca tasmiṃ kappe tato paraṃ ekūnasaṭṭhiyā kappesu buddhā loke na uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3404_3: Ito pana ekattiṃsakappe siniddhasukkhasāradārupacito pahūtasappisitto nidhūmo sikhī viya sikhī ca vessabhū cāti dve sammāsambuddhā loke uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3404_4: Tattha sikhī pana bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā kusalakaraṇavatī aruṇavatīnagare
atk-s0511a0:3404_5: paramaguṇavato aruṇavato nāma rañño aggamahesiyā rattakanakapaṭibimbarucirappabhāya pabhāvatiyā nāma
atk-s0511a0:3404_6: deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse vītināmetvā nisabhuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3404_7: Nemittikā panassa nāmaṃ karontā uṇhīsassa sikhā viya uggatattā “sikhī”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3405_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sabbakāmādeviyā guṇagaṇātule atule nāma putte uppanne hatthiyānena hatthikkhandhavaragato
atk-s0511a0:3405_3: So tehi parivuto aṭṭhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya sudassananigame
atk-s0511a0:3405_4: piyadassīseṭṭhino dhītuyā dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā taruṇakhadiravane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a0:3405_5: anomadassinā nāma tāpasena dinnā aṭṭha kusatiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā puṇḍarīkabodhiṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a0:3405_6: Tassā kira puṇḍarīkabodhiyāpi pāṭaliyā pamāṇameva pamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3405_9: So dibbehi gandhehi pupphehi sañchanno ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3405_12: Tassa ekapassato taruṇāni phalāni ekato majjhimāni ekato nātipakkāni ekato pakkhittadibbojāni viya surasāni
atk-s0511a0:3405_15: evaṃ dasasahassicakkavāḷesu pupphūpagā rukkhā pupphehi phalūpagā rukkhā phalehi paṭimaṇḍitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3406_0: So tattha catuvīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3406_1: Evaṃ nisīditvā chattiṃsa yojanavitthataṃ samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3406_3: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0511a0:3406_4: attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ sattatiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ upanissayasampattiṃ disvā surapathena gantvā
atk-s0511a0:3406_5: vividhāvaraṇavatiyā aruṇavatiyā rājadhāniyā samīpe migājinuyyāne otaritvā tehi munigaṇehi parivuto tesaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3416_0: Punapi aruṇavatiyā rājadhāniyā samīpeyeva abhibhūrājaputtassa ca sambhavarājaputtassa cāti dvinnaṃ saparivārānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3420_0: Yadā pana sūriyavatīnagaradvāre campakarukkhamūle titthiyamadamānabhañjanatthaṃ sabbajanabandhanamokkhatthañca
atk-s0511a0:3424_0: Abhibhunā ca sambhavena ca rājaputtena saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ arahantānaṃ satasahassānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3424_2: aruṇavatīnagare ñātisamāgame pabbajitānaṃ asītiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3424_4: Dhanañjayanagare dhanapālakanāgavinayanasamaye pabbajitānaṃ sattatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3434_0: Tattha anupalitto padumaṃvāti toye jātaṃ toyeva vaḍḍhitaṃ padumaṃ viya toyena anupalittaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3434_1: sopi bhikkhusannipāto loke jātopi lokadhammehi anupalitto ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3435_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto katthaci asaṃsaṭṭho paribhuttanagare arindamo nāma rājā hutvā sikhimhi satthari
atk-s0511a0:3435_1: paribhuttanagaramanuppatte saparivāro rājā bhagavato paccuggantvā pasādavaḍḍhitahadayanayanasoto dasabalassa
atk-s0511a0:3435_2: amalacaraṇakamalayugaḷesu saparivāro sirasā abhivanditvā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ issariyakulavibhavasaddhānurūpaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3435_3: mahādānaṃ datvā dussabhaṇḍāgāradvārāni vivarāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahagghāni vatthāni adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3435_5: vipulamudukaṇṇaṃ candarājivirājitavadanasobhaṃ erāvaṇavāraṇamiva arivāraṇaṃ varavāraṇaṃ datvā vāraṇappamāṇameva
atk-s0511a0:3447_0: Ekattiṃse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:3453_0: Tattha nimminitvāti tassa hatthino pamāṇena tulayitvā.
atk-s0511a0:3453_4: Pūrayiṃ mānasaṃ mayhanti mama cittaṃ dānapītiyā pūrayiṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3453_6: Niccaṃ daḷhamupaṭṭhitanti niccakālaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti dānavasena daḷhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ cittanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3454_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ aruṇavatī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3454_3: abhibhū ca sambhavo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3454_5: sakhilā ca madumā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3466_0: Cittā ceva suguttā ca, ahesuṃ aggupaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0511a0:3475_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3482_1: Tīṇi yojanaso pabhāti tīṇi yojanāni pabhā niccharantīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3482_10: Sikhī kira sammāsambuddho sīlavatīnagare assārāme parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:3483_0: “Sikhīva loke tapasā jalitvā, sikhīva meghāgamane naditvā;
atk-s0511a0:3484_0: Sikhī mahesindhanavippahīno, sikhīva santiṃ sugato gato so”.
atk-s0511a0:3485_0: Sikhissa kira bhagavato dhātuyo ekagghanāva hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu na vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3485_1: Sakalajambudīpavāsino pana manussā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ himagirisadisasobhaṃ thūpamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3489_0: Sikhissa pana sammāsambuddhassa aparabhāge antarahite tassa sāsane sattativassasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3489_1: Puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā hutvā anukkamena parihāyitvā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3489_2: Tadā vijitamanobhū sabbalokābhibhū sayambhū vessabhū nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:3489_3: So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā anomanagare suppatītassa suppatītassa nāma rañño
atk-s0511a0:3489_4: aggamahesiyā sīlavatiyā yasavatiyā nāma kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:3489_5: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena anupamuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3489_8: So chabbassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Ruci- suruci-
atk-s0511a0:3490_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sucittāya nāma deviyā suppabuddhe nāma kumāre uppanne suvaṇṇasivikāya uyyānadassanatthāya
atk-s0511a0:3490_3: Atha so tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sucittanigame sandissamānasarīrāya
atk-s0511a0:3490_4: sirivaḍḍhanāya nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a0:3490_5: narindanāgarājena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sālabodhiṃ padakkhiṇato upāgami.
atk-s0511a0:3490_6: Tassāpi sālassa tadeva pāṭaliyā pamāṇameva pamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3490_8: So sālamūlamupagantvā cattālīsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā vigatanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3490_11: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ tattheva vītināmetvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0511a0:3490_12: soṇakumārassa uttarakumārassa ca upanissayasampattiṃ disvā devapathena gantvā anomanagarasamīpe aruṇuyyāne
atk-s0511a0:3490_13: otaritvā uyyānapālena kumāre pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ saparivārānaṃ majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:3490_14: Tadā asītiyā koṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3491_0: Puna janapadacārikaṃ caranto bhagavā tattha tattha dhammaṃ desento sattatiyā koṭisahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3491_2: Anomanagareyeva diṭṭhijālaṃ bhindanto titthiyamānaddhajaṃ pātento mānamadaṃ viddhaṃsento dhammaddhajaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3491_3: samussayanto navutiyojanavitthatāya manussaparisāya parimāṇarahitāya devaparisāya yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā
atk-s0511a0:3494_0: Vessabhū nāma nāmena, loke uppajji nāyako.
atk-s0511a0:3509_0: Devā ceva manussā ca, bujjhare saṭṭhikoṭiyo”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3510_2: Taṇhānaṃ vijitanti taṇhānaṃ vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vasavattiṭṭhānanti evaṃ ñatvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3510_3: Nāgova bandhanaṃ chetvāti hatthī viya pūtilatābandhanaṃ chinditvā sambodhiṃ patto adhigato.
atk-s0511a0:3511_0: Soṇuttarānaṃ pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ samāgame pabbajitānaṃ asītiyā arahantasahassānaṃ majjhe māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3511_2: Yadā pana vessabhunā sabbalokābhibhunā saha pabbajitā sattattiṃsasahassasaṅkhā bhikkhū gaṇato ohīnasamaye pakkantā,
atk-s0511a0:3511_3: te vessabhussa sammāsambuddhassa dhammacakkappavattiṃ sutvā soreyyaṃ nāma nagaraṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3511_4: Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā sabbeva te ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā caturaṅgasamannāgatāya parisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3512_0: Yadā pana nārivāhananagare upasanto nāma rājaputto rajjaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0511a0:3512_2: sopi bhagavato āgamanaṃ sutvā saparivāro bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ katvā nimantetvā mahādānaṃ datvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasannahadayo pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3512_5: So tehi parivuto vessabhū bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a0:3522_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto sarabhavatīnagare paramapiyadassano sudassano nāma rājā hutvā vessabhumhi lokanāyake
atk-s0511a0:3522_1: sarabhanagaramupagate tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasannahadayo dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ jalajāmalāvikalakamalamakulasadisamañjaliṃ
atk-s0511a0:3522_2: sirasi katvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ datvā tattheva bhagavato nivāsatthāya gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0511a0:3522_3: katvā taṃ parikkhipitvā vihārasahassaṃ kāretvā sabbañca vibhavajātaṃ bhagavato sāsane pariccajitvā tassa

atk-s0511a0:3581_5: Evamayaṃ kappo pañcahi buddhuppādehi paṭimaṇḍitattā bhaddakappoti bhagavatā vaṇṇito.
atk-s0511a0:3581_6: Tattha kakusandho nāma bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā khemavatīnagare khemaṅkarassa
atk-s0511a0:3581_7: nāma rañño atthadhammānusāsakassa aggidattassa nāma purohitassa aggamahesiyā visākhāya nāma brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0511a0:3581_9: Yadā pana khattiyā brāhmaṇe sakkaronti garukaronti mānenti pūjenti,
atk-s0511a0:3582_0: Yadā pana brāhmaṇā khattiye sakkaronti garukaronti mānenti pūjenti,
atk-s0511a0:3582_2: Tadā kira brāhmaṇā khattiyehi sakkarīyanti garukarīyanti,
atk-s0511a0:3582_3: tasmā saccasandho kakusandho bodhisatto vibhavasirisamudayenākule anākule brāhmaṇakule dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādento kampayanto udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:3582_5: Tato dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena khemavatuyyāne mātukucchito suvaṇṇalatāto aggijālo viya nikkhami.

atk-s0511a0:3583_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā rociniyā brāhmaṇiyā anuttare uttare nāma kumāre uppanne payuttena ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3583_2: So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sucirindhanigame vajirindhabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0511a0:3583_3: dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā khadiravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye subhaddena nāma
atk-s0511a0:3583_4: yavapālakena upanītā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā sirīsabodhiṃ pāṭaliyā vuttappamāṇaṃ dibbagandhaṃ upavāyamānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3583_5: upagantvā catuttiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā sambodhiṃ patvā –
atk-s0511a0:3583_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ cattālīsāya
atk-s0511a0:3583_8: bhikkhusahassānaṃ saccappaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā ekāheneva makilanagarasamīpe sambhūtaṃ isipatanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3583_9: nāma migadāyaṃ pavisitvā tesaṃ majjhagato bhagavā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:3583_10: Tadā cattālīsāya koṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3584_0: Puna kaṇṇakujjanagaradvāre mahāsālarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā tiṃsakoṭisahassānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0511a0:3584_2: Yadā pana khemavatīnagarassāvidūre aññatarasmiṃ devāyatane abhimatanaradevo naradevo nāma yakkho dissamānamanussasarīro
atk-s0511a0:3584_4: sarassa samīpe ṭhatvā kamalakuvalayakallahārādīhi satte upalāpetvā manusse khādati.
atk-s0511a0:3584_5: Tasmiṃ magge pacchinne janasampātarahite mahāaṭaviṃ pavisitvā tattha sampatte satte khādati.
atk-s0511a0:3584_7: Ubhatokantāradvāre kira mahājanakāyo sannipatitvā kantāranittharaṇatthāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3584_8: Atha vigatabhavabandho kakusandho satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3584_9: volokento ñāṇajālassa antogataṃ taṃ mahesakkhaṃ naradevayakkhaṃ tañca janasamūhamaddasa.
atk-s0511a0:3584_10: Disvā ca pana gaganatalena gantvā tassa janakāyassa passantasseva bhagavā anekavihitaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karonto
atk-s0511a0:3584_11: tassa naradevayakkhassa bhavane otaritvā tassa maṅgalapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3585_0: Atha kho so manussabhakkho yakkho chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjentaṃ indadhanuparivutamiva divasakaraṃ munidivasakaraṃ pavanapathenāgacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:3585_1: “dasabalo mamānukampāya idhāgacchatī”ti pasannahadayo attano parivārayakkhehi saddhiṃ anekamigagaṇavantaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3585_2: himavantaṃ gantvā nānāvaṇṇagandhāni jalajathalajāni kusumāni paramamanoramāni sugandhagandhe samāharitvā
atk-s0511a0:3585_3: attano pallaṅke nisinnaṃ vigatarandhaṃ kakusandhaṃ lokanāyakaṃ mālāgandhavilepanādīhi pūjayitvā thutisaṅgītāni
atk-s0511a0:3585_4: pavattento sirasi añjaliṃ katvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3585_5: Tato manussā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pasannahadayā samāgamma bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3585_6: Atha appaṭisandho kakusandho bhagavā abhipūjitanaradevayakkhaṃ naradevayakkhaṃ kammaphalasambandhadassanena
atk-s0511a0:3601_3: Cariyāya pāramiṃ gatoti sabbapāramīnaṃ pūraṇavasena pāraṃ gato.
atk-s0511a0:3601_4: Sīhova pañjaraṃ bhetvāti sīho viya pañjaraṃ munikuñjaro bhavapañjaraṃ vināsetvāti attho.

atk-s0511a0:3608_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa pattacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ datvā añjanādīni sabbabhesajjāni ca adāsi.

atk-s0511a0:3659_3: So tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ aggisonabrāhmaṇassa dhītāya aggisonabrāhmaṇakumāriyā
atk-s0511a0:3659_4: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā khadiravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye jaṭātindukena nāma yavapālena
atk-s0511a0:3659_5: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā udumbarabodhiṃ puṇḍarīke vuttappamāṇaṃ phalavibhūtisampannaṃ dakkhiṇato

atk-s0511a0:3659_9: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ tiṃsabhikkhusahassānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3659_10: upanissayasampattiṃ disvā gaganapathena gantvā sudassananagarasamīpe isipatane migadāye otaritvā tesaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3660_0: Puna sundaranagaradvāre mahāsālarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā vīsatikoṭisahassānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyesi,
atk-s0511a0:3660_2: Attano mātaraṃ uttaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatānaṃ samāgatānaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3660_3: desente bhagavati dasannaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3677_0: “Pakaraṇe satta desento, vassaṃ vasati so muni;
atk-s0511a0:3679_0: Tattha dasa dhamme pūrayitvānāti dasa pāramidhamme pūrayitvā.
atk-s0511a0:3679_8: sundaranagaradvāre yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devapuraṃ gato tattha paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vasi.
atk-s0511a0:3679_10: Pakaraṇe satta desentoti tattha devānaṃ sattappakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desento vasi.

atk-s0511a0:3688_7: Atha so mahāpuriso tassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ sutvā mahārajjaṃ pariccajitvā tasseva bhagavato santike pabbaji.

atk-s0511a0:3725_0: Ukkāmukhe yathā kambu, evaṃ raṃsīhi maṇḍito.

atk-s0511a0:3735_6: Mahājanassa vipassanācetiyaṅgaṇe ṭhitassa namassanatthāya dhammacetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā sasāvakasaṅgho satthā parinibbāyīti attho.

atk-s0511a0:3742_0: Koṇāgamanassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge tassa sāsane ca antarahite tiṃsavassasahassāyukā sattā anupubbena
atk-s0511a0:3742_1: parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā hutvā puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā hutvā puna anupubbena parihāyitvā vīsativassasahassāyukesu
atk-s0511a0:3742_2: sattesu jātesu anekamanussapo kassapo nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:3742_3: So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā bārāṇasīnagare brahmadattassa nāma brāhmaṇassa
