atk-s0511a0:3742_8: Haṃsavā yasavā sirinandoti tassa tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3742_9: Sunandā nāma brāhmaṇippamukhāni aṭṭhacattālīsa itthisahassāni paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3743_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sunandāya brāhmaṇiyā vijitasene nāma putte uppanne uppannasaṃvego “mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0511a0:3743_1: Athassa parivitakkasamanantarameva pāsādo kulālacakkamiva bhamitvā gaganatalamabbhuggantvā paramarucirakaranikaro
atk-s0511a0:3743_2: saradasamayarajanikaro viya tārāgaṇaparivuto anekanarasataparivuto gaganatalamalaṅkaronto viya puññānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3743_3: pakāsento viya jananayanahadayāni ākaḍḍhento viya rukkhaggāni paraṃ sobhayamāno viya ca gantvā nigrodhabodhiṃ
atk-s0511a0:3743_5: Atha bodhisatto mahāsatto pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā devadattaṃ arahattaddhajamādāya pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3743_6: Tassa nāṭakitthiyo pāsādā otaritvā aḍḍhagāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā saparivārā senāsannivesaṃ katvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3743_7: Tato itthiparicārike ṭhapetvā sahāgatā sabbe pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3744_0: Mahāpuriso kira sattāhaṃ tehi parivuto padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sunandāya nāma brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0511a0:3744_1: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā khadiravane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye somena nāma yavapālakena
atk-s0511a0:3744_2: upanītā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā nigrodhabodhiṃ upagantvā pañcadasahatthāyāmavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3744_5: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3744_6: koṭiyā upanissayasampattiṃ disvā gaganatalena gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye otaritvā tehi parivuto
atk-s0511a0:3744_8: Tadā vīsatiyā koṭisahassānaṃ paṭhamo dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3755_2: aparimitabhogakkhandhaṃ anekakoṭisahassadhanasañcayaṃ dasasatanayanabhavanasadisabhogaṃ atiduccajaṃ tiṇamiva chaḍḍitanti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3755_5: yathā usabho goṭṭhaṃ bhinditvā yathāsukhaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0511a0:3755_6: evaṃ mahāpurisopi gehabandhanaṃ bhinditvā abhisambodhiṃ pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3756_0: Puna catumāsaṃ janapadacārikaṃ caramāne satthari dasakoṭisahassānaṃ dutiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3756_1: Yadā pana sundaranagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a0:3756_2: tadā pañcannaṃ koṭisahassānaṃ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3756_3: Puna yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā suraripudurabhibhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane sudhammā nāma devasabhā atthi,
atk-s0511a0:3756_4: tattha nisīditvā attano mātaraṃ dhanavatīdeviṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dasasahassilokadhātuyā devatānaṃ anuggahakaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3756_5: sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desento tīṇi devatākoṭisahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:3769_7: Sudhammāti tāvatiṃsabhavane sudhammā nāma sabhā atthi,
atk-s0511a0:3770_0: Tadā kira ānubhāvavijitanaradevo naradevo nāma mahesakkho heṭṭhā vuttanaradevayakkho viya mahiddhiko yakkho ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3770_1: So jambudīpe ekasmiṃ nagare rañño yādisaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3770_2: tādisaṃ rūpasaṇṭhānaṃ sarakuttiṃ nimminitvā taṃ rājānaṃ māretvā khāditvā sahaantepuraṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjitvā aparimitamaṃsabhojano ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3770_4: Yadā pana taṃ kusalā chekā itthiyo –
atk-s0511a0:3770_7: tadā so lajjito hutvā tā sabbā khāditvā aññaṃ nagaraṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0511a0:3770_8: Evameva so naradevayakkho manusse bhakkhayanto yadā sundaranagarābhimukho agamāsi,
atk-s0511a0:3770_9: tadā taṃ disvā nagaravāsino manussā maraṇabhayatajjitasantāsā sakanagarato nikkhamitvā tato tato palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3770_10: Atha te manusse palāyamāne disvā kassapadasabalo tassa naradevassa yakkhassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3770_11: Naradevo evaṃ devadevaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā vissaraṃ ghoraṃ nādaṃ naditvā bhagavato bhayaṃ uppādetuṃ asakkonto taṃ saraṇaṃ gantvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0511a0:3770_12: Pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ dametvā dhamme desiyamāne sampattānaṃ naramarānaṃ gaṇanapathātītānaṃ abhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3771_0: Tassa pana kassapabhagavato ekova sāvakasannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3771_2: So kassapassa bodhisattassa sarīre lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā pituno bhāsato sutvā –
atk-s0511a0:3771_4: etassāhaṃ santike pabbajitvā saṃsāradukkhato muccissāmī”ti cintetvā suddhamunigaṇavantaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3771_6: So aparabhāge “kassapakumāro nikkhamitvā abhisambodhiṃ anuppatto”ti sutvā saparivāro āgantvā kassapassa
atk-s0511a0:3771_7: bhagavato santike saparivāro ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:3771_8: Tasmiṃ samāgame kassapo bhagavā māghapuṇṇamāyaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:3778_2: Hirisīlena tādinanti hiriyā ca sīlena ca sadisānaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3779_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū bhūmiyañceva antalikkhe ca pākaṭo ghaṭikārassa kumbhakārassa sahāyo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3779_1: So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā tassa santike pabbaji.
atk-s0511a0:3779_2: So āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā vattapaṭipattiyā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi.
atk-s0511a0:3791_0: Tassa dhammaṃ suṇitvāna, pabbajiṃ tassa santike.
atk-s0511a0:3800_0: Imamhi bhaddake kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a0:3809_0: Tattha bhūmantalikkhakusaloti bhūmisikkhāsu ca antalikkhesu ca joticakkācāre jotivijjāya ca kusaloti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3809_10: Na kvaci parihāyāmīti kvacipi sīlesu vā samādhisamāpattiādīsu vā katthaci kutopi na parihāyāmi,
atk-s0511a0:3809_11: sabbattha me parihāni nāma na vijjatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a0:3810_4: Mama acchariyanti mama sammāpaṭipattiṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ kassapo bhagavā disvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3811_0: Tassa pana kassapassa bhagavato jātanagaraṃ bārāṇasī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3811_3: tisso ca bhāradvājo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a0:3811_5: anuḷā ca uruveḷā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a0:3829_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3835_0: Keci nibbānaṃ patthentā, passantu me alaṅkaraṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3854_0: Tattha vijjulaṭṭhīvāti ghanabhāvena saṇṭhitā vijjulatā viya.
atk-s0511a0:3854_3: Sīlaṃ datvā vilepananti catupārisuddhisīlasaṅkhātaṃ cittasantativibhūsanatthaṃ vilepanaṃ datvā.
atk-s0511a0:3855_4: Nibbānaṃ patthentāti sabbākusalamalavilayakaraṃ amatamasaṅkhatamanītikaṃ paramasantaṃ accutirasaṃ nibbānaṃ patthentā vicaranti.
atk-s0511a0:3855_5: Te imaṃ alaṅkāraṃ vuttappakāraṃ mayā dassitaṃ passantūti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3856_3: Datvā sannāhamuttamanti uttamaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyasannāhaṃ datvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3856_8: Dhammakhaggavaraṃ datvāti tassa yogāvacarassa vīriyupalatalanisitadhāraṃ maggapaññāvarakhaggaṃ datvā.
atk-s0511a0:3857_1: Āveḷaṃ caturo phaleti cattāri phalāni vaṭaṃsakaṃ katvā.
atk-s0511a0:3857_2: Chaḷabhiññābharaṇanti ābharaṇatthāya alaṅkārakaraṇatthāya cha abhiññāyo datvā.
atk-s0511a0:3857_5: datvā pāpanivāraṇanti accantavisuddhaṃ vimuttisetacchattaṃ sabbākusalātapanivāraṇaṃ datvā.
atk-s0511a0:3857_6: Māpayitvābhayaṃ pupphanti abhayapuragāminaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ pupphaṃ katvāti attho.
atk-s0511a0:3858_0: Kassapo kira bhagavā kāsiraṭṭhe setabyanagare setabyuyyāne parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a0:3858_2: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā sannipatitvā ekekaṃ suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ koṭiagghanakaṃ ratanavicittaṃ bahicinanatthaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3858_3: ekekaṃ aḍḍhakoṭiagghanakaṃ abbhantarapūraṇatthaṃ manosilāya mattikākiccaṃ telena udakakiccaṃ karonto
atk-s0511a0:3870_0: Tattha amhākaṃ bodhisatto dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike adhikāraṃ karonto kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni āgato.
atk-s0511a0:3870_1: Kassapassa pana bhagavato orabhāge ṭhapetvā imaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ añño buddho nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:3870_2: Iti dīpaṅkarādīnaṃ catuvīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo pana bodhisatto yenena –
atk-s0511a0:3874_0: Ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārena “handa,
atk-s0511a0:3874_2: vicināmi ito cito”ti ussāhaṃ katvā “vicinanto tadādakkhiṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3874_5: āgacchanto ca ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ ānisaṃsā saṃvaṇṇitā –
atk-s0511a0:3880_0: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0511a0:3890_0: Te ānisaṃse adhigantvāva āgato. Evaṃ āgacchanto vessantarattabhāve ṭhito –
atk-s0511a0:3893_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavikampanādīni mahāpuññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cavitvā tusitapure nibbatti.
atk-s0511a0:3895_0: Tusitapure vasamāneyeva pana bodhisatte buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:3895_6: Tattha “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā
atk-s0511a0:3895_7: vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā
atk-s0511a0:3895_12: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uḍḍayhissanti vinassissanti,
atk-s0511a0:3895_13: yāva brahmalokā lokavināso bhavissati, mettaṃ, mārisā, bhāvetha,
atk-s0511a0:3896_0: “Vassasahassassa accayena pana sabbaññubuddho loke upajjissatī”ti lokapāladevatā – “ito, mārisā,
atk-s0511a0:3896_1: vassasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentiyo āhiṇḍanti.
atk-s0511a0:3897_1: vassasatassa accayena cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentiyo āhiṇḍanti.
atk-s0511a0:3898_0: Tesu buddhakolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekato sannipatitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3898_1: “asuko nāma satto buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā upasaṅkamitvā āyācanti,
atk-s0511a0:3898_2: āyācamānā ca tassa pubbanimittesu uppannesu āyācanti.
atk-s0511a0:3898_3: Tadā pana sabbāpi tā ekekacakkavāḷe catumahārāja- sakka- suyāma-
atk-s0511a0:3898_7: mahābrahmehi saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā tusitabhavane uppannacutinimittassa bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā – “mārisa,
atk-s0511a0:3898_9: pūrentehi ca na sakkabrahmasampattiādikaṃ sampattiṃ patthentehi pūritā,
atk-s0511a0:3898_10: lokanittharaṇatthāya pana vo sabbaññutaṃ patthentehi paripūritā buddhattāya –
atk-s0511a0:3902_0: Atha mahāsatto devatāhi evaṃ āyāciyamāno devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāla- dīpa- desa- kula-
atk-s0511a0:3902_4: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:3902_5: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti,
atk-s0511a0:3902_7: tesaṃ “aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā”ti kathentānaṃ “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti neva sotabbaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0511a0:3902_11: Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a0:3902_16: Vassasatasahassato pana paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma.
atk-s0511a0:3903_0: Tato dīpaṃ olokento saparivāre cattāro mahādīpe oloketvā –
atk-s0511a0:3904_2: Katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti okāsaṃ olokento majjhimadesaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a0:3905_1: “buddhā nāma vessakule vā suddakule vā na nibbattanti.
atk-s0511a0:3905_2: Lokasammate pana khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā nibbattanti,
atk-s0511a0:3905_4: tattha nibbattissāmi suddhodano nāma rājā pitā me bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a0:3906_2: kappasatasahassaṃ pana pūritapāramī jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlāyeva hoti.
atk-s0511a0:3906_6: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānī”ti passi.
atk-s0511a0:3907_0: Iti imaṃ pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me, mārisā,
atk-s0511a0:3907_2: “gacchatha tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:3907_5: “ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchā”ti pubbe katakusalakammokāsaṃ sārayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0511a0:3907_6: So evaṃ tāhi devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tatra vicarantova cavitvā mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchismiṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0511a0:3907_7: Mahāpurisassa pana mātu kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggaṇhanakkhaṇe ekappahāreneva sakaladasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampi.
atk-s0511a0:3908_0: Evaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikassa bodhisattassa ceva bodhisattamātuyā ca upaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ khaggahatthā cattāro devaputtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3908_2: lābhaggayasaggappattā ca sā ahosi sukhinī akilantakāyā.
atk-s0511a0:3908_3: Bodhisattañca attano kucchigataṃ vippasanne maṇiratane āvutapaṇḍusuttaṃ viya passati.
atk-s0511a0:3908_4: Yasmā bodhisattena vasitakucchi nāma cetiyagabbhasadisā hoti,
atk-s0511a0:3908_5: na sakkā aññena sattena āvasituṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā,
atk-s0511a0:3908_6: tasmā bodhisattamātā sattāhajāte bodhisatte kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbatti.
atk-s0511a0:3908_7: Yathā pana aññā itthiyo dasa māse appatvāpi atikkamitvāpi nisinnāpi nipannāpi vijāyanti,
atk-s0511a0:3908_9: Bodhisattamātā pana bodhisattaṃ dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā ṭhitāva vijāyati.
atk-s0511a0:3909_0: Mahāmāyāpi devī dasa māse kucchinā bodhisattaṃ pariharitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā ñātigharaṃ gantukāmā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesi –
atk-s0511a0:3909_3: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kapilavatthuto yāva devadahanagarā añjasaṃ samaṃ kāretvā kadalipuṇṇaghaṭakamukadhajapaṭākādīhi
atk-s0511a0:3909_4: alaṅkārāpetvā navakanakasivikāya nisīdāpetvā mahatiyā vibhūtiyā mahatā parivārena pesesi.
atk-s0511a0:3909_5: Dvinnaṃ pana nagarānaṃ antare ubhayanagaravāsīnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ nāma maṅgalasālavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0511a0:3909_6: taṃ tasmiṃ samaye mūlato yāva aggasākhā sabbaṃ ekaphāliphullaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3909_7: Sākhantarehi ceva pupphantarehi ca paramaratikaramadhuramanoramavirutāhi madamuditāhi anubhuttapañcarāhi
atk-s0511a0:3912_0: Amaccā rañño ārocetvā deviṃ gahetvā taṃ lumbinīvanaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3912_1: Sā maṅgalasālamūlaṃ gantvā tassa ujusamavaṭṭakkhandhassa pupphaphalapallavasamalaṅkatassa yaṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhitukāmā ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3912_2: sā sālasākhā abalā janahadayalolā sayameva vilambamānā hutvā tassā karatalasmiṃ samupagatā.
atk-s0511a0:3912_3: Atha sā taṃ sālasākhaṃ tambatuṅganakhujjalena kamaladalavattivaṭṭaṅgulinā navakanakakaṭavalayasobhinā dakkhiṇena paramaratikarena karena aggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:3912_4: Sā taṃ sālasākhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā asitajaladharavivaragatā bālacandalekhā viya ca aciraṭṭhitikā accipabhā
atk-s0511a0:3912_5: viya ca nandanavanajātā devī viya ca devī virocittha.
atk-s0511a0:3912_8: Sā sālasākhaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhamānāya eva tassā gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3913_0: Taṅkhaṇaṃyeva cattāro visuddhacittā mahābrahmāno suvaṇṇajālaṃ ādāya āgantvā tena suvaṇṇajālena bodhisattaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mātu purato ṭhapetvā –
atk-s0511a0:3913_3: Yathā pana aññe sattā mātukucchito nikkhamantā paṭikkūlena asucinā makkhitā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0511a0:3913_5: Bodhisatto pana dve hatthe dve pāde pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhitova
atk-s0511a0:3913_6: suddho visado kāsikavatthe nikkhittamaṇiratanaṃ viya virocamāno mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3913_7: Evaṃ santepi bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātuyā ca sakkāratthaṃ ākāsato dve udakadhārā nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa ca mātuyā ca sarīre utuṃ gāhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3914_0: Atha naṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahetvā ṭhitānaṃ brahmānaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno maṅgalasammatāya sukhasamphassāya ajinappaveṇiyā gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:3914_2: manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0511a0:3914_8: Evaṃ dasa disā anuviloketvā attanā sadisaṃ adisvā uttaradisābhimukho sattapadavītihārena agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3914_9: Gacchanto ca pathaviyā eva gato, nākāsena.
atk-s0511a0:3914_14: Mahājanassa pana ākāsena gacchanto viya alaṅkatapaṭiyatto viya ca soḷasavassuddesiko viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3914_15: Tato sattame pade ṭhatvā “aggohamasmi lokassā”tiādikaṃ āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchārento sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0511a0:3915_0: Bodhisatto hi tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi mahosadhattabhāve,
atk-s0511a0:3915_3: Mahosadhattabhāve kirassa mātukucchito nikkhantamattasseva sakko devarājā āgantvā candanasāraṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā gato,
atk-s0511a0:3915_6: tvaṃ kiṃ gahetvā āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Osadhaṃ, ammā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3916_0: Vessantarattabhāve pana mātukucchito nikkhantamattova dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā –
atk-s0511a0:3916_6: tātā”ti puttassa hatthaṃ attano hatthatale katvā sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3917_0: Imasmiṃ pana attabhāve imaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadīti evaṃ bodhisatto tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0511a0:3917_2: Yasmiṃ pana samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto lumbinīvane jāto tasmiṃyeva samaye rāhulamātā devī ānando channo
atk-s0511a0:3917_3: kāḷudāyī amacco kaṇḍako assarājā mahābodhirukkho catasso nidhikumbhiyo ca jātā,
atk-s0511a0:3917_4: tattha eko gāvutappamāṇo eko aḍḍhayojanappamāṇo eko tigāvutappamāṇo eko yojanappamāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3918_2: “kapilavatthunagare suddhodanamahārājassa putto bodhimūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissatī”ti tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0511a0:3918_4: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājassa kulūpako aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī kāḷadevalo nāma tāpaso bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3918_5: katvā divāvihāratthāya tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha divāvihāraṃ nisinno tā devatā tuṭṭhamānasā kīḷantiyo
atk-s0511a0:3918_10: so bodhimaṇḍe nisīditvā buddho hutvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessati,
atk-s0511a0:3918_11: tassa ‘anantarūpaṃ buddhalīḷaṃ passituṃ labhissāmā’ti iminā kāraṇena tuṭṭhamhā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3919_0: Atha tāpaso tāsaṃ devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā paramadassanīyaratanāvalokato devalokato oruyha narapatinivesanaṃ pavisitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3919_4: Rājā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ tanayaṃ āharāpetvā devalatāpasaṃ vandāpetuṃ abhihari.
atk-s0511a0:3919_5: Mahāpurisassa pādā parivattitvā vijjulatā viya asitajaladharakūṭesu tāpasassa jaṭāsu patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3919_6: Bodhisattena hi tenattabhāvena vanditabbo nāma añño natthi.
atk-s0511a0:3919_7: Tato tāpaso uṭṭhāyāsanā bodhisattassa añjaliṃ paggahesi.
atk-s0511a0:3919_8: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā attano puttaṃ vandi.
atk-s0511a0:3920_0: Tato “ahaṃ imaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmi nu kho,
atk-s0511a0:3920_3: antarāyeva kālaṃ katvā buddhasatenapi buddhasahassenapi gantvā bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye arūpabhave nibbattissāmī”ti disvā –
atk-s0511a0:3920_4: “evarūpaṃ nāma acchariyapurisaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhissāmi,
atk-s0511a0:3920_5: mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī”ti parodi.
atk-s0511a0:3920_9: amhākaṃ ayyaputtassa koci antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3920_15: mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatīti attānaṃ anusocanto rodāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:3921_0: Tato bodhisattaṃ pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā –
atk-s0511a0:3921_1: “nāmaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti rājabhavanaṃ catujjātikagandhena upalimpitvā lājapañcamāni kusumāni vikiritvā asambhinnapāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3921_2: pacāpetvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgate aṭṭhasate brāhmaṇe nimantetvā rājabhavane nisīdāpetvā madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3921_5: Tesu rāmādayo aṭṭha brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā lakkhaṇapariggāhakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3921_6: Tesu satta janā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipitvā dvedhā byākariṃsu –
atk-s0511a0:3921_7: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0511a0:3921_9: Tesaṃ pana sabbadaharo gottena koṇḍañño nāma brāhmaṇo bodhisattassa lakkhaṇavarasampattiṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:3921_11: ekanteneva vivaṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3921_12: Athassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā sabbalokatthasiddhikarattā siddhatthoti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3922_0: Atha te brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantetvā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0511a0:3922_2: suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutaṃ pattaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā,
atk-s0511a0:3922_3: tumhe pana tasmiṃ pabbajitvā sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajathā”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3922_4: Tato sattapi janā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0511a0:3922_6: Tadā pana rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0511a0:3922_7: “kiṃ disvā mama putto pabbajissatī”ti te pucchi.
atk-s0511a0:3922_11: Rājā “ito paṭṭhāya evarūpānaṃ mama puttassa santikaṃ āgamituṃ mā adatthā”ti vatvā kumārassa cakkhupathe
atk-s0511a0:3922_12: jiṇṇapurisādīnaṃ āgamananivāraṇatthaṃ catūsu disāsu gāvutagāvutaṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3922_13: Taṃdivasaṃ maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatitesu asītiyā ñātikulasahassesu ekameko ekamekaṃ puttaṃ paṭijāni –
atk-s0511a0:3922_20: Atha rājā mahāpurisassa paramarūpasampannā vigatasabbadosā catusaṭṭhi dhātiyo adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3922_21: Bodhisatto anantena parivārena mahatā sirisamudayena vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0511a0:3923_1: Taṃdivasaṃ rājā mahatiyā vibhūtiyā mahatā parivārena nagarato nikkhamanto puttampi gahetvāva agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3923_2: Kasikammaṭṭhāne eko jamburukkho paramaramaṇīyo ghanasandacchāyo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3923_3: Tassa heṭṭhā kumārassa sayanaṃ paññāpetvā upari varakanakatārākhacitaṃ rattacelavitānaṃ bandhitvā sāṇipākārena
atk-s0511a0:3923_4: parikkhipāpetvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rājā sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā amaccagaṇaparivuto naṅgalakaraṇaṭṭhānamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3924_0: Atha bodhisatto ito cito ca olokento kiñci adisvā sahasā uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpāne pariggahetvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0511a0:3924_3: tassa pana jamburukkhassa chāyā parimaṇḍalā hutvā tattheva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3924_4: Dhātito panassa “ayyaputto ekakovā”ti vegena sāṇipākāraṃ ukkhipitvā pariyesantiyo sirisayane pallaṅkena
atk-s0511a0:3924_5: nisinnaṃ tañca pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3924_6: Rājā vegena āgantvā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ vo, tāta,
atk-s0511a0:3925_1: Rājā bodhisattassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike ramma- suramma-
atk-s0511a0:3925_3: Ekaṃ navabhūmikaṃ ekaṃ sattabhūmikaṃ ekaṃ pañcabhūmikaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3926_1: “putto me vayappatto chattamassa ussāpetvā rajjasiriṃ passissāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3926_2: So sākiyānaṃ paṇṇāni pahiṇi “putto me vayappatto,
atk-s0511a0:3926_4: sabbe attano gehesu vayappattā dārikā imaṃ gehaṃ pesentū”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3926_10: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0511a0:3926_18: Mahāpuriso taṃ sarāsanaṃ āharāpetvā pallaṅkena nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhāpetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva
atk-s0511a0:3926_19: dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ ropesi.
atk-s0511a0:3926_21: “Kiṃ eso saddo”ti ca vutte “devo gajjatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3926_24: aṅgīrasassa kumārassa sahassatthāmaṃ dhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ poṭhentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3926_25: Sākiyā taṃ sutvā tāvatakeneva āraddhacittā tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3927_9: Tampi vijjhitvā aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0511a0:3927_11: Mahāsatto vālukasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi vinivijjhitvā udake ekūsabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi thale aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3927_12: Atha naṃ “vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3927_13: “Tena hi yojanamattaṃ vātiṅgaṇaṃ bandhāpethā”ti vatvā yojanamattake vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā
atk-s0511a0:3927_14: rattandhakāre meghapaṭalehi channāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ khipi.
atk-s0511a0:3927_15: Taṃ gantvā yojanamattake vālaṃ phāletvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:3927_17: taṃdivasaṃ mahāpuriso loke vattamānaṃ sippaṃ sabbameva dassesi.
atk-s0511a0:3928_0: Atha sākiyā attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3928_3: Mahāpuriso devakumāro viya surayuvatīhi parivuto narayuvatīhi parivuto nippurisehi turiyehi paricāriyamāno
atk-s0511a0:3928_4: mahāsampattiṃ anubhavamāno utuvārena utuvārena tesu tīsu pāsādesu viharati.
atk-s0511a0:3928_5: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānabhūmiṃ gantukāmo sārathiṃ āmantetvā –
atk-s0511a0:3928_9: vararathaṃ samalaṅkaritvā sasikumudasadisavaṇṇe anilagaruḷajave ājānīye cattāro maṅgalasindhave yojetvā
atk-s0511a0:3928_11: Bodhisatto devavimānasadisaṃ taṃ rathavaramāruyha uyyānābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3929_1: pubbanimittamassa dassessāmā”ti ekaṃ devaputtaṃ jarājajjarasarīraṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ vaṅkagattaṃ daṇḍahatthaṃ pavedhamānaṃ katvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3929_2: Taṃ bodhisatto ceva sārathi ca passanti.
atk-s0511a0:3929_4: “sārathi ko nāmesa puriso kesāpissa na yathā aññesa”nti mahāpadānasutte āgatanayeneva pucchitvā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0511a0:3929_6: yatra hi nāma jātassa jarā paññāyissatī”ti saṃviggahadayo tatova paṭinivattitvā pāsādameva abhiruhi.
atk-s0511a0:3930_2: Tato kampamānamānaso rājā aḍḍhayojane ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3930_3: Punekadivasaṃ bodhisatto uyyānaṃ gacchanto tāhi eva devatāhi nimmitaṃ byādhitañca purisaṃ disvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0511a0:3930_6: “Pabbajjāya mānasaṃ assa bhinnaṃ karissa”nti ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā samantato tigāvutappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3931_0: Punapi bodhisatto ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ kālaṅkataṃ disvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0511a0:3931_2: Rājā nivattanakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā puna ārakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yojanappamāṇe padese ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3932_0: Punapi bodhisatto ekadivasaṃ uyyānaṃ gacchanto tatheva devatāhi nimmitaṃ sunivatthaṃ supārutaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:3932_3: Sārathi kiñcāpi buddhuppādassa abhāvā pabbajitaṃ vā pabbajitaguṇe vā na jānāti,
atk-s0511a0:3932_4: devatānubhāvena pana “pabbajito nāmāyaṃ devā”ti vatvā pabbajjāya guṇaṃ tassa vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0511a0:3933_0: Tato bodhisatto pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā taṃdivasaṃ uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3933_1: Dīghāyukā bodhisattā vassasate vassasate atikkante jiṇṇādīsu ekekaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3933_2: Amhākaṃ pana bodhisatto appāyukakāle uppannattā catunnaṃ catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena uyyānaṃ gacchanto anukkamena ekekaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a0:3933_5: Tattha divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā uyyānarasamanubhavitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā atthaṅgate sūriye maṅgalasilātale nisīdi attānaṃ alaṅkārāpetukāmo.
atk-s0511a0:3933_6: Athassa cittācāramaññāya sakkena devānamindena āṇatto vissakammo nāma devaputto āgantvā tasseva kappakasadiso hutvā dibbehi alaṅkārehi alaṅkari.
atk-s0511a0:3933_7: Athassa sabbālaṅkārasamalaṅkatassa sabbatālāvacaresu sakāni sakāni paṭibhānāni dassayantesu brāhmaṇesu
atk-s0511a0:3933_8: ca “jaya nandā”tiādivacanehi sutamaṅgalikādīsu nānappakārehi maṅgalavacanatthutighosehi sambhāventesu
atk-s0511a0:3933_16: “kiṃ me putto avacā”ti pucchitvā taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ito paṭṭhāya me nattā ‘rāhulakumāro’tveva nāmaṃ hotū”ti āha.
atk-s0511a0:3934_0: Bodhisattopi taṃ rathavaramāruyha mahatā parivārena atimanoramena sirisobhaggena nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a0:3934_1: Tasmiṃ samaye rūpasiriyā guṇasampattiyā ca akisā kisāgotamī nāma khattiyakaññā uparipāsādavaratalagatā
atk-s0511a0:3934_2: nagaraṃ pavisantassa bodhisattassa rūpasiriṃ disvā sañjātapītisomanassā hutvā –
atk-s0511a0:3935_0: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0511a0:3936_0: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti. –
atk-s0511a0:3938_3: ajjeva mayā gharāvāsaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamma pabbajitvā nibbānaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3938_4: “Ayaṃ imissā ācariyabhāgo hotū”ti muttāhāraṃ kaṇṭhato omuñcitvā kisāgotamiyā satasahassagghanikaṃ paramaratikaraṃ muttāhāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0511a0:3938_5: Sā “siddhatthakumāro mayi paṭibaddhahadayo hutvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesesī”ti somanassajātā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3939_0: Bodhisattopi mahatā sirisamudayena paramaramaṇīyaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā sirisayane nipajji.
atk-s0511a0:3939_4: varayuvatiyo madhuraravāni turiyāni gahetvā mahāpurisaṃ samparivāretvā ramāpayantiyo naccagītavāditāni
atk-s0511a0:3939_6: Bodhisatto pana kilesesu virattacittatāya naccagītādīsu anabhirato muhuttaṃ niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0511a0:3940_0: Tā taṃ disvā “yassatthāya naccādīni mayaṃ payojema,
atk-s0511a0:3940_2: idāni kimatthaṃ kilamāmā”ti gahitāni turiyāni ajjhottharitvā nipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:3940_4: Bodhisatto pabujjhitvā sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅkena nisinno addasa tā itthiyo turiyabhaṇḍāni avattharitvā niddāyantiyo paggharitalālā kilinnakapolagattā,
atk-s0511a0:3940_12: Mahāsatto tāsaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhiyyosomattāya kāmesu virattacitto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3940_13: Tassa pana alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ dasasatanayanabhavanasadisaṃ rucirasobhampi pāsādavaratalaṃ apaviddhamatasarīrakuṇapabharitaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3940_17: upassaṭṭhaṃ vata bho”ti ca vācaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a0:3941_0: So “ajjeva mayā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sirisayanato uṭṭhāya dvārasamīpaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0511a0:3941_2: Ummāre sīsaṃ katvā nipanno channo āha – “ahaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3941_7: na kañci paṭiveditvā sīghamekaṃ atijayaṃ sindhavaṃ kappehī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3941_9: devā”ti assabhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā assasālaṃ gantvā gandhatelappadīpesu jalantesu sumanapaṭṭavitānassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0511a0:3941_10: paramaramaṇīye bhūmibhāge ṭhitaṃ arimanthakaṃ kaṇḍakaṃ turaṅgavaraṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a0:3941_11: “ajja mayā ayyaputtassa nikkhamanatthāya imameva maṅgalahayaṃ kappetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kaṇḍakaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0511a0:3941_14: aññesu divasesu uyyānakīḷaṃ gamanakāle kappanā viya na hoti.
atk-s0511a0:3941_17: So nādo taṃ sakalakapilavatthupuraṃ unnādaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0511a0:3941_18: devatā pana sannirumbhitvā na kassaci sotuṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3942_0: Bodhisatto “puttaṃ tāva passissāmī”ti cintetvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya rāhulamātuyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā gabbhadvāraṃ vivari.
atk-s0511a0:3942_2: Rāhulamātā sumanamallikādīnaṃ ambaṇamattena attippakiṇṇe varasayane puttassa matthake hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyati.
atk-s0511a0:3942_3: Bodhisatto ummāre pādaṃ ṭhapetvā ṭhitakova oloketvā –
atk-s0511a0:3942_4: “sacāhaṃ deviyā hatthaṃ apanetvā mama puttaṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0511a0:3942_7: Buddho hutvāva āgantvā puttaṃ passissāmī”ti cintetvā pāsādatalato otaritvā assassa samīpaṃ gantvā evamāha –
atk-s0511a0:3942_10: ahaṃ taṃ nissāya buddho hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ tāressāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3942_12: Kaṇḍako gīvato paṭṭhāya āyāmato aṭṭhārasahattho hoti tadanurūpena ubbedhena samannāgato rūpaggajavabalasampanno
atk-s0511a0:3942_14: Tato bodhisatto varaturaṅgapiṭṭhigato channaṃ assassa vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā aḍḍharattasamaye nagarassa mahādvāraṃ sampatto.
atk-s0511a0:3943_0: Tadā pana rājā pubbeva bodhisattassa gamanapaṭisedhanatthāya dvīsu dvārakavāṭesu ekekaṃ purisasahassena
atk-s0511a0:3943_1: vivaritabbaṃ kāretvā tattha bahupurise ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3943_2: Bodhisatto kira purisagaṇanāya koṭisatasahassassa balaṃ dhāresi,
atk-s0511a0:3943_6: ajja kaṇḍakassa piṭṭhe nisinno channaṃ vāladhiṃ gāhāpetvā tena saddhiṃyeva kaṇḍakaṃ ūrūhi nippīḷetvā
atk-s0511a0:3943_10: ahaṃ ayyaputtaṃ khandhe katvā kaṇḍakaṃ dakkhiṇahatthena parikkhipanto upakacchake katvā uppatitvā pākāraṃ atikkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3943_12: “ahaṃ dvāre avivariyamāne yathānisinnameva ayyaputtaṃ gahitavāladhinā channena saddhiṃ uppatitvā pākārassa purato patiṭṭhahissāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3944_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pāpimā “mahāsattaṃ nivattessāmī”ti āgantvā gaganatale ṭhatvā āha –
atk-s0511a0:3945_0: “Mā nikkhama mahāvīra, ito te sattame dine;
atk-s0511a0:3946_0: Dibbaṃ tu cakkaratanaṃ, addhā pātu bhavissati. –
atk-s0511a0:3947_0: Dvisahassaparittadīpaparivārānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ rajjaṃ kāressasi, nivatta,
atk-s0511a0:3949_0: Anatthikohaṃ rajjena, gaccha tvaṃ māra mā idha.
atk-s0511a0:3953_0: Mahāsatto ekūnattiṃsavassakāle hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍetvā cakkavattisirinivāsabhūtā
atk-s0511a0:3953_1: rājabhavanā nikkhamitvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāya uttarāsāḷhanakkhatte vattamāne nagarato nikkhamitvā nagaraṃ apaloketukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3953_2: Vitakkasamanantarameva cassa kulālacakkaṃ viya so bhūmippadeso parivatti.
atk-s0511a0:3953_3: Yathāṭhitova mahāsatto kapilavatthupuraṃ disvā tassiṃ bhūmippadese kaṇḍakanivattanaṃ nāma cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3953_4: dassetvā gantabbamagābhimukhaṃyeva kaṇḍakaṃ katvā pāyāsi mahatā sakkārena uḷārena sirisamudayena.
atk-s0511a0:3953_5: Tadā mahāsatte gacchante tassa purato devatā saṭṭhi ukkāsatasahassāni dhārayiṃsu,
atk-s0511a0:3953_6: tathā pacchato saṭṭhi dakkhiṇato saṭṭhi ukkāsatasahassāni,
atk-s0511a0:3953_9: Dibbāni saṅgītāni anekāni ca turiyāni vajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3954_0: Iminā sirisamudayena gacchanto bodhisatto ekaratteneva tīṇi rajjāni atikkamma tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ gantvā anomānadītīraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a0:3954_1: Atha bodhisatto nadītīre ṭhatvā channaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0511a0:3954_4: “Amhākampi pabbajjā anomā bhavissatī”ti paṇhiyā assaṃ ghaṭṭento assassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3954_5: Asso ullaṅghitvā aṭṭhausabhavitthārāya nadiyā pārimatīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3954_6: Bodhisatto assapiṭṭhito oruyha muttarāsisadise vālukāpuline ṭhatvā channaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0511a0:3954_8: tvaṃ mayhaṃ ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca ādāya gaccha,
atk-s0511a0:3954_13: gaccheva tva”nti tikkhattuṃ nivāretvā ābharaṇāni ceva kaṇḍakañca paṭicchāpetvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:3954_15: te khaggena chindissāmī”ti dakkhiṇena hatthena paramanisitamasivaraṃ gahetvā vāmahatthena moḷiyā saddhiṃ cūḷaṃ gahetvā chindi,
atk-s0511a0:3954_16: kesā dvaṅgulamattā hutvā dakkhiṇato āvaṭṭamānā sīse allīyiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3954_17: Tesaṃ pana kesānaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tadeva pamāṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3954_24: Taṃ cūḷāmaṇibandhanaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3955_0: Atha sakko devarājā dibbena cakkhunā olokento yojanikena ratanacaṅkoṭakena taṃ paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0511a0:3955_1: tiyojanaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ cūḷāmaṇicetiyaṃ nāma patiṭṭhāpesi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a0:3958_3: Athassa kassapabuddhakāle purāṇasahāyako ghaṭikāramahābrahmā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vināsabhāvāppattena mittabhāvena cintesi –
atk-s0511a0:3959_0: “Ticīvarañca patto ca, vāsi sūci ca bandhanaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:3961_1: Mahāpuriso arahaddhajaṃ nivāsetvā uttamaṃ pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā sāṭakayugalaṃ ākāse khipi.
atk-s0511a0:3961_2: Taṃ mahābrahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ cetiyaṃ katvā taṃ anto pakkhipitvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0511a0:3961_4: mama vacanena mātāpitūnaṃ ārogyaṃ vadehī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0511a0:3961_5: Tato channo mahāpurisaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a0:3961_6: Kaṇḍako pana channena saddhiṃ mantayamānassa bodhisattassa vacanaṃ suṇanto ṭhatvā –
atk-s0511a0:3961_7: “natthi dāni mayhaṃ puna sāmino dassana”nti cakkhupathamassa vijahanto viyogadukkhamadhivāsetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0511a0:3961_8: hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā suraripudurabhibhavane tāvatiṃsabhavane kaṇḍako nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0511a0:3961_11: So kaṇḍakassa kālakiriyāya dutiyena sokena pīḷiyamāno rodanto paridevanto dukkhena agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3962_0: Bodhisattopi pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva padese anupiyaṃ nāma ambavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0511a0:3962_1: tattheva sattāhaṃ pabbajjāsukhena vītināmetvā tato pacchā sañjhāppabhānurañjitasaliladharasaṃvuto saradasamaye
atk-s0511a0:3962_2: paripuṇṇarajanikaro viya kāsāvavarasaṃvuto ekakopi anekajanaparivuto viya virocamāno taṃ vanavāsimigapakkhīnaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3962_3: nayanāmatapānamiva karonto ekacaro sīho viya narasīho mattamātaṅgavilāsagāmī samassāsento viya vasundharaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3962_4: pādatalehi ekadivaseneva tiṃsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ gantvā uttuṅgataraṅgabhaṅgaṃ asaṅgaṃ gaṅgaṃ nadiṃ uttaritvā
atk-s0511a0:3962_6: Pavisitvā ca pana sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya cari.
atk-s0511a0:3962_7: Sakalaṃ pana taṃ nagaraṃ bodhisattassa rūpadassanena dhanapālake paviṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ viya asurinde paviṭṭhe devanagaraṃ viya saṅkhobhamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3962_8: Piṇḍāya carante mahāpurise nagaravāsino manussā mahāsattassa rūpadassanena sañjātapītisomanassā jātavimhitā
atk-s0511a0:3963_5: kadā nāma tayā puṇṇacando manussalokamāgato diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0511a0:3963_6: nanu esa kusumaketukāmadevo vesantaramādāya amhākaṃ mahārājassa nāgarānañca paramalīḷāvibhūtiṃ disvā kīḷitumāgato”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3963_9: nanu kāmo issarakodhahutāsanaparidaḍḍhasarīro surapatidasasatanayano eso amarapurasaññāya idhāgato”ti! Tamañño īsakaṃ hasitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3963_15: Addhā brahmā esa brāhmaṇajanaṃ pamattaṃ ñatvā vedavedaṅgādīsu niyojanatthāya āgato”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3963_16: Te sabbepi apasādetvā añño paṇḍitajātiko evamāha –
atk-s0511a0:3964_0: Evaṃ sallapantesu eva nāgaresu rājapurisā gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño bimbisārassa ārocesuṃ – “deva,
atk-s0511a0:3964_1: devo vā gandhabbo vā udāhu nāgarājā vā yakkho vā ko nu vā amhākaṃ nagare piṇḍāya caratī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:3964_2: Rājā taṃ sutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhatvā mahāpurisaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajāto rājapurise āṇāpesi –
atk-s0511a0:3965_0: Mahāpurisopi santindriyo santamānaso rūpasobhāya mahājanassa nayanāni ākaḍḍhento viya yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno
atk-s0511a0:3965_1: missakabhattaṃ yāpanamattaṃ saṃharitvā paviṭṭhadvāreneva nagarā nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya puratthābhimukho
atk-s0511a0:3965_3: Tato rājapurisā gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3965_4: Tato dūtavacanaṃ sutvā magadhādhipati rājā bālajanehi duranusāro merumandārasāro sattasāro bimbisāro
atk-s0511a0:3965_5: bodhisattassa guṇassavaneneva sañjātadassanakutūhalo vegena nagarato nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatābhimukho
atk-s0511a0:3965_6: gantvā yānā oruyha bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā tena katānuñño bandhujanasinehasītale silātale nisīditvā
atk-s0511a0:3965_7: bodhisattassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā katapaṭisanthāro nāmagottādīni pucchitvā bodhisattassa sabbaṃ issariyaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3965_10: vatthukāmehi vā kilesakāmehi vā attho natthi.
atk-s0511a0:3965_12: Rājā anekappakārena yācantopi tassa cittaṃ alabhitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3965_14: buddhabhūtena pana tayā paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ āgantabba”nti vatvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭho.
atk-s0511a0:3966_0: “Atha rājagahaṃ vararājagahaṃ, nararājavare nagaraṃ tu gate;
atk-s0511a0:3968_0: Atha bodhisatto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno āḷārañca kālāmaṃ udakañca rāmaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
atk-s0511a0:3968_1: “nāyaṃ maggo bodhiyā”ti taṃ samāpattibhāvanaṃ analaṅkaritvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitukāmo uruvelaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0511a0:3968_2: “ramaṇīyo vatāyaṃ bhūmibhāgo”ti tattheva vāsaṃ upagantvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahi.
atk-s0511a0:3968_3: Lakkhaṇapariggāhakabrāhmaṇānaṃ cattāro puttā koṇḍañño brāhmaṇo cāti ime pañca janā paṭhamaṃyeva pabbajitā
atk-s0511a0:3968_4: gāmanigamarājadhānīsu bhikkhācariyaṃ carantā tattha bodhisattaṃ sampāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3968_7: idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti pariveṇasammajjanādikāya vattapaṭipattiyā upaṭṭhahamānā santikāvacarāvassa ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3969_0: Athassa tāya nirāhāratāya paramakisabhāvappattakāyassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇo kāyo kāḷavaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3969_3: “nāyaṃ maggo bodhiyā”ti oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhāretuṃ gāmanigamesu piṇḍāya caritvā āhāraṃ āhari.
atk-s0511a0:3969_7: “ayaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi sabbaññutaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0511a0:3969_8: idāni gāmanigamarājadhānīsu piṇḍāya caritvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhariyamāno kiṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0511a0:3969_10: kiṃ no iminā”ti mahāpurisaṃ pahāya bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3970_0: Atha mahāpuriso visākhapuṇṇamāya uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senākuṭumbikassa gehe nibbattā sujātā nāma dārikā ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:3970_1: Tāya sampasādanajātāya dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya
atk-s0511a0:3970_3: Atha bodhisatto nerañjarātīre surabhikusumasamalaṅkate nīlobhāse manorame sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā
atk-s0511a0:3970_4: sāyanhasamaye devatāhi alaṅkatena maggena bodhirukkhābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3970_6: Tasmiṃ samaye sotthiyo nāma tiṇahārako tiṇaṃ ādāya paṭipathe āgacchanto mahāpurisassa ākāraṃ ñatvā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo adāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3970_7: Bodhisatto tiṇaṃ gahetvā asitañjanagirisaṅkāsaṃ ācarantamiva dinakarajālaṃ sakahadayamiva karuṇāsītalaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3970_8: sītacchāyaṃ vividhavihagagaṇasampātavirahitaṃ mandamāruteritāya ghanasākhāya samalaṅkataṃ naccantamiva
atk-s0511a0:3970_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pubbuttaradisābhāge ṭhito tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0511a0:3970_12: Tāni ca tiṇāni cittakārena lekhāgahitāni viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3970_13: Bodhisatto tattha cuddasahatthe tiṇasanthare tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgasamannāgatavīriyaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3970_14: adhiṭṭhahitvā suvaṇṇapīṭhe ṭhapitarajatakkhandhaṃ viya ca paññāsahatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā
atk-s0511a0:3970_15: upari maṇichattena viya bodhisākhāhi dhāriyamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3970_16: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇe panassa cīvare bodhiaṅkurā patamānā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe pavāḷā viya nikkhittā virocayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3971_0: Bodhisatte pana tattha nisinneyeva vasavattimāro devaputto –
atk-s0511a0:3971_2: na dānāhamatikkamitumassa dassāmī”ti mārabalassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā mārabalamādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0511a0:3971_3: Sā kira mārasenā mārassa purato dvādasayojanā ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:3971_7: Yassā pana unnadantiyā saddo navayojanasahassato paṭṭhāya pathaviundriyanasaddo viya suyyati.
atk-s0511a0:3971_8: Tasmiṃ samaye sakko devarājā vijayuttaraṃ nāma saṅkhaṃ dhamamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3971_10: Pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto tigāvutāyataṃ beḷuvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya vādayamāno maṅgalayuttāni gītāni gāyamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3971_11: Suyāmo devarājā tigāvutāyataṃ saradasamayarajanikarasassirikaṃ dibbacāmaraṃ gahetvā mandaṃ mandaṃ bījayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3971_12: Brahmā ca sahampati tiyojanavitthataṃ dutiyamiva puṇṇacandaṃ setacchattaṃ bhagavato uddhaṃ dhāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3971_13: Mahākāḷopi nāgarājā asītiyā nāganāṭakasahassehi parivuto thutisaṅgītāni pavattento mahāsattaṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3971_14: Dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatāyo nānāvidhehi surabhikusumadāmadhūpacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā sādhukāraṃ pavattayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3972_0: Atha māro devaputto diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ himagirisikharasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ girimekhalaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a0:3972_1: ratanakhacitavaravāraṇaṃ arivāraṇavāraṇaṃ abhiruhitvā bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā aggahitaggahaṇena nānāvudhāni
atk-s0511a0:3972_3: Māraparisāpi asipharasusarasattisabalā samussitadhanumusala- phāla- saṅku- kunta- tomara- upala- laguḷa- valaya- kaṇaya- kappaṇa-
atk-s0511a0:3972_4: cakkakaṭakadhārāruru- sīha- khagga- sarabha- varāha- byaggha-
atk-s0511a0:3972_7: diradādivadanā ca nānābhīmavirūpabībhacchakāyā manussayakkhapisācasadisakāyā ca mahāsattaṃ bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3972_8: bodhimūle nisinnaṃ ajjhottharamānā gantvā parivārayitvā mārassa sandesaṃ samudikkhamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_0: Tato mārabale bodhimaṇḍamupasaṅkamanteyeva tesaṃ sakkādīnaṃ ekopi ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_2: Sakko pana devarājā taṃ vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ katvā palāyitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_3: Mahābrahmā setacchattaṃ cakkavāḷakoṭiyaṃ ṭhapetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_4: Kāḷo nāgarājā sabbanāṭakāni chaḍḍetvā pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā pañcayojanasatikaṃ mañjerikanāgabhavanaṃ gantvā hatthena mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipajji.
atk-s0511a0:3973_5: Ekadevatāpi tattha ṭhātuṃ samatthā nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_6: Mahāpuriso pana suññavimāne mahābrahmā viya ekakova nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3973_7: “Idāni māro āgamissatī”ti paṭhamameva anekarūpāni aniṭṭhāni dunnimittāni pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3975_0: Ukkā samantā nipatiṃsu ghorā, dhūmandhakārā ca disā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:3976_0: “Acetanāyampi sacetanā yathā, gatā viyogaṃ patineva kāminī;
atk-s0511a0:3977_0: Lateva vātābhihatā sasāgarā, pakampi nānāsadharā dharā mahī.
atk-s0511a0:3979_0: Kūṭāni nānātarusaṅghaṭāni, bhetvā girīnaṃ pathaviṃ bhajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3980_0: “Pavāyi vāto pharuso samantā, nighaṭṭasaddo tumulo ahosi;
atk-s0511a0:3981_0: Bhajittha ghoraṃ ravirandhakāraṃ, kabandharūpaṃ gagane carittha.
atk-s0511a0:3983_0: Anekarūpaṃ kira dunnimittaṃ, ahosi mārāgamane samantā.
atk-s0511a0:3984_0: “Taṃ devadevaṃ abhihantukāmaṃ, kāmaṃ tu disvā pana devasaṅghā;
atk-s0511a0:3985_0: Hāhāti saddaṃ anukampamānā, akaṃsu saddhiṃ amaraṅganāhi.
atk-s0511a0:3987_0: Saantakaṃ taṃ sabalaṃ anekaṃ, hatthe ca tharū ca pātā tayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3988_0: “Vihaṅgamānaṃ garuḷova majjhe, majjhe migānaṃ paramova sīho;
atk-s0511a0:3989_0: Mahāyaso mārabalassa majjhe, visārado vītabhayo nisīdi”.
atk-s0511a0:3990_1: “siddhatthaṃ bhiṃsāpetvā palāpessāmī”ti vātavassaṃ paharaṇavassaṃ pāsāṇavassaṃ puna aṅgārakukkuḷavālukakalalandhakāravuṭṭhīhi
atk-s0511a0:3990_2: navahi māraiddhīhi bodhisattaṃ palāpetuṃ asakkonto kuddhamānaso – “kiṃ, bhaṇe,
atk-s0511a0:3990_5: gaṇhatha hanatha chindatha bandhatha na muñcatha palāpethā”ti māraparisaṃ āṇāpetvā sayañca girimekhalassa
atk-s0511a0:3990_6: khandhe nisīditvā ekena karena saraṃ bhamayanto bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0511a0:3990_12: pallaṅkatthāya pāramī”tiādīni vacanāni vatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pathaviṃ ninnāmesi.
atk-s0511a0:3990_13: Taṅkhaṇaññeva cuddasasahassādhikāni dasasatasahassayojanabahalāni pathavisandhārakāni vātudakāni paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3990_14: kampetvā tadantaraṃ catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā ayaṃ mahāpathavī chadhā pakampittha.
atk-s0511a0:3990_15: Upari ākāse anekasahassāni vijjulatā ca asanī ca phaliṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:3991_0: Atha mahāpurisopi taṃ samāraṃ mārabalaṃ khantimettāvīriyapaññādīnaṃ attano pāramīnamānubhāvena viddhaṃsetvā
atk-s0511a0:3991_1: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā paccūsasamaye sabbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3991_2: āciṇṇe paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0511a0:3991_3: vaḍḍhetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena catutthamaggena sabbakilese khepetvā sabbabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0511a0:3995_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a0:3999_1: “ahaṃ kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni imassa pallaṅkassa kāraṇā sandhāviṃ,
atk-s0511a0:3999_3: ettha me nisinnassa yāva saṅkappo na paripuṇṇo,
atk-s0511a0:3999_4: na tāva ito vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajjanto sattāhaṃ tattheva nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:3999_6: “atha kho bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī”ti.
atk-s0511a0:4000_2: Pallaṅkasmiñhi ālayaṃ na vijahatī”ti parivitakko udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:4000_3: Atha satthā devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ vitakkūpasamanatthaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0511a0:4000_4: Evaṃ iminā pāṭihāriyena devatānaṃ vitakkaṃ vūpasametvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā –
atk-s0511a0:4000_5: “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:4000_6: pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamanaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañca bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a0:4001_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antarā caṅkamaṃ māpetvā puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a0:4002_0: Catutthe pana sattāhe bodhito pacchimuttaradisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ māpayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:4002_1: Tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a0:4002_2: taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ ratanagharacetiyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4003_0: Evaṃ bhagavā bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a0:4003_1: Tatrāpi dhammaṃ vicinanto vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:4004_0: Satthā tattha sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā mucalindamūlaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:4004_1: Tattha sattāhavaddalikāya uppannāya sītādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ mucalindena nāgarājena sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0511a0:4004_2: parikkhitto asambādhāya gandhakuṭiyā viharanto viya vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvediyamāno tattha sattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0511a0:4004_6: Etthantare bhagavato neva mukhadhovanaṃ na sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ nāhārakiccaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a0:4004_8: Atha sattasattāhamatthake ekūnapaññāsatime divase sakkena devānamindena upanītena nāgalatādantakaṭṭhena
atk-s0511a0:4004_9: ca anotattadahodakena ca mukhaṃ dhovitvā tattheva rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:4005_0: Tasmiṃ samaye tapussabhallikā nāma dve vāṇijā ñātisālohitāya devatāya satthu āhāradāne ussāhitā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya –
atk-s0511a0:4005_1: “paṭiggaṇhātu bhagavā imaṃ āhāraṃ anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:4005_4: kimhi nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0511a0:4005_5: Athassa bhagavato ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā catūhi disāhi cattāro mahārājāno indanīlamaṇimaye cattāro patte upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4005_7: Puna muggavaṇṇe silāmaye cattāro patte upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4005_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ catunnampi devaputtānaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya paṭiggahetvā ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā tasmiṃ paccagghe
atk-s0511a0:4005_9: selamaye patte āhāraṃ paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitvā anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0511a0:4005_10: Te dve bhātaro vāṇijā buddhañca dhammañca saraṇaṃ gantvā dvevācikā upāsakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4006_0: Atha satthā puna ajapālanigrodhameva gantvā nigrodhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:4006_1: Athassa tattha nisinnamattasseva adhigatassa dhammassa gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇo –
atk-s0511a0:4006_2: “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo”tiādinā paresaṃ dhammaṃ adesetukāmatākārappatto parivitakko udapādi.
atk-s0511a0:4006_3: Atha brahmā sahampati “nassati vata bho loko,
atk-s0511a0:4006_4: vinassati vata bho loko”ti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu sakkasuyāmasantusitanimmānaratiparanimmitavasavattimahābrahmāno
atk-s0511a0:4006_5: ca gahetvā satthu santikaṃ āgantvā – “desetu, bhante,
atk-s0511a0:4007_1: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cintento āḷārudakānaṃ kālaṅkatabhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0511a0:4007_2: “bahūpakārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū”ti pañcavaggiye ārabbha manasikāraṃ katvā –
atk-s0511a0:4007_3: “kahaṃ nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti āvajjento –
atk-s0511a0:4007_5: “tattha gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessāmī”ti katipāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍasāmanteyeva piṇḍāya caranto viharitvā
atk-s0511a0:4007_6: āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyaṃ bārāṇasiṃ gamissāmī”ti pattacīvaramādāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0511a0:4007_7: Antarāmagge haṭṭhatupagaṃ upakaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ disvā tassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃdivasaṃyeva sāyanhasamaye isipatanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a0:4008_0: Pañcavaggiyā pana tathāgataṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā – “ayaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0511a0:4008_1: samaṇo gotamo paccayabāhullāya āvatto paripuṇṇakāyo pīṇindriyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā āgacchati,
atk-s0511a0:4008_4: Bhagavā tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā sabbasattesu anodhissakavasena pharaṇasamatthaṃ mettacittaṃ saṃkhipitvā odhissakavasena mettacittena phari.
atk-s0511a0:4008_5: Te bhagavato mettacittena phuṭṭhā tathāgate upasaṅkamante sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā abhivādanādīni sabbakiccāni akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:4009_0: Atha bhagavā attano buddhabhāvaṃ te ñāpetvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīditvā uttarāsāḷhanakkhattayoge
atk-s0511a0:4009_1: vattamāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi parivuto pañcavaggiye there āmantetvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a0:4009_2: Tesu aññāsikoṇḍañño desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesento suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:4016_7: Aṭṭhārasannaṃ koṭīnanti bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye dhammacakkappavattanasuttantakathāya aññāsikoṇḍaññattherappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:4017_0: Idāni bhagavā atītaṃ kathetvā anāgataṃ abhisamayaṃ kathento –
atk-s0511a0:4020_0: Gaṇanāya na vattabbo, dutiyābhisamayo ahū”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a0:4021_0: Tattha naradevasamāgameti tato aparena samayena mahāmaṅgalasamāgame dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devamanussānaṃ
atk-s0511a0:4021_5: Esa nayo ito paresu īdisesu vacanesu ca.
atk-s0511a0:4021_6: Puna rāhulovādasuttantadesanāya gaṇanapathavītivatte satte abhisamayāmatapānaṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a0:4025_2: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ aḍḍhattiyasatānīti imesaṃ aḍḍhateḷasasatānaṃ sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:4029_3: Tesaṃ pana majjhagato bhagavā caturaṅgasannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a0:4033_0: Dadāmi patthitaṃ sabbaṃ, maṇīva sabbakāmado”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a0:4034_2: Maṇīva sabbakāmadoti cintāmaṇi viya sabbakāmadado ahampi icchitaṃ patthitaṃ sabbaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhavisesaṃ demīti attho.
atk-s0511a0:4052_0: Bhaddakañcanā nāma nārī, rāhulo nāma atrajo.
atk-s0511a0:4076_0: Mama pana rammasurammasubhanāmakā tayo pāsādā navabhūmikasattabhūmikapañcabhūmikā,
atk-s0511a0:4076_3: sohaṃ cattāro nimitte disvā assayānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamiṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4076_4: Tato chabbassāni padhānaṃ padahitvā visākhapuṇṇamāya uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senākuṭumbikassa dhītāya sampasādajātāya
atk-s0511a0:4076_5: sujātāya nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sotthiyena nāma
atk-s0511a0:4076_6: tiṇahārakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā assatthabodhirukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā tattha mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā
atk-s0511a0:4077_2: Aggīvāhārasaṅkhayāti aggi viya indhanakkhayena yathā aggi nirupādāno nibbāyati,
atk-s0511a0:4079_0: Tāni ca atulatejānīti aggasāvakayugādīni tāni asadisatejāni.
atk-s0511a0:4079_1: Imāni ca dasabalānīti etāni ca sārīradasabalāni guṇadhāraṇo dehoti chaasādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇadharo ayaṃ deho ca.
atk-s0511a0:4079_2: Tamantarahissantīti sabbāni etāni vuttappakārāni antaradhāyissanti vinassissanti.
atk-s0511a0:4079_3: Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti ettha nanūti ayaṃ anumatiatthe nipāto.
atk-s0511a0:4079_5: sabbameva pana saṅkhataṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammaṃ hutvā abhāvato aniccaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:4079_8: Tasmā saṅkhāresu lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā amatamasaṅkhataṃ accutaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchatha.
atk-s0511a0:4079_9: Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī idaṃ amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ appamādena sampādethāti.
atk-s0511a0:4079_10: Desanāpariyosāne kira devatānaṃ koṭisatasahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
atk-s0511a0:4079_11: Sesamaggaphalesu patiṭṭhitā pana gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4080_0: Evaṃ bhagavā kappanāmajātiādivavatthitaṃ sakalampi buddhavaṃsaṃ ākāse ratanacaṅkame caṅkamantova kathetvā
atk-s0511a0:4080_1: ñātijanaṃ vandāpetvā ākāsato otaritvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a0:4080_2: Evaṃ nisinne pana bhagavati lokanāthe sikhāppatto ñātisamāgamo ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:4080_13: atītepi vassī”ti imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a0:4086_1: caturo āsuṃ vināyakā”tiādikā aṭṭhārasagāthā saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitā nigamanagāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a0:4088_0: Imasmiṃ pana sakalepi buddhavaṃse niddiṭṭhānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ aṭṭha vemattāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0511a0:4089_0: Tattha āyuvemattaṃ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā.
atk-s0511a0:4089_1: Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro koṇḍañño anomadassī padumo padumuttaro atthadassī dhammadassī siddhattho tissoti ime nava buddhā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4089_2: Maṅgalo sumano sobhito nārado sumedho sujāto piyadassī phussoti ime aṭṭha buddhā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4089_3: Revato vessabhū cāti ime dve buddhā saṭṭhivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4089_5: Sikhī kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapoti ime cattāro buddhā yathākkamena sattaticattālīsatiṃsavīsavassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4089_6: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavato vassasataṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:4089_7: Upacitapuññasambhārānaṃ dīghāyukasaṃvattaniyakammasamupetānampi buddhānaṃ yugavasena āyuppamāṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:4090_0: Pamāṇavemattaṃ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā.
atk-s0511a0:4090_5: vipassībuddhānaṃ asītihatthubbedhaṃ sarīrappamāṇaṃ ahosi. Koṇḍañña- maṅgala- nārada-
atk-s0511a0:4091_0: Kulavemattaṃ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattiṃsu keci brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a0:4093_0: Rasmivemattaṃ nāma maṅgalassa kira sammāsambuddhassa sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a0:4093_10: paṭividdhaguṇe pana kassaci vemattaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a0:4094_0: Yānavemattaṃ nāma keci hatthiyānena keci assayānena keci rathapada- pāsāda-
atk-s0511a0:4094_2: Tathā hi dīpaṅkara- sumana- sumedha- phussa- sikhī-
atk-s0511a0:4094_3: koṇāgamanā hatthiyānena nikkhamiṃsu. Koṇḍañña- revata- paduma-
atk-s0511a0:4095_0: Bodhivemattaṃ nāma dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kapītanarukkho bodhi;
atk-s0511a0:4095_1: koṇḍaññassa bhagavato sālakalyāṇirukkho, maṅgala- sumana- revata-
atk-s0511a0:4096_4: vipassīnaṃ tepaṇṇāsahatthapallaṅkā ahesuṃ; koṇḍañña- maṅgala- nārada-
atk-s0511a0:4098_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ pana cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti.
atk-s0511a0:4098_1: Sabbabuddhānañhi bodhipallaṅko avijahito ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne hoti.
atk-s0511a0:4098_4: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti.
atk-s0511a0:4100_0: Aparaṃ pana amhākaṃyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca dīpesuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4100_1: Amhākaṃ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṃ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako assarājā nidhikumbho mahābodhi kāḷudāyīti imāni satta sahajātāni.
atk-s0511a0:4100_7: Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca.
atk-s0511a0:4100_8: Māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ca āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi.
atk-s0511a0:4102_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammataṃ pakāsayissāma.
atk-s0511a0:4102_7: kañcanapaṭṭesu patiṭṭhitapādānaṃ uttarābhimukhānaṃ sattapadavītihārānaṃ gantvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā sīhanādanadanaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:4102_8: cattāri nimittāni disvā jātamattaputtānaṃ mahāsattānaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:4102_9: arahaddhajamādāya pabbajitvā sabbaheṭṭhimena paricchedena sattāhaṃ padhānacariyā,
atk-s0511a0:4102_14: bodhipallaṅkeyeva tisso vijjā ādiṃ katvā asādhāraṇañāṇādiguṇapaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a0:4102_24: uppanne vatthumhi sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ uppannāya aṭṭhuppattiyā jātakakathanaṃ,
atk-s0511a0:4102_30: catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā parinibbānanti imā samattiṃsa sabbabuddhānaṃ dhammatāti.
atk-s0511a0:4104_2: Buddhānaṃ uddissa abhihaṭānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4104_3: Buddhānaṃ āyuno na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4104_7: Buddhānaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇānaṃ asītiyā anubyañjanānañca na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4104_8: Buddharaṃsīnaṃ na sakkā kenaci antarāyo kātunti.
atk-s0511a0:4120_0: Yathā buddhavaṃsassa saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ, gatā sādhu siddhiṃ vinā antarāyaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:4121_0: Tathā dhammayuttā janānaṃ vitakkā, vināvantarāyena siddhiṃ vajantu.
atk-s0511a0:4122_0: Imaṃ buddhavaṃsassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ me, karontena yaṃ patthitaṃ puññajātaṃ;
atk-s0511a0:4123_0: Sadā tassa devānubhāvena loko, dhuvaṃ santamaccantamatthaṃ payātaṃ.
atk-s0511a0:4124_0: Vinassantu rogā manussesu sabbe, pavassantu devāpi vassantakāle;
atk-s0511a0:4125_0: Sukhaṃ hotu niccaṃ varaṃ nārakāpi, pisācāpayātā pipāsā bhavantu.
atk-s0511a0:4126_0: Surā accharānaṃ gaṇādīhi saddhiṃ, ciraṃ devaloke sukhaṃ cānubhontu;
atk-s0511a0:4127_0: Ciraṃ ṭhātu dhammo munindassa loke, sukhaṃ lokapālā mahiṃ pālayantu.
atk-s0511a0:4133_0: Antarāyaṃ vinā esā, yathā niṭṭhaṃ upāgatā;
